title: Nola: Story Planner & Writing
description:
Nola is a simple, easy-to-use writing app loved by over 600,000 writers in Japan‚Äîincluding professionals.
From outlining your themes to building plots, writing drafts, organizing characters, and managing worldbuilding notes, Nola keeps your creative process organized and intuitive.

‚óÜ Key Features:
„ÉªCloud sync & backup ‚Äì Access your work anytime, on any device.
„ÉªTheme & goal setting ‚Äì Define your novel‚Äôs message and destination.
„ÉªPlot builder ‚Äì Plan your story using structured formats like Kish≈çtenketsu or Jo-Ha-Kyu.
„ÉªDraft editor ‚Äì Write and save your manuscript in the cloud. Offline mode also available.
„ÉªCharacter & world database ‚Äì Save profiles, settings, and item descriptions to avoid inconsistencies.
„ÉªRelationship chart ‚Äì Visualize how characters are connected as your story evolves.
„ÉªCharacter illustration tool ‚Äì Design avatars using customizable parts.

Created in Japan. Loved by writers.
Nola is the tool for storytellers who want clarity, structure, and creativity‚Äîall in one app.

title: Blackmagic Camera
description:
Blackmagic Camera unlocks the power of your phone by adding Blackmagic‚Äôs digital film camera controls and image processing! Now you can create the same cinematic ‚Äòlook‚Äô as Hollywood feature films. You get the same intuitive and user friendly interface as Blackmagic Design‚Äôs award winning cameras. It‚Äôs just like using a professional digital film camera! You can adjust settings such as frame rate, shutter angle, white balance and ISO all in a single tap. Or, record directly to Blackmagic Cloud in industry standard files up to 8K! Recording to Blackmagic Cloud Storage lets you collaborate on DaVinci Resolve projects with editors anywhere in the world, all at the same time!

Some features are device dependent and may not be available on your device.
descriptionHTML:
Blackmagic Camera unlocks the power of your phone by adding Blackmagic‚Äôs digital film camera controls and image processing! Now you can create the same cinematic ‚Äòlook‚Äô as Hollywood feature films. You get the same intuitive and user friendly interface as Blackmagic Design‚Äôs award winning cameras. It‚Äôs just like using a professional digital film camera! You can adjust settings such as frame rate, shutter angle, white balance and ISO all in a single tap. Or, record directly to Blackmagic Cloud in industry standard files up to 8K! Recording to Blackmagic Cloud Storage lets you collaborate on DaVinci Resolve projects with editors anywhere in the world, all at the same time!

Some features are device dependent and may not be available on your device.
summary: Get high end digital film camera controls and image processing on your phone.

scraped_reviews.content: Absolutely incredible, it gives you legitimate professional level control over your phone's camera. My only gripe is that it's incompatible with my tablet. I'm only interested in using the tablet for remote control/monitoring my phones. It would be nice if there was a separate "Blackmagic Camera Control" app that only controlled other devices without accessing the camera for the controller device.

This app works great on my Galaxy devices. On my Xperia, for whatever reason the app does not use the proper sensor information when trying to use the wide angle. It instead is displaying the 1x the sensor information instead of the .7x like it should be. Remote camera is also very buggy on the Xperia 1 Mark 3 when sending. The controller seems to be receiving a very buggy feed and it cuts out mid transmission or sometimes after I change a setting. Also Missing 4K 120fps on the main sensor.

Seems to be problematic on Android (Oppo Find X8 Pro), which probably isn't BlackMagic's fault. White balance is always significantly off, both basic balance and tint, no matter whether I use manual or auto. Frame rates above 60 play back at incorrect rate, but that can be fixed in post. Oh well -- back to iOS. üôÉ

Seems like a very handy tool for video work. Has good set of options to choose from, all seem to work well with my S22 Ultra. I have one main issue, for a "camera app", it doesn't take photos. I've been through every potential spot, and no way to take a picture. Had a freezing issue with going into "media" to view videos taken. For some reason it was just receiving a black screen, like stuck between "Camera" and "Media". Seems to be working now, time will tell.

Good start. With this being so new to Xperia, I know there will be issues, I just hope they get resolved soon. Few things I've noticed is when recording in stereo, the audio is out of sync, and it does not utilize the other 2 mics even though it sees it; it just uses the mic near the charging port. 60 fps crashes the app and when it does, all previous set up resets. Exposure and focus lock messes with your ISO and with your shutter speed. Looking forward to updates.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. We are very sorry to hear your experience with the app. We would like to thank you in advance for your patience while we develop and test a solution for upcoming versions of the app, please keep an eye out for future updates.

scraped_reviews.content: The app has a lot of problems. Certain settings will not save, no matter how many times i set them to what i want, so i don't even know if exporting preset settings work. The app also crashes a LOT. And my main reason for being interested in this app is being able to record horizontal video while holding the phone vertically, it accomplishes this, but the video is too zoomed in, i can zoom out to 0.7, but then the video quality takes a big hit, so if i do ever use it, it's gonna be zoomed in.

I like this app a lot because it offers the manual controls and tools from "real" video cameras. I have had a few minor freezes on my Pixel 8, but nothing deal breaking. I hope a log profile of some sort is added. Also, while it is nice to be able to lock the shutter angle at 180¬∞, that disables the option for auto ISO. When I am quickly filming BTS for my videography business, there are some camera settings I want to lock in and some that I would prefer to have in auto for speed's sake.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. Thank you very much for the review and we appreciate the suggestion. Unfortunately, Android doesn't natively allow to lock shutter without locking ISO.

scraped_reviews.content: UPDATE: I un-installed and reinstalled the app. it's still doing the same thing. I just put this on my S23 Ultra. I've tried a few things, and they are working fine. The only problem, so far (and it's a big one) is that when I logged in to my BMD Cloud account, The app stopped and won't stay open until I go into the settings and reset all storage and app settings. Then it works. So, no interfacing with the Blackmagic cloud for me until this BUG is fixed. When that happens, I'll change my rating
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please download the last version of the app, the issue should now be resolved in the latest update.

scraped_reviews.content: Really enjoying the quality of the video after doing some in-depth comparisons with the stock camera. I'd love to be able to switch luts from the main recording screen without diving into the settings menu. Also, having an intensity adjustment would be great, as I find some interesting luts but they're almost all too intense for my taste.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. Thank you very much for the review and we appreciate the suggestion and will be sure to take it into account for future releases.

scraped_reviews.content: I do like the app a lot but there are some detrimental bugs. I use it on Pixel 7pro. Downloaded the app two days ago. Shot eight clips and three of them disappeared. The three clips did not show up in the Pixel's media library, but I was able to playback in the app's media section but when swiped left to check other footage it disappeared. I was able to watch it once so it did record. It is no where in the trash bin or other storage. The trash bin hasn't been emptied.

I can't seem to get my DJI Mic 2 to be the audio source. 2 stars until I get that functionality, which apparently, iPhone users already have. It just sucks that most apps are more geared to iPhones than Androids. At least I can record video to an external drive such as memory card or portable ssd...that's the only reason I'm even giving any stars, since Samsung Native Camera app can't do that at bare minimum. However, I can use the DJI Mic 2 as Bluetooth Audio source using Pro Mode
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please download the last version of the app, the issue should now be resolved in the latest update. You can select the audio source from settings.

scraped_reviews.content: I am using this app on my pixel 7, and my storage is almost full, (it's a 128gb device and I have 108 gb full if that helps) and a major issue I'm facing is that in portrait mode it works fine but the second it's in landscape it just freezes, like everything works, I can record and everything else is working just fine but the viewfinder is stuck on one image and it's infuriating honestly

Unfortunately not all lenses work on my Xiaomi 13T pro! The main lens doesn't work, instead it's just a green screen. Without the 24mm, what's the point of using it over the standard camera app? Also, i miss the log options, which exist on my phone app. I love blackmagic but as of right now, i can't recommend it without the main lens setting not working properly.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. We are very sorry about this. Please download version 3.1.1 of the app, the issue should now be resolved.

scraped_reviews.content: This is a fantastic camera App. I would also like to see it work with external USB VIDEO CAMERAS (USB-hdmi adapters) so that I can A: use my phone as a camera monitor & B: as a secondary recorder (Like a clients phone/deliverables). not to mention Streaming from an external video camera. Using on 500GB Pixel 9.

Great app, great ecosystem, though thus far I'm only using the camera app on Android and Da Vinci Resolve (free version) on my Macbook Air for editing. Constantly improving all their software products and I can't recommend them enough. I do have a problem with streaming to YouTube, though I've made sure that the stream key is the same one that YouTube's giving me. Is there anyway I can get help here or should I post on the forums instead?

Best video app and it is free! Can't live without it. I don't want auto exposure enabled EVER... if it is... I lose my shutter angle setting. I generally create a preset with AE disabled but if I then do something like toggle luts ... It get re-enabled. I know the shutter angle can be locked... But this lock is disabled when you save a preset. Thanks for all you do. Also... I couldn't save the new luts with the export option. I am using a Samsung s25 ultra. Thank you.

Unfortunately the app is bugged on Pixel 9a. For some reason the video looks like I'm recording a Log, although my phone doesn't have a Log, but if I then tweak the white balance and then set it to Auto, the video becomes "normal"(not Log) again. As well when I try to set white balance manually, video has a huge magenta shift, as well white balance values are completely not calibrated, for example, in daylight setting white balance to 5200-5600 makes the video extremely warm.

This has got to be the most intuitive and featured manual video app I've used, even competing with free ones. Of course quality depends on your phone camera, but if you know what you're doing, you can really stretch your phone's capacity

Weird color management with Galaxy S24U in HLG mode. After frequent switching to 5x or 3x lens the exposure gets stuck in extremely negative numbers even when turned to auto in bright sunny environment (it gets dark and noisy for no reason, only app reset helps). Still no log mode for S24Ultra (one ui 7 has it in native camera app)

I love this camera application it helps me capture better footage on my Moto Edge 60 Pro compared to the stock camera. All lenses work well, and it allows me to shoot in 4K at 60fps, whereas the stock camera is limited to 4K at 30fps. The recent updates also added 2K video recording, which is more than enough for the phone. However, there‚Äôs only one issue when switching camera lenses while recording, the color shift becomes very dull, almost like black and white. Kindly fix this, please.

Does not work on my pixel phone. I need to get the old version back so I can use it. Poor testing on their part - should have been a beta. Not at all impressed locks up with no camera image all the time. Force stopping and deleting cache gives about 1 min before crashing!

the app is good to access pro functions of your smart phone camera. if your looking to use this app with your blackmagic come cameras like I was unfortunately it unless. I can't get the app to connect to my pyxis 6k to control or view the video feed...please make these functions available to android users, I hear iPhone works... whats with the bias lol...

Didn't work with Xiaomi 13t pro 24mm lens, only a green screen appeared and it seemed like it was like that for a very long time. Edit: I'm glad that the developers listen to feedback and fix things like this, since there's a lot of those who wouldn't üôÇ
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. We are very sorry about this. Please download version 3.1.1 of the app, the issue should now be resolved.

scraped_reviews.content: can't even record a 5 second clip using the auto lens changing mode on my pixel 7 pro, this feature needs to be fixed. other than that everything is good and works perfectly but that bug alone is a deal breaker. there's also some weird inconsistencies with AE and manual exposure, using the exact same settings as set by AE whilst using manual exposure always leads to an under exposed picture which is also quite frustrating

I got to know about this app from youtube and my initial experience with this app was good untill i tried the luts feature. The issue i am facing is that while the lut is applied the preview screen goes all black, but it does record the video with that lut applied. i can see the recorded video in the media tab with everything good. So the issue is that i can't see what i am recording which is a serious issue. I tried clearing the app data, tried reinstalling, nothing worked. I am using S24FE.

Love it but I have an issue with it on my S23 Ultra (also replicated on another S23 Ultra). The issue is 60fps on the 1x lens (22mm), whenever I am using 60fps on H.264 & H.265 (Rec.709), the screen flickers and it shows on the histogram as well. The only time it doesn't flicker is when I switch to H.265 (BT2020 HLG10) which I don't want to use. I've tried changing every setting and no suitable fix. Any way this can be rectified? Thank you.

PLEASE ADD SAMSUNG LOG AND FIX MAIN CAMERA ZOOM FROM 2X TO 4X, FROM 2X TO 3.2X NOTHING HAPPENS. UPDATE: LAST UPDATE BUGGED THE ZOOM FEATURE, MAKING IT UNUSABLE ON S24 ULTRA. I PRESS ONCE ON 2X AND ZOOMS RANDOMLY TO X8. THE LUT EXPORT FEATURE IS ALSO BUGGED MAKING IT IMPOSSIBLE TO GET THE LUT I WANT. EVERY SINGLE DAMN EXPORT OPTION DOESN'T RECOGNISE THE FILE AND CANCELS IT. PLEASE ADD OPEN GATE, RAW AND LOG TO SAMSUNG PHONES LIKE MOTIONCAM PRO DOES

The latest update is on the right track. they have now added high nitrate but I should be able to use my full sensor size, 4000x3000, but I can only set 3840x2160. edit: they added full sensor resolution! it's now the best camera app available!

Looking at this camera app, I can tell it should be an easy 5 stars. Unfortunately, I have to give it only 1 star since it constantly crashes on my Galaxy S23+. I dont know why it keeps crashing, but it won't stop. If anyone else has a S23+ and got this app to work, please let me know how you got it to work.

in Xiaomi 13 Pro, this app doesn't utilise other lenses, the wide lens is lagging and the zoom lens is not appearing in the interface. the previous versions was very good and had these, but the latest version broke these features. please fix it.

"Great app, but still lacks full Samsung S22 Ultra support. 4K 60fps is missing from the frame rate options, even though the phone supports it natively. Please address this API restriction for the S22 Ultra to allow 60fps shooting."

While using the Blackmagic Camera app on my Samsung S24 FE, I encountered a significant issue with the LUTs feature. Whenever I attempted to activate LUTs for recording, the camera feed would go completely blank- only audio was recorded, and no video appeared, This essentially made the LUTs function unusable for my workflow. I hope the developers can address this bug soon, as proper LUT support is important for professional mobile videography.

It became really a very good app! I love it. ‚ù§Ô∏è But... really, the best codec option is HEVC on a flagship device?! While on an iPhone 13 mini(!) there's option even for ProRes 422! That's why I gave only 4* instead of 5. // Do NOT tell me to update, it is always up to date.üòâ // Samsung S23 Ultra, Android 16; 2025.10.25.SA.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please download the last version of the app, the issue should now be resolved in the latest update.

scraped_reviews.content: This app is damn near perfect. The only thing keeping it from getting a 5-star rating for me is the inability to use it as a webcam, which the native Android camera app does. If that can ever come to fruition, I would sing this app's greatness from the mountaintops...

DOES WHAT IT SAYS I'm using this on my Google Pixel 6A and an iPhone 11, and the app works like a charm on both. As someone used to working with Blackmagic cameras, this app certainly makes working on the phones seamless. Everything is familiar and having manual control is so satisfying‚Äîit helps me use the full potential of my phone cameras. UPDATE AFTER PHONE UPGRADE (Aug '25): Works like a charm on my Google Pixel 9A as well.

everything is good..im so happy with the video quality ..but why when i go to media ..to check the video.. then i go back to camera recording.. but the image seem wash out.. then if i reset the camera settings..it turn back to normal.. so ..it will over n over again.. hope u can fix it .. im using xperia 1 iv
Fantastic! but would like to see more controls for livestream. Bitrates seem to max at 10Mb/s. the streamrouter on Blackmagic Cloud seems lilke it will be a good feature when its available.

I postponed the urge to update my S25 to Android 16 and One UI 8, but decided yo update after hearing BMC now supports LOG mode on that update. But now I'm missing optical stabilization and 8K recording option? Edit: there was a new update rolled out yesterday that says 8K option is back. But it's still nowhere to be found along with the optical stabilization.

Zebra guides overlay monitor is no longer working properly in the latest release for Android (3.1.0.0063) on my Xiaomi 14T device. Over or under exposed areas are no longer highlighted. Hope this issue could be fixed soon.
Green screen after last update. On my Xiaomi 13T I get a green screen on my regular lens setting. App has become unusable. Such a shame since I used it a lot as a backup camera.
Video stabilization and lens switching needs more improvement. But overall can maximize the video quality.
very nice and Best camera app if add more other option like pause recording and bit rate option between 12 to 24 also.
at first, this app takes great videos with LUTs. but after a while of using it, the videos taken with this app were just blank and green. nothing is shown but green

using this on a Samsung S23 which has a 8gen2 which is a fairly powerful processor despite that there's stutter in every footage. worst thing is stabilization doesn't work . doesn't let me lock iso and few other settings. please fix this , This app runs smoothly on mg old iPhone 12 , show some love to Androids too i would like a smooth experience just like on ios , Thanks :(

Finally, my 13T can use this, Thanks. Update Review 11/09/25, new update make screen green on main lens. Update 22/10/25 v3.1.1, The problem is still the same but I found a solution ‚Äî by enabling auto lens.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. We are very sorry about this. Please download version 3.1.1 of the app, the issue should now be resolved.

scraped_reviews.content: The app keeps crushing after the last update. Pixel 6. Re-install seems to help, but when I try to save the preset - the situation repeats. *P.S.: Auto A/E is a pain for user presets, really) ** Thanks for your work. Appreciate it.
"I'm recording in Open Gate at 2K, 3K, and 4K resolutions. Even though the video resolution is very high, I am seeing significant pixelation (blocky pixels) in the video. My device is a Pixel 6 Pro."

Recently, I have been facing a big issue using the app onto my Android system (Xiaomi 13t pro). the rear camera option 24mm is not working properly...when it is enabled the screen turns into fully green...I cannot use the 24mm camera... I've tried to fix it but it was useless.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. We are very sorry about this. Please download version 3.1.1 of the app, the issue should now be resolved.

scraped_reviews.content: no video log feature for the galaxy s24. the resolution is limited to 4k. this app is unsable with limited functionality. will have to use the samsung stock camera app.
it's almost perfect! please update and fix the stabilization in tele cam for xiaomi 15, because it doesn't work.

title: Booking.com: Hotels & Travel
description: Save on your next trip with the Booking.com app! Find great hotel or apartment deals and book in just a few minutes. You can also book flights, rental cars, and more through the app. - Book your whole trip in one app (accommodations, flights, car rentals, taxis and more) - Stay flexible with free cancellation (available at most properties) - 24/7 customer service in more than 40 languages - No booking or credit card fees - Chat directly with your property in the app - Enjoy mobile-only discounts - Use filters to easily find the perfect place out of millions of available accommodations (hotels, apartments, homes, villas, ryokai and more) - Get paperless confirmation of your reservation ‚Äî no printing required - Manage your bookings on the go, making changes whenever and wherever you want - Discover local attractions and make the most of your trip - Share your experience and get local advice on our Travel Communities forums Access millions of accommodations From cozy country homes to funky city apartments, find the perfect place out of millions of available accommodations. Our app offers hotels, apartments, hostels, vacation rentals, resorts, motels, guest houses, and bed and breakfasts. Quickly find the perfect place to stay Filter hotels by price, review score, WiFi quality, and other things important to you. Search cheap hotels by city, attraction, landmark, or hotel name. Special requests? Pet-friendly hotels? We have filters for everything. You can also compare your favorite accommodation options side by side to ensure you get the best price and quality. Deals for any budget Discover daily accommodation deals and save on your next hotel, apartment, or villa booking. Get exclusive mobile-only discounts of 10% or more on select properties when you book in the app. Savings available on motels and hostels, B&Bs and resorts, and luxury hotels, inns, homes, houses, apartments and vacation rentals. Find your ideal accommodation at an ideal price. Stay flexible with free cancellation Change of plans? Not a problem. You can cancel for free at most hotels, apartments and other properties on Booking.com. And the app makes things even easier ‚Äî it only takes a few taps to cancel, and you‚Äôre free to find a place that better suits your needs. Last-minute travel Heading somewhere in a hurry? With the app, you can quickly book hotels at the last minute (as well as far in advance). Finding a place in short order has never been easier. Our app allows you to search for properties nearby, fill in a few details, and secure your reservation. You can also change, cancel, or make additional reservations on the go. Jet off with the perfect flight Book domestic or international flights on the go with ease. The app allows you to search thousands of airfare deals per day. Plane tickets available for all major airlines and destinations. Hit the road with car rentals Car hire has recently been added to the app. Whether you just need a ride to explore your destination, or you‚Äôre going on an epic road trip, the Booking.com app can help. Rent a car from all the major companies and hit the road! Reserve taxis with ease Book in advance for a seamless connection from the airport to your destination. You can also book taxis to and from other pick-up points, such as hotels and local attractions. Find and book a great experience Whether you‚Äôre looking for attraction or museum tickets, boat tours, or walking tours, you can book experiences online in minutes, with free cancellation on many options. Get and share tips with other travelers Connect with fellow travelers, share your experiences, and get local advice on the best accommodations, attractions, and more. Discover new experiences with our app, the perfect trip planner.

scraped_reviews.content: I made a reservation for about 6K. In the confirmation email you sent, I saw a total price of 6K and also a payment amount of almost 12K, which wasn't clear to me. So, I tried to reach your customer service, waited more than 24 hours (as it was written in your automatic message), but no response. I didn't have a choice but to cancel my reservation. I guess it's time to move to another platform. Made a new reservation with Agoda (no strange amounts), and in the end, it was slightly cheaper.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we are sorry to hear that your experience was not satisfactory. We are always here to help and our Customer Service team is available 24/7. Please get in touch with us and we will be happy to assist you, and to look into this for you.

scraped_reviews.content: For years this has been our go-to app for travel. On the rare occasion we needed help we called and were satisfied. Now we get an AI assistant who cannot help. We booked months ago, paid in full and 1 week before arrival we were notified it is cancelled. Both parties say to contact the other regarding a refund. I tried to use the app to book an alternative and it won't let me because I've already booked those dates! AI may someday replace humans in these jobs, but it isn't up to it yet.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we are sorry to hear that your experience was not satisfactory. We are always here to help and our Customer Service team is available 24/7. Please get in touch with us and we will be happy to assist you, and to look into this for you.

scraped_reviews.content: We travel with dog. We've had repeated problems w BOOKING. Once we had to leave early after a day, since the hotel had not okayed the pet, although we had entered it in the booking form. Refund? Not a penny! This second time, I did not trust the app and called the hotel directly. Although I checked the box for pet, filled out the box "note to the hotel" asking for confirmation and extra price for pet AND sent an email, the desk told me they had not gotten anything. Guess no more BOOKING for me
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we are sorry to hear that your experience was not satisfactory. We are always here to help and our Customer Service team is available 24/7. Please get in touch with us and we will be happy to assist you. Kindly find our contact details by clicking on the ‚ÄòCustomer Service help‚Äô option in the menu of our app.

scraped_reviews.content: I've used this app for years. and today I booked a hotel, and I got an error when I went to pay. so I tired again, but it doubled booked me. wasted 1 hour trying to resolve it, but no one was helped and ending up paying $50 to cancel it when it was 100% the apps fault. title: Moodle
description:
This official app will ONLY work with Moodle sites that have been set up to allow it.  Please talk to your site administrator if you have any problems connecting.

If your site has been configured correctly, you can use this app to:

- Browse the content of your courses, even when offline
- Receive instant notifications of messages and other events
- Quickly find and contact other people in your courses
- Upload images, audio, videos and other files from your mobile device
- View your course grades
- and more!

Please see http://docs.moodle.org/en/Mobile_app for all the latest information.

We‚Äôd really appreciate your feedback on what else you want this app to do!

The app requires the following permissions:

- Record audio: For recording audio to upload to your site as part of a submission
- Read and modify the contents of your SD card: Contents are downloaded to the SD Card so you can see them offline
- Network access: To be able to connect with your site and check if you are connected or not to switch to offline mode
- Run at startup: So you receive local notifications even when the app is running in the background
- Prevent phone from sleeping: So you can receive push notifications anytime
descriptionHTML:
This official app will ONLY work with Moodle sites that have been set up to allow it. Please talk to your site administrator if you have any problems connecting.

If your site has been configured correctly, you can use this app to:

- Browse the content of your courses, even when offline
- Receive instant notifications of messages and other events
- Quickly find and contact other people in your courses
- Upload images, audio, videos and other files from your mobile device
- View your course grades
- and more!

Please see http://docs.moodle.org/en/Mobile_app for all the latest information.

We‚Äôd really appreciate your feedback on what else you want this app to do!

The app requires the following permissions:

- Record audio: For recording audio to upload to your site as part of a submission
- Read and modify the contents of your SD card: Contents are downloaded to the SD Card so you can see them offline
- Network access: To be able to connect with your site and check if you are connected or not to switch to offline mode
- Run at startup: So you receive local notifications even when the app is running in the background
- Prevent phone from sleeping: So you can receive push notifications anytime
summary: Access your online courses with the official Moodle mobile app

scraped_reviews.content: Since the last update it has lost all of it's convenience. You used to be able to choose whether to insert images from the camera or your file browser, now it redirects you to the file explorer every time. The UI has downgraded, looking like a worse version of the mobile website. The app has lost all of it's convenience over the mobile or desktop site.

Courses have to be downloaded before it can be accessed for learning and the size of each module is up to 100Mb plus. I don't think that is economical and memory friendly for mobile phone users. I think there should be options for streaming or playing the learning videos online and option to read it in text format as well as the download option and still keeping the App size lite.

its been a literal year and they still haven't fixed their "browser" last time they told me that it was an issue on my institutions side but it isn't. I can log in just fine on my cellphones browser; they still haven't fixed the loop on their app and I dont have the qr code thingy. I log in on their browser and it gets stuck on a "your session has timed out please sign in again" error everytime you log in. uninstalling and re installing doesnt work because somehow they remember the device

this app doesnt know how to notify user whenever there was a new content/assignment uploaded by the instructor. its so frustrating to miss an activity just because u didnt get any notification. also, pls do add auto refresh content! sometimes content doesnt automatically show even after opening a course/subject. improve notification system!!

the app is really nice, easy to use and access. I just wish that once I have gone through and finish that course that I'll be able to go over that course again without having to use my data subscription to access it again.

The app is great . Once I enroll to my courses ,they are already saved in my courses bar , therefore,do not have to enroll again. Moreover ,it is easy to add information, and to type work and post into my discussion forums. Great app.

it may be nice to have a app that tracks your work instead of logging into the internet everytime, it is slow like 4 seconds of a video every 5-10 minutes slow. considering that everything on here is a video it kinda sucks as a app. like what do you mean you can't load the thing your app was made for. please fix the legging in the app it makes learning Insufferable. and you also can't skip forward or backwards in a video of you try it restarts the videos.
The app is great. I especially like the reminder notification and the timeline section. Saves me a lot from missing deadlines/attendance. Hopefully the app doesn‚Äôt disappoint with continued use.
This app is great, easily accessible, it even has a reflective journal where you can reflect on what you've learnt, you can also communicate with other learners on the app. it's a great app

It's genuinely not a good app. Once started, it loads for several mimutes until all GUI elements and content is shown. It sends you calendar notifications by default instead of prompting your preference. If there is a full list of your courses somewhere, I was unable to find it. Anything you do within the app is painfully slow. I've reverted to using my mobile browser. On the upside, it is free.

I love the app, it allows me to take my classes on the go in a small device. Now, you guys fixed one problem with this app. The fix was running smoothly more almost a year until today. I had to uninstall and install and repeat. Still, I cannot login into my account, if I can connect on the website why can't the app work? Please, fix this, this app has made taking classes easy for me.

I love the app and I wonder why there isn't a single ad inside it? This is peak! I use this for my school account, to submit assignments and access modules from the course packs, thank you devs for creating this app.
It works well but does not send notifications until I open the app. i wish it could send me notifications of assignments towards due dates even if I haven't opened the app

As a student I like it, but it has so many flaws and lacks some features. For example, a feature to sync the assignments with Google calendar, or at least a widget to have the Moodle calendar on the launcher. Yeah, I like the fact that you get the notification, but sometimes I just want to know the assignments for the next week or month, but I have to open the app, wait for it to load (which takes a lot of time) and then go to calendar, it's so inconvenient.
The app is really great. once I enroll in my courses they are already saved in my course bar, therefore, do not have to enroll again. Great app
Fix the dammm notifications. I'm getting notifications for something that happened a week ago and was complete .
Great app. My only complaint is that some plugins redirect you to the browser, but that's not a huge deal in my eyes.

It is easy to access and to use it. Really fast and reliable. One if the best it helps keep track of assessments date and make sure you submit on time before the due date by setting a reminder to inform you a day before of assignments due date

This was actually a pretty decent app, and I would happily have given it 4 stars. That is, until I installed the update two days ago. Since then, each time I open the app I get the same message: "Error Access Control Exception". As a result it doesn't connect and I can't access my modules or anything else via the app.
This app makes it easier for us to find what we are looking for, reminds us about our assignments closing, and opening. It has everything that we want us students in an app.
ridiculously slow platform, both website and app formats. Calendar takes around half a minute to load everytime you open it even on 1000G/s connections.
very helpful and organized. the classes and reminders are usually automatically saved and the notification tab is very nice. Just make sure you know your school's http, that moodle asked for
I like having everything I need for classes in one place. Easy access to grades, submitting assignments, teacher notes, and feedback.
Sometimes, it doesn't give me a 100% score for completion even when I've opened, downloaded, and marked all activities as done.
The notification experience could improve. My phone always stops working notifications, especially when logging into new devices
the app is okay. you have to constantly close it down due to nothing ever loading properly on a phone. it only works if you use the website
this app does not contain my modules, it does not contain anything but a mere notification of uploading assignments. it's useless, don't download.

Good day, the app is nice and a great tool for students like me. It's just that the app buffers a lot, to the point that I have to wait for it to be okay. Another, it doesn't show notifications regarding the activities and other stuff our teachers are giving. The app crashes sometimes, forcing itself to close without notifying me. I hope you'll address this matter instantly because I believe that you can do better than this. Thanks!

The notification feature is useless. It reminds you very vaguely of stuff but you cant click on the notification to find out what it's actually notifying you of. You also seem to be unable to change the time before a deadline it reminds you, so if you forget and your assignment takes more than one hour, you're done for. Useless! Please fix this!

very user friendly. I'm using this app for submitting my assignment (UNISA) and I do not struggle to navigate through the app. cherry on top?! even when I have ran out of data or don't have wifi access I'm still able to use the app. No disturbing ads‚ù§Ô∏è‚ú®
When I'm unable to upload work on the schools website directly, moodle always comes in clutch. It's easy to navigate and saves me from constantly having to log in and out.
I'm happy about this app. The only problem I have with it is that it doesn't sends notifications even though I'm offline informing me that I have an open assessment, etc.. thank you
Can't configure or edit any activity, the app is just for viewing/consumption, if you're a professor you won't be able to edit anything.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, The Moodle App focused on empowering your students to collaborate with and learn from their devices. Teachers can do some things using the app, like being able to grade an assignment submission, review user grades and reports, adding notes, ... Regards, Moodle Apps Team

scraped_reviews.content: A great academic app, interface is quite confusing for newbies but along the road, you'll get used to it. Overall experience is great.
This application is very easy to use and easy to access quickly. No need to go to Google to visit the school website which is sometimes down and slow.

The app is interesting. I recommend it to any student to try and prove me. It is fast, accessible, reliable and lots of good experience. What I'd like is upgrading it to be able to add photos to my assignment. Of course i could upload files, but there are time I'll need to add a photo to the middle of my assignment. I'll like to have this. But the app is better than others in terms of accessing my courses.

I can't even open files anymore. It crashes pretty much constantly and the arrow in the top left corner to go back to the previous page is just fake and not working. Overall one of the worst apps I have on my phone. To be fair I would use anything else if it weren't that I'm forced by my university to use this garbage app. Please do something about it.

I have been working with all kinds of academic applications, from Classroom to Teams. And by far, this is the worst of them all. Confusing interface, assignments that don‚Äôt get sent, it never sends notifications, you can't edit submissions. It has the worst aspects of every app. Zero intuitiveness. Simply a torment filled with frustrations. This platform cost me a lot of grades

Notification comes very much late. I've already done my assignment before the due dates, and then I got a panic attack from late notifications announcing due dates of my final exam. This app also didn't appear in sharing option, making it very difficult to put my files into it and I have to search through my phone's storage since it didn't come appear on the recent.
Worst app. When I try to login with my gmail id, it says "you must change your password" and when i enter my current password, it says invalid login

I like the way you can save files from within the course. There are a lot of problems tho. I would recommend fixing your app, it takes very long times for the app to load and show all the courses from the dashboard. The website takes a lot less to load. When you create an app, you want people to dowload it so they can access their things faster not slower. Please work on your loading speed, or maybe just have a function to dowload the list of courses and have it there, I dont need refreshes.
Moodle is a nice learning app and is user friendly. I can study at anytime,write tests online, and review lectures any time.

Awful experience, you can't upload files only if they are from media, that meaning photos and videos and sometimes not even that(I checked my app permissions in the settings)... Really lagging sometimes, buggy in general, files from the app don't always open or work, you can be downloading corrupted files one minute, and from the same source, downloading the right files another time... Absolutely hate this app
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we are very sorry to hear that. Could you contact us at mobile@moodle.com? It would be great if you could provide more information on your issue (please add screenshots) and the site address (URL) of your Moodle site. Kind regards, The Moodle Apps Team

scraped_reviews.content: it's an easier way to excess content and recieve it by scrolling through a lesson plan or re checking calendar dates for upcoming assessments, scheduled uploads and deadlines.

Pretty useful app, allows you to access all the resources on the site. Main drawback is the high loading time of almost every screen. I would like to have a quick access to page of favorite courses, also caching the courses list would make access faster. Also, an option to display list as a list and not cards to fit more on screen. Overall useful when you need to check some detail or submit an assignment from the phone.

The way you navigate on the app and on the browser is so confusing. To be able to change my email address, I have to go to the browser version, and when I do change my email, the confirmation that they would send takes ages to arrive. Plus, sometimes, activities cannot be accessed and we don't know why as there are no signs or messages that tell us why it's happening. Overall, I hope the developers fixes a lot of bugs in the system, as a lot students rely on this app for their education.

My review got deleted so here we go again. This Moodle app is horrible. I log in and the layout is worse than on desktop site. There are barely any themes, colors or even effort put into this app + website. Every picture is blank and has an error sign on it. You can't even answer questions in assignments because of this issue. On my iPad & other phone, it has the same problem. I'd rather stick with Moodle on my laptop than use the mobile app. Even then, it's still trash. Sorry not sorry! üòÅ
easy to navigate. ever since I started using it i have never been stressed with Unisa system being down.

I only downloaded this a few days ago. Looking at the layout and how you can download courses, I thought, great, this will make life easier. NOPE!! Every time I try to click on a video/audio for a lecture it says I'm either not connected to WiFi or I don't have access to this content and need to log in when I'm already logged in. Technology is getting worse......
It's great to have this tool available from my phone. My one complaint is that it doesn't automatically open to the spot I was last.

title: IDW Digital Comics Experience
description:
IDW Publishing is the home of world-renowned comic book and graphic novel storytelling!

We publish best-selling original series including Joe Hill and Gabriel Rodr√≠guez's Locke & Key, Stan Sakai's Usagi Yojimbo, and Walter Simonson‚Äôs Ragnar√∂k. 

IDWP's critically acclaimed Top Shelf Productions imprint publishes works of visionary artistry, literary sophistication, and personal resonance, including George Takei's They Called Us Enemy and the New York Times best-selling March by Congressman John Lewis, Andrew Aydin, and Nate Powell.  

- Preview these titles and thousands more!
- New releases every week!
- Save money with carefully curated comic and book bundles!
- Discover new stories with a selection of free comics and books recommended by IDW!
- Read your collection at your leisure by using the new state-of-the-art app reader!  

Get started with your IDW Publishing adventure today!
descriptionHTML:
IDW Publishing is the home of world-renowned comic book and graphic novel storytelling!

We publish best-selling original series including Joe Hill and Gabriel Rodr√≠guez's Locke & Key, Stan Sakai's Usagi Yojimbo, and Walter Simonson‚Äôs Ragnar√∂k.

IDWP's critically acclaimed Top Shelf Productions imprint publishes works of visionary artistry, literary sophistication, and personal resonance, including George Takei's They Called Us Enemy and the New York Times best-selling March by Congressman John Lewis, Andrew Aydin, and Nate Powell.

- Preview these titles and thousands more!

scraped_reviews.content: The search experience is kinda awkward, and downloading the comics is a bit messy because sometimes it'll just cancel, or it can forget you even downloaded in the first place. The image quality is a bit low but I think it's because they allow you to screenshot, so they don't want you reposting the full quality. Overall it's alright.

For a long time this app was nonfunctional for me: the shop wouldn't show new releases, and it wouldn't let me buy any comics at all. That seems to have been fixed, but with the new version the quality of the comic pages has been cranked waaaaay down and they look awful. If you're selling comics, the most important thing is for them to look good! I cannot recommend this app.

Would be a 5 star if not for one major issue. I had to purchase a comic TWICE! I purchased Sonic volume 1 and started to read without downloading the comic. I had to go do something mid read so I closed the app. When I opened the app again there is no option anywhere to read the comic. The only thing I could tap on was the purchase button. There isn't a "My purchases" or anything like that. So I purchased it a second time and downloaded it this time. I was, however, robbed of $10.

Some of my old purchases didn't transfer over immediately but customer service was really helpful about getting it fixed and they're all there now. Overall I like the interface a lot better than the old app, especially the book reader. The only real gripe I have with it is the way books are haphazardly sorted in your collection. Otherwise, vast improvement!

App barely functions. Cannot access any new comic book series. Screen freezes every time. Edit 12/6. Literally cannot buy any comics. Error message saying "cannot be found." On top of this, my account can't sync to the website any longer and I've lost around 100 digitally purchased comics. I've reached out to idw and have no gotten a response. Absolutely ridiculous.

I've waited and walked through the app for a few months before I could give my opinion. While it is nice and has similar features to the previous one, this has it's own loading issues and can slow down sometimes. Not sure if it is cause of my previous data being moved over or the app is just slow. Either way, it serves well, I just would like the comics post in the day of release that it says instead of lagging on another week before I can actually purchase it.

While this is a decent reader, the store experience over the months has continued to be miserable with a number of bugs, terrible navigation, and numerous instances where a series I would like to read just wouldn't display. Like, sure, I'd love to give you money to read more comic. Too bad it won't display the issues or show releases as recently as the web store showed. I might as well stop reading these and go read fan-made material again.

The IDW app needs wishlisting and offline comic viewing before I spend any additional money. As someone new to comics their store is also confusing to me. Are "books" bundles of the individual "volumes" listed below them? There's no information to specify and I still have the buy option on individual volumes after purchasing a book. Their search function is also not very context aware and may not show all the relevant results you want. "TMNT" will display different results then "Ninja Turtles".

As good as IDW comic books are, this app does them no favors. My Books has no organization features, comics are jumbled up together no matter the series or number. Once I've loaded the book I want to read there's no zoom, no rotation, it's just the full comic page on my phone. Makes it very difficult to read the small lettering of comics. IDW, please add organization and navigation features to your app so I can actually read your great comics.
When reading comics without downloading it takes forever to load a page. When I download a comic it can't be read at all. I granted the app all permissions.
impossible to download anything above 30 pages, either fails, crashes or both at the same time.

Sadly, this app is fundamentally broken. I try to open a comic in the shop, it shows me half the cover and that's it. I look up a comic, it says it's free and does the same as for the comics on the main page of the shop. Only thing that works if I look at the free comics from the "My books" page, which is missing the comics I bought in the previous app around 3 years ago.

Man I don't understand why it's so horrible. Search function barely works, things don't load, go to buy an issue and it says the item cannot be found. I can't even use their website either because the purchase buttons don't work. It's like I have to fight with the app every time I want to read a new issue and it's just a horrible user experience all around.

App has a lot of problems. I haven't successfully been able to find a comic I was looking for on here once yet, I always end up having to buy them through the browser store. The only reason I have the app at all is because it seems to be the only place you can read your purchased comics. Even then, for some reason IDW seems to be the last digital storefront to get their own comics, and when they finally do get them, it can take up to two days after purchasing for your comics to actually appear.

The reader sucks. Can't scroll through the comic, so if your reading a big book you need to flip page by page. Download option is crummy. If youve downloaded a book you still need to open it again while in Internet or else it won't open. And there's no special views, like panel by panel. If let's you flip pages verticality or horizontally, but if your going single page view anyway, Who cares? I downloaded the same comic on google play books and the experience is much better

I recently downloaded this app so I could read comics without having to go to a physical store. It doesn't help if it won't let me sign in though. I followed the steps to make an account, then when I went into the app, it refused to let me in. It claimed the password I just typed in was wrong, when I set it less than a minute ago. I hope they fix this soon.

I have spent hundreds of dollars on a huge catalogue of transformers comics I bought on previous app & now they are all gone. I have tried to use the app features to get them back but no use. Gutted about this. I bought these comics digitally so I could always have them regardless where I was. Didn't really work out did it!

Comixology is dead (or as good as dead) :( I only read Sonic & TMNT comics (digitally) these days. With a few tweaks to make new & old issues easier to find + price drops after a few weeks, this would be a very interesting new option for me. (2 stars, mostly because I have not yet seen what the actual reading experience is like. Also could not find recent TMNT issues at all!)

Absolutely awful. Doesn't show which books have been read (or any progress). Can only flip through blank pages (no way to jump to a page). No option to download locally (so, can't read offline). Image quality isn't great. Prices jacked up inside the app.

Not good... painfully slow, the home page has a bad lag, and my books page never populates right away and takes 5 min or more to show all the books in my account. It doesn't seem like there is anybody working hard enough on improving the app. It's been months like this, no change so far.

This app is garbage. The search is almost useless. Can't read in landscape mode, books are blurry if you zoom in. No library organization. Unresponsive support. No option to download for offline reading. Many titles won't load, to read, or purchase. Terrible.

Garbage. My old books from the Transformers app aren't showing up in any capacity. There's no sign of them anywhere in "my books" or in the store. When I use the search bar, I'm met with a blank screen. I've contacted customer support, so we'll see how that goes. Edit: Looks like they're being sold outside the app. I still don't have the option to download them from the cloud though, so the Play Store thinks I haven't bought them.

Thanks for letting me know there was a new app each time I booted up the old one and it didn't work. It's was really easy to confirm whether your servers were online or not. What I like about this one so far is that my purchases are now gone so I can buy everything again! I'm not salty, I'm livid!

1. it doesn't tell me what books are in a given volume 2. could you add a bookmark/save feature for stuff we want to buy in the future 3. could you let us look at the first few pages to check that it's actually what we want

Love the app and reading all of the comic series on there. My only problem is it takes such a long time for new ones to come out. Two Sonic ones that were supposed to come out in February and March are still not available to read. Just needs to keep up to schedule.

Just make a subscription service. I'd pay $10 upwards to $20 a month for it rather than paying for each issue individually. I'm behind and it'd be easier to just not worry about buying them when I could subscribe monthly.

The issue regarding not being able to buy any new comics has been resolved and I am once again, very satisfied with this app. A few bucks for comics is a steal and although not being able to download them due to DRM-related issues is unfortunate, I'm still glad I can read these comics. Excellent!

Very basic. Missing most of the features I would expect from a comic viewer to the point where it is a pain to use. Seems more like an alpha build. I get that it was developed in a hurry, but it just isn't up to public release standard.

I made an account on my computer browser and for some reason it keeps saying I need to reset my password on the app and I reset my password a few times and it's still won't let me log on. I'm not having issues on chrome just the app on my phone and it's updated.

well at first kept getting the no user advice point the website and app both seem to have different login credentials so you need to make one via the app so far app seems pretty nice beyond the getting it setup hiccups deff worth checking out and few free comics to get you started

I enjoy reading on the app, but I have a problem. I recently redownload the app and I typed in my email, and it said bnb i had to recent my password, but I didnt get the email to change it. I did this 4-5 times and it still won't show up, so all the comics I bought are stuck, and I can't get to my account.

Not only have my numerous purchases of .pdf digital comics been revoked in favor of forcing me to use their online app to read them over the web instead... but my purchases don't even show up in the app anyways, so my comics have just been stolen outright! Never buy from this company.
Really poor interface, series incorrectly labelled as free when they're not. Going back from a search takes you straight back to the start menu. Come on people, get this app sorted.

Terrible experience. This app was supposed to be updated and transitioned to the new IDW ages ago, but it seems *nobody* is working on it. The UI is worse than before. Page tools & reading functions are broken. Store searches in app come up with either no results, or incorrect ones. @IDW - how can you, as a respected publisher with an extensive, quality catalogue, be so utterly neglecting customers and content like this? It's baffling. You're losing business, and hurting your brand. Fix it pls.

*I put a bad review up for this app earlier becuase I was missing my purchases. I contacted support and everything is fixed now! *lowering my review again, tbh this app makes it to hard to find and buy things, I feel like its a constant struggle when all I want to do is give them my money!

I wonder what it will take for IDW to actually fix this app. At some point enough users will get annoyed about the fact they are not being provided the service for which they paid, someone will speak to a lawyer who knows about breach of contract, and people will start saying phrases like "class action lawsuit". I hope it doesn't come to that.

Do not download if you enjoy comics. Recent update wiped my collection of comics that I had bought over the years. I had quite the Gi Joe collection and now they're all gone and I'm genuinely upset. Look elsewhere for a comic book app.
Appreciate the offline downloads feature. But now there are frequent crashes and very slow loading times.
The main page is quite laggy and in the reader the help page doesn't work. The reader is also very bad.

After the update the app is TERRIBLE, it used to be simple and easy to navigate. but now? I can't find anything, the search option barley even works and shows me everything but the thing I searched for
Nah, I already own IDW comics and I don't want to buy them again. You should make a way for me to unlock comics I already have or a subscription service. This app is useless otherwise.

I love this app because I know I love Sonic the hedgehog comics book but I didn't know where I buy them digitally but now I will used app to buy them. It give a lot old comics book for good price and not breaking your funds or your wallet.
Can't log in to my old account from the previous app and thus can't access all those purchases. Tried contacting support to no avail. I just wanna read my comics, man :/
It was working normally for me, until recently none of the new comics have been working. It's been stuck with coming soon when I know they've been available.

If you want a of simulation of someone coming round your house and taking all your comics then leaving behind five new comics that you never asked for and not responding to any messages you send asking for your comics back, then by all means, use IDW .

What's the point in the app and are you are going to update the app... When exactly? A comic App that doesn't ever release new tiles. Just keeps them coming soon. They should either update or put there money into something else or shut down the app
Edit, 01/02/2024 Changed to 3 stars, I sent an email for help. They had me make a new account and applied my $10 purchase of Rise TMNT comics to it. So far, no issues with this.
It doesn't work. It's probably certain devices that work but having the application crash when you want to search for something is not good
Doesn't work properly on Chrome OS at all. No Windows app. No web app. There seems to be no way for me to actually read my books on a screen larger than a phone. How is this OK?
Bought a ton of comics on this app a few years ago. Now trying to access them again and I cant log in, everything is gone.

title: The Weather Channel - Radar
description:
The Weather Channel is the World's Most Accurate Forecaster*. Prepare for rain, hurricane, and allergy season with our local rain radar and real-time notifications to keep you informed and safe. Get the latest forecasts alongside storm and hurricane tracker features that help prepare for storms and heavy rain. Get storm warnings and severe weather alerts for rain, snow, and more. The Weather Channel provides everything you need to stay one step ahead ‚Äì real-time alerts, 24-hour future radar, hourly rain tracker, storm radar news, and local weather forecast.

Get live hurricane maps, rain radar updates, accurate local weather alerts, allergy tracker, and activities forecasts in a complete weather app. Get severe weather alerts for heavy rain, snow and more thanks to reliable storm radar features. The Weather Channel provides seamless hurricane preparedness with weather alerts and your very own local forecast for even the most severe weather.

Our daily forecast tracker provides up-to-date precipitation info so you can plan confidently. Enjoy an up to 15-day forecast from the world‚Äôs most accurate weather forecaster*. Monitor our air quality index to stay updated during this allergy season. Our live Doppler radar updates your weather widget and alerts you to forecast changes right on your home screen. Local weather maps provide live rain radar readings, storm radar alerts, and hurricane warnings, and more to help you face whatever the clouds may bring.

The Weather Channel Features:

Weather Tracker & Storm Radar:
- Rain radar & storm tracker
- Allergy tracker
- 24-Hour Future Radar
- Storm radar alerts keep you informed
- Rain or shine ‚Äì our local weather radar & weather alerts helps plan outdoor activities with ease
- Adjust today‚Äôs outfit with the ‚ÄòFeels Like‚Äô feature
- Forecast updates hourly & daily so you can confidently plan ahead

Severe Weather Features:
- Live radar & weather alerts let you follow weather patterns
- Hurricane maps help track incoming storms and severe weather
- Get a storm radar and local weather alerts for rain, snow, and other inclement weather conditions
- Forecast alerts for the next 3 hours ‚Äì available right on your home screen

Additional Features:
- Weather widget & features compatible with dark mode
- Forecast details with sunset times, allergies, & pollen
- Monitor our air quality index
- Get the latest local weather news

---
Get The Weather Channel Premium for our most comprehensive, dynamic, and precise weather experience for exclusive access to:
- Ad-free weather 
- 15-minute forecast details
- Advanced radar
- & more!

Privacy & Feedback
- Our Privacy Policy can be viewed here: https://weather.com/en-US/twc/privacy-policy
- Our Terms of Use can be viewed here:http://www.weather.com/common/home/legal.html
- If you have any questions or suggestions, please get in touch at android.support@weather.com

*The Weather Channel is the World's Most Accurate Forecaster. According ForecastWatch, Global and Regional Weather Forecast Accuracy Overview, 2021-2024, https://forecastwatch.com/AccuracyOverview2021-2024, commissioned by The Weather Company.

**The Weather Channel is the Most Trusted News Source In America. 
According to a YouGov 2024 Trust in Media poll: https://today.yougov.com/politics/articles/49552-trust-in-media-2024-which-news-outlets-americans-trust

***The World's Leading Weather Provider: According to Comscore, The Weather Company, parent of The Weather Channel, is the largest provider of weather forecasts worldwide based on total monthly unique visitors in 2020. Comscore Media Metrix¬Æ, Worldwide Rollup Media Trend, News/Information ‚Äì Weather category incl. [P] Weather Company, The and [M] Weather Channel, The, Jan-Dec. 2020 avg.
descriptionHTML:
The Weather Channel is the World's Most Accurate Forecaster*. Prepare for rain, hurricane, and allergy season with our local rain radar and real-time notifications to keep you informed and safe. Get the latest forecasts alongside storm and hurricane tracker features that help prepare for storms and heavy rain. Get storm warnings and severe weather alerts for rain, snow, and more. The Weather Channel provides everything you need to stay one step ahead ‚Äì real-time alerts, 24-hour future radar, hourly rain tracker, storm radar news, and local weather forecast.

Get live hurricane maps, rain radar updates, accurate local weather alerts, allergy tracker, and activities forecasts in a complete weather app. Get severe weather alerts for heavy rain, snow and more thanks to reliable storm radar features. The Weather Channel provides seamless hurricane preparedness with weather alerts and your very own local forecast for even the most severe weather.

Our daily forecast tracker provides up-to-date precipitation info so you can plan confidently. Enjoy an up to 15-day forecast from the world‚Äôs most accurate weather forecaster*. Monitor our air quality index to stay updated during this allergy season. Our live Doppler radar updates your weather widget and alerts you to forecast changes right on your home screen. Local weather maps provide live rain radar readings, storm radar alerts, and hurricane warnings, and more to help you face whatever the clouds may bring.

The Weather Channel Features:

Weather Tracker & Storm Radar:
- Rain radar & storm tracker
- Allergy tracker
- 24-Hour Future Radar
- Storm radar alerts keep you informed
- Rain or shine ‚Äì our local weather radar & weather alerts helps plan outdoor activities with ease
- Adjust today‚Äôs outfit with the ‚ÄòFeels Like‚Äô feature
- Forecast updates hourly & daily so you can confidently plan ahead

Severe Weather Features:
- Live radar & weather alerts let you follow weather patterns
- Hurricane maps help track incoming storms and severe weather
- Get a storm radar and local weather alerts for rain, snow, and other inclement weather conditions
- Forecast alerts for the next 3 hours ‚Äì available right on your home screen

Additional Features:
- Weather widget & features compatible with dark mode
- Forecast details with sunset times, allergies, & pollen
- Monitor our air quality index
- Get the latest local weather news
