summary: Prepare for severe weather with notifications, future radar, and live alerts.

scraped_reviews.content: Ugh. I used to like this app, but ever since they "updated" it, it no longer has an accurate default location. My neighborhood has its own weather location, but I cannot set the app to use this as the default, and it won't update the "current location" to my neighborhood when I'm near home. Instead, I get the forecast and weather alerts for the city proper, which is 30 miles south and often dramatically different. I keep waiting to see if they'll fix it, but I'm about to give up.

App used to load quickly with no issues, for the last few months it's slow to load and today, won't load at all. I even tried installing again, but won't load. I was considering the paid version, but not after the problems I'm incurring. The forecast is often inaccurate and unreliable. Temperatures can be up to 10 degrees off, especially in the fall, winter & spring. Radar will show rain where it's not raining, it's up to 10-15 miles off. Lately I've been using another app instead. DISAPPOINTED

EDIT: They tried to sneak this in, but now they sell your location data to advertisers. I wouldn't have known about it unless MY PHONE told me. The app is unusable now unless you pay to get rid of ads. I don't mind a little banner ad at the bottom, but a full screen pop up ad that can't be closed for 10 seconds? That's a deal breaker for me. It's a shame because it really is a great weather app, but I just can't stand it anymore.

Terrible. This was a perfect weather app. Good information in a streamlined user interface. Now, it's so overloaded with ads and cumbersome to navigate. Too much clicking between day/night instead of the day/night on one page, can't easily scroll between the days. They're is barely enough weather info, we're supposed to get 1-2in of snow tonight, there's no accumulation amount! Please go back to how it was!

Suddenly, this app no longer keeps the temperature up to date in the widget, the notifications bar, or the lock screen. Worse, most of the time, the loading circles just keep spinning as you open the app and you can't even get the weather from there. I've tried everything from clearing the cache, force stopping, restarting my phone, uninstalling. Upon reinstall, it couldn't even get through the point where you told it you wanted to track, even "current location."

The updated app is terrible. It logs me out every day. I had to start a new account because it wouldn't let me use the previous one. There used to be specific notifications you could stop and now you either get them all or none. If you select to block notifications all together, it doesn't allow the ongoing temp. When I look up the weather for another city it doesn't go back to my current location. I have to remember to manually do it. It used to automatically go back.

Notifications don't stop even when turned off. At first I turned onbthr ones I thought would be useful. Don't do that unless you're okay with notifications every few minutes. Now I only have government issued alerts turned on and I'm still constantly getting ridiculous notifications for things like "what to do with your wrapping paper after Christmas". Not even weather related. Too invasive. Uninstalled.

Any time I look at anything on the app, I have to wait for an ad. With all the other available free weather apps that come with my phone, it's crazy how this thinks it will last with ads. Seriously, I can't check the hourly then the weekly without an ad. If I go back too, it will run another ad. Also I can't click more then one day without it bugging out and getting stuck on that day

The Weather Channel app used to be a solid choice to quickly look at the weather and upcoming forecasts. Lately, every time something new gets added, so do even more ads. This app feels like it's more ad than weather. There's too many other free weather apps that don't force you to watch ads to see what the temperature will be, this one isn't worth it anymore.

too many notifications about weather in other areas unrelated to me, i did not have any of the locations i was getting notifications from saved in my phone. i tried to turn them off, but it didn't work. edit: i already did that before i made the review. It did NOT work. went to the profile and turned off all notifications related to news from different areas, i also downloaded the app recently, so i only had my current location set. i know how to change my settings, thank you. üòë
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi again. Sorry that this wasn't useful to you. We do occasionally have users asking how to turn off all their notifications. I just wanted to make sure you'd taken that step first. In order to get more specific help, you can reach out to customer service: android.support@weather.com. Case volumes are high and your patience is appreciated.

scraped_reviews.content: I'm very frustrated. The ongoing notifications suddenly isn't working. It disappears in my notification bar, and then when I swipe down it's 2 lines and no description of the weather for the day. I have un-installed and reinstalled the app 2x and checked settings and things still aren't working right. I loved this app but this is driving me insane and there are WAY too many ads. Ads are already all over the internet. When you want to check the weather, that's all you want to do. Keep it simple.

Edit: I've deleted the app and going with another, more reliable after some research. I'll miss the videos, but that's it. After 15 years of using this app, I'm finally parting. The loss of consistent live temp reads, constant log outs, the type/amount of ads, not seeing as many vids of more localized weather forecasts, but also this review (and what I had originally typed) being up for a week and not seeing any improvements, did it for me(most apps take a couple days to improve).

Widget picture looks much too 'cartoony.' Plus, there seems to be no option to make the background clear. I have always used the Samsung version of this widget. However, with the update last week, the font was so small that I couldn't read the temp. Once opened, the redesign of the app is nice, but it takes some time to find things. It just doesn't seem as straightforward as before. That being said, I DO love that the wind speed is shown immediately with the temp! Clear background for widget!

Used to be a fairly decent app until the "facelift". Now plays the same annoying 15 sec add for Dunkin Donuts in between each and every video with no option to skip, and for over a year now. Also, although I have "Imperial" selected for measurements under Settings, I get results in "Metric" values for wind speed, etc. Very annoying, am uninstalling.

The new update is not showing Snow "Amounts"! All we seem to be getting anymore this season is rain, not seeing snow. You used to show totals for rain as well as snow, and this is the only app that I could trust for exact SNOW TOTALS which is crucial to us. How do I know now if you're still showing that or not since there's no more rain totals?? I pay $5.30 a month for this. Also 100% agree with the other reviews in here as well. PLEASE don't try to be like the other fancy apps!!!!! üôè

This app sucks! I just want to check the weather. It makes the ads hard to click away and won't load the weather. *Updated to say that is l it shows me temu ads that are made to look like something nasty and I keep clicking the things to say to stop showing me the ad and it says it will but then the same exact ad shows up immediately, over and over. I'm going to uninstall if it keeps up.

it gives accurate weather readings, although I wish it would tell me more for example, my old weather app would tell me readings for the next day during certain times of the day not just morning or night. I also wish it would tell me the moon cycle so I don't have to look it up every time. But I'm not trying to be nitpicky here, it's definitely a great weather app.

the app is nice and easy to navigate. and the widgets are nice too... when they work properly. the forecast and radar widget I use has been stuck loading for over a week straight. and I sometimes get random weather notifications for completely random locations around the world, most recently being Santa Damingo, Dominican Republic. but these issues only happen once every year or couple of months. the app is still great.

New app is terrible. Not user friendly. Loved the other version. Giving it two stars because you can still get weather, but much more difficult to navigate. Many spam ads which, pop-up and indicate problems with other apps or operating systems. If you are unfamiliar with these type spam ads, you will be deceived into downloading apps that you do not need; nor able to trust.

Terrible app now that they removed the ability to configure notifications and changed the format of the radar map. I have tried turning off notifications for everything that is not local to me, but I keep getting irrelevant notifications such as "it's been dry, you may want to wash your car." These come during the night. I want WEATHER notifications in the night in case if storms. The radar used to allow you to see forward for 12 hours, and now it just goes for about an hour. Fix it!!!!!!!

THIS APP LIES!!! It shows incorrect temperatures all the time. It is 35 degrees right now, app still says the low today is 41 despite it also reporting that it is currently 35. We had a freeze two nights ago, app failed to notice it, claiming it was 38 instead. This is unacceptable!!! This app has declined in quality so badly, it is no longer usable. Users are forced to pay more and more to remove ads and see more results, only to be given incorrect and false temperatures and forecasts. F off!!!

I used this app for years because it was easy to understand and read. I've always used the 4x2 widget, and now I can barely see it. When I increase the text and font in my phone's settings, it cuts the lettering out. The daily forecast and hourly forecast sucks. It shows lines with dots, which I hated on other weather apps, and was the reason I've only used this app for weather. The font is small in the widget and it makes it hard to read. This app reminds me of the one that came with my phone.

I CAN NOT RECOMMEND THIS APP. . DESIGNED TOTALLY FOR CLICK BAIT ! ! ! . The new design makes it hard to read some of the fonts. The icons are so small that you can not tell if it is snowing, raining, etc. It is hard to find the information you want. The navigation is not intuitive. Does not make sense. If you want concise weather information, I recommend Google Weather.

Enshittified: 1. Daily forecast on the Forecast & Map widget doesn't match daily forecast in the app! Which one is correct?! 2. Tapping either side of the Forecast & Map widget always takes me to the radar page. 3. If it's after midnight and I view the Daily forecast page, the days in the top portion don't match the descriptions in the bottom portion. 4. Receive multiple notifications for the same weather alert. They always say Update, but there's no update. They're same as first notification.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for taking the time to provide feedback, Adam! Regarding the widget not updating/following your current location ‚Äì can you check what location setting you have selected? For the app to provide updated info while note in use, it's best to select "Allow all the time" in your device settings. android.support@weather.com if you need more help.

scraped_reviews.content: I miss the old weather channel format. The new format covers some weather events, but not many. Limited coverage about the flooded villages in Alaska. App is constantly asking to rate and upgrade to a premium plan. And the commercials that are as long or longer than the video clip. and there's a commercial or 2 on every clip. The radar is top notch, though.

Used to love the app, now not so much. It used to display different levels of severity for inclement weather, and hail is an important one for me. I can no longer see if hail is possible, only if a thunderstorm is happening or not. I feel the level of detail the app used to provide has been diminished, and a lot of other free features put behind a paywall. Not a big fan of this happening.

I agree with everyone else - after the update, all my locations were removed plus ads are ridiculous. Now to have anything saved, you need an account. I'm not sure why weather Channel went this route. It seems like they are selling out instead of wanting to provide a good app. I also used this for years and years, loving it before this update to the "new" one. It's horrible. I hate to leave but I have to.

The widgets are very poorly designed and implemented. Three of them are broken, either overlapping with other widgets because they extend beyond their frame, or content is cut off inside the widget so you can't see it. I also don't like that most widgets show the time...all phones have a clock already so this puts 2 clocks on my home screen. All of this makes most of the widgets unusable for me, which is the main reason I wanted to try the app.

No matter how many times I uninstall and reinstall, the app doesn't function properly. The widget doesn't display the temperature, it instead partially displays the words "units of measurement." Also, the ongoing temperature display in status bar will not show up and yes, I have repeatedly gone through the necessary steps in the app settings to setup this feature. I used to actually be impressed by this app but over the years it has become nothing more than a disappointment.

The free version is loaded with ads. If you're not willing to pay 30. A years get ready for some major ads. Some will even make you have to exit the ap to get out of them. Back in January 2025, I decided to go with the paid version. this was definitely a mistake. 75% of the time when I click on the app, nothing comes up, or it's just the logo. I have to back out of the app and attempt again. waste of money! My one-star review stands firm! Never again

Needs more ads, there just are not enough of them.... Contains ads in the app and also full screen ads. To get rid of them you have to pay a rental fee of $10 every year. It is $30 yearly to get all features. There are other weather apps that are just as good or better that are less expensive. It is pretty accurate and I like the way information is presented. It is a battery hog--the worst weather app I have for high battery usage.

I had previously had an issue with staying signed in, and gave only two stars. The issue was resolved very quickly and the developer communicated with me regarding fixing the issue!! Five stars again!! Thank you!! Update:6/10/25 Back to the same stuff, not staying signed in and not being able to sign in at all sometimes. DO NOT pay for yearly subscription!! Too many continuous issues. They get resolved quickly, but keep happening.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your patience as we worked on the logout issue. Please try updating your app to the latest version (14.20+). We believe the problem has been resolved, and look forward to providing you with a better app experience. If you find you're still getting logged out, please let us know.

scraped_reviews.content: I like the widget itself. However when you click it, the app/website has gotten really bad. On Android it's 70%+ ads. Honestly, no exaggeration. Sometimes I can't find or see the weather data because it's hidden by ads. Wish I could attach a screenshot: ad banner on top, small horizontal daily weather with limited data, 1 sentence summary of weather, large ad taking up 50%+ of screen, navigation on bottom. This app used to be the best, and the data is still good... if you can find it.

This app used to be excellent, fairly accurate with weather, would notify you of tornado warnings with sounds and pop-up alerts plus would load quickly when you open it. Over the past couple of months, I've noticed a decline in app function. half the time, it won't even load at all. If it does load,it takes forever to open. Then there's ads, I get apps need to make money but to many ads I dont have the patience for and the fact I dont get the pop-up warnings during a severe weather alert sucks.

Horrible APP, perhaps the worst weather app there is! If you are looking for weather information, but really want to just be bombarded with advertising, and more, advertising, and more.. you get the picture. Less than half the page is content, the rest is ADVERTISING. They should change the name to the AD Channel.

Update 06/28/25. It's been almost 4mos and the 5x3 widget continues to be 5x1.5 and never goes to current location when traveling. Agree with all reviews complaining about the new look. Changing units used to be 2 taps away. Now it's 5. The forecast widget with the radar doesn't work well. It also shrunk and cannot be modified. It doesn't even show the temperature, just the time of day and the weather symbol. Sometimes it shows code snippets. Doesn't let you choose 'Current location' anymore.

I've always liked this app until recently. When I open the app it keeps trying to load and usually crashes or it freezes my screen. It won't keep the current location weather displayed. If I sign in, it crashes. If I try to toggle the always on display on, a text box appears saying it is on, yet the button is still off. Eventually it crashes. I don't know if this due to a Samsung update or the app itself. Either way, it needs to be fixed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Amy. We're so sorry for the inconvenience you have experienced. The app wasn't loading for some users yesterday among other issues but we have fixed it and ask that you please upgrade to version 14.22.1. Let us know if you need more help by reaching out to android.support@weather.com. Again, apologies for the trouble caused by this glitch.

scraped_reviews.content: I use to love this app and subscribed annually for the enhanced forecasting. Unfortunately, I logged out one day and lost my premium access when I logged back in. I tried troubleshooting and never was able to get it resolved. The much bigger issue lately is the nonstop UI changes and ad integration, making it difficult to navigate and the app unusable ‚Äîsometimes I know where the radar is, sometimes I don't, other times I can see the hourly data, others I can't. Time to find an alternative.

What happened to the badge icon after the upgrade? I really do not need a written notification about a heat advisory several times a day. it its hot its hot. What's the point? Plus, I did not sign up for those notifications at all. I signed up for badge notification so I can see them if I want to and not get bombarded with unless notifications all day. And those stopped working after the upgrade. Additionally, the temperature and rain forecast have been wrong all week. This upgrade sucks.

This app isn't very accurate for my area. Many times I will get the warnings of severe weather as it is happening. This app is also very different with the forecast compared to other people's apps. The video forecasts for seasonal outlooks NEVER have anything to do with my area either. It does work ok for the day to day temps.

Decent app. Gets you the information you need. However, the layout of information kind-of blurs together...there's no real separation of information to make it easier for your eyes to scroll across. Additionally, you're supposed to be able to customize the order of your saved locations and the order in which weather data is displayed, but those features don't work, so kind-of a bummer.

Be prepared to pay the $30 a year ransom. The free version will bury you in ads so you can't find anything you're looking for. So many ads! So much bandwidth consumed by the ads! AccuWeather is a much better alternative. Even if you don't pay for the ad-free version of AccuWeather it is still a usable app with a manageable number of ads. Get ACCUWEATHER and compare!

Used to be pretty decent. 3 days of hourly weather for free (more if you pay), good deal. Recent update has taken away the things that were fine, that you don't really think about and made them garbage. The icon for snow now looks like an x. The nice big widget I used is gone and now the closest one is 4x3 tiles but takes up the same screen space of the larger one I used to use. I was on the fence about paying, now I'm definitely not. Update: been using a different app for awhile now.

awful! literally doesn't even work half the time unless you pay for premium. It used to show which direction the storms were moving, now I have to stare into the sky looking like an idiot to see the direction. Shows the last 2 hours but any kind of future cast is not accurate (if it actually uploads). I used to recommend this app to everyone, now it makes me look like a jackass that might have stock in it. so disappointed.

Update: the app is functionally useless. Will not load and on-going notifications will not turn on. App is updated and nothing works. No severe alerts the last couple weeks, either. The new UI is fine but the persistent temperature notification is always two dashes rather than the temperature. To get the temperature to show up in the notification tray again, you have to open the app and force close it a few times before the temperature shows back up in the notification tray. Maddening.

Won't load. Just keeps cycling through the intro symbols over and over as if stuck on a loop. I didn't open the app to watch a bunch of symbols flash across my screen with the words "Be a force of nature" and to watch it repeat in an infinite loop. App has had nothing but problems like this since they upgraded to that stupid intro. It's constantly getting stuck on the intro and I have had to uninstall and reinstall but that didn't even work this time. Not enough space to explain in review.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Tamara. We're so sorry for the inconvenience you have experienced. The app wasn't loading for some users yesterday but we have fixed the issue and ask that you please upgrade to version 14.22.1. Let us know if you need additional help by reaching out to android.support@weather.com. Again, we apologize and hope you'll give us another try.

scraped_reviews.content: I HATE the recent update. It used to show an estimate of how much precipitation (inches of rain of snow) to expect on a day with that in the forecast . That's gone. I used to use the radar on every day that precipitation was expected. When I opened the app today, the buttons at the bottom of the screen Hourly, Daily, and radar are all gone. I've just spent 45 minutes looking for the radar and can't find it at all. Maybe they deleted the feature? I have been paying for premium since 2021.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Julie- Thanks for writing. We're so sorry for the inconvenience caused by a temporary glitch that hid buttons to radar, hourly and daily for some users. We have fixed the bug and ask that you please update to the latest app version, 14.22.1. Also, precipitation amounts can be found on the hourly page when you open the row for a particular hour.

scraped_reviews.content: Edited 6/11 The new update allows you to click and see what the alert is for on the radar. Still can't tell the direction the storms are moving, but it is an improvement. Changed from one star to three. I do not like the new update. I don't like that you can't tell what the severe weather alerts are now when you are on the radar. You also can't see the individual storm cells anymore and the direction they are moving.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Becky, thank you for your patience as we worked on improving our map alerts. We're pleased to share that you can now tap the watch or warning area on the radar map to open up the alert details. To see the changes, please make sure you have the latest version of the app (14.24+) installed. We hope this improves your radar experience.

scraped_reviews.content: UPDATE: Nearly 3 months later I still have ads in v.14.26. Customer service has been unresponsive since April. I've paid for the ad-free version of this app for almost 5 years now. I'm halfway through my annual subscription timeline, which renewed last October and have ads now. I reached out to support and got an email that said they would try to get back to me but they're not able to respond to every inquiry. Seems like a pretty important inquiry to respond to, as I'm an actual paying customer.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Dakotah. Thank you for writing, and for being a Premium subscriber. We appreciate your loyalty ‚Äì and we're very sorry you've been seeing ads in your experience. The bug should have been resolved in the 14.26 app release. It looks like you have installed this version. Please could you let us know if you're still having issues?

scraped_reviews.content: The latest version is horrible. The ad free edition takes 24 seconds to open for me. How many Android apps take that long to launch? Tried to launch again, it took more than 30 seconds. It's unusable. Canceling my subscription. updates: the app is updated again and it's back to loading fast. Not sure if it's rolled back to previous version.

title: HD Camera for Android: XCamera
description:
XCamera is a professional camera app for all Android devices. With rich filters and professional beauty effects, you can take amazing selfie photos!üíñüéä

Key features

üî• Intelligent scene modes
- 7 shooting modes: photo, video, pro mode, food, square, panorama, short video
- 19 real-time filters: meet your needs of all scenes
- Powerful HDR: capture the details of highlights and shadows in dynamic shooting

üî• Professional adjustment
- Focus: various zoom modes to take clear photos
- White Balance: adjust the intensities of the colors to restore the original color of the photo
- Exposure: adjust the ISO sensitivity to fit the scene being shot, whether dark or bright
- SCE: preset different scene parameters, support night and sport mode, one-click to shoot HD photos

üî• Other features
- Picture/video adjustment
- Pinch to zoom
- Countdown timer
- Burst shoot and quicksnap
- Steady shooting
- Torch and flash
- Touch to shoot
- Volume key, audio control to take photos and videos
- Auto level
- Photo collage
- Record location info

One click to capture HD photos! Our professional HD camera will bring you unbelievable selfies and keep your special moments. Download and enjoy this free camera app!

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

Disclaimer:
This app is based on Open Camera code, and licensed under the GNU General Public License.

- Photo collage
- Record location info

One click to capture HD photos! Our professional HD camera will bring you unbelievable selfies and keep your special moments. Download and enjoy this free camera app!

scraped_reviews.content: I took about 25 pics in less than 10 min.  It was very easy actually no adds during pic taking. Writing this review is taking longer.     I will say that when I went to the gallery some of the pics were upside down. that's very strange because they weren't upside down when I took them. I havnt seen an easy way to fix this issue yet. Definitely better than stock camera.  4 stars
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Khalifa, we're sorry for the inconvenience. Could you please email us a description of the issue at xprocamerafeedback@gmail.com? We‚Äôll help resolve it as soon as possible. Have a nice day!‚ù§Ô∏è

scraped_reviews.content: I got this app for my new tablet just to test the camera because the app that came pre-installed didn't work. To me, a semi-pro photographer, this app works outstanding. The level of controls is excellent and I paid to get the ad free version. Definitely worth it. Also, there's several add-ons available for purchase as well and I think I'll probably be getting those too. If you pay the few bucks to get it ad free, I'm sure you'll be pleased.

Saw complaints about ads, they listened and no longer an issue. clear, detailed shots. Images are displayed after each shot, giving you an opportunity to save or retake the picture. I have lost a few good shots because I forgot that you have to tell the app to save each time, but after using it for a few weeks I have grown to like this feature. I don't have to take multiple pictures just to delete most of them later. Editing options are limited.

Downloaded because of the high ratings, but this is terrible! First open, ad popup. Took a quick look at the Settings menu, less than 10 seconds, and when I back out, hit another (longer) ad that I decided wasn't worth sitting through, so I just closed and uninstalled. Why does every developer think that apps must be subscription based now? It's open source so maybe I'll just fork it and put it out here for free, for real, for everyone, forever, without ads. Greed will get you replaced quick!

It actually does what it's supposed to do. I just have to figure how to make it take photos quicker, than waiting for it to generate the final product. Also how to align the square photo straightener. I sometimes get uneven photos (Slanted) and holding the camera very still while taking the picture. Otherwise, it has all of the options and perks of a real pro camera.üòâ

Immediately overwhelmed by ads. It seems to capture better images than the awful default camera app on my Pixel 6a, but there were just so many ads that I uninstalled after trying one photo. Absolutely ridiculous. If you need to quickly capture a moment, you won't be able to, because there will be an ad. I'm okay with a free app having ads, but why they wouldn't save them for after a picture is taken? You spend time in a camera app not actually taking photos; reviewing and editing happen too.

Decent camera but hardly worth it when you need to take a photo and it forces you to watch a 30 second ad first. I don't use the camera often so at first, it was tolerable but it only gets worse and the ads make it useless for me, too many and too often, sometimes before, sometimes in between so you can't look at what you've just taken until you watch another ad. By the time you can actually use the camera again, the moment is gone. Uninstalling.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi S. Frankly, thanks for supporting us and we're sorry for the ads. We will improve in the future and we will try to keep the ads from interfering. Please let us know if you have any questions. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: Loving this app! HD Camera for Android is the best camera app I've found. Not only does it have a great selection of filters,but it also allows me to shoot square photos as well. When you sell on different online marketplaces,beeing able to change aspect ratio is important since different sites have different requirements for posting photos. This app provides the flexibility I need in order to accommodate those needs. Did I mention how easy it is to use?! 5 stars all around!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Holly, thanks for using our app. It's a great honor that you like it. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us! Have a good day!

scraped_reviews.content: I became disatisfied with the default camera app after noticing it was slightly blurring the edges of pictures moments after taking them, and I was unable to find and turn off the setting responsible. So I downloaded a handful of camera apps, including this one, and took the same picture with each of them as well as the default camera app. In terms of detail and image fidelity, this app was hands down the winner! Keep up the great work!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Shay, we are pleased that you enjoyed the app. If there is anything we can do for you, just let us know! Have a wonderful day!

scraped_reviews.content: Takes High quaily Picture, exceeded my expectations. Most zoom in but don't focus well . Easy to use and stabilizes so focusing in on object you do spend a lot of time trying to get that clear picture. Has the ability to take video in a Short video format this too has exceeded the standard, well done and easy to operate .Clean clear and concise. Was not at all disappointed. You won't be either. (Hats off ,Bravo!)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Danica, we are pleased that you enjoyed the app. If there is anything we can do for you, just let us know! Have a wonderful day!

scraped_reviews.content: Anything I didn't like was due to my inexperience with software. I miss my Nikon 35 mm. I took a few random photos and a selfie. They turned out well. No problems with interruptions. I was shocked to find it had a High Definition feature that hyper focused the image by touching the screen. It was responsive and accurate. The adds worked around my photo shoot this time. I have two Samsung Galaxies and I am shocked to see your app doing a comparable job. Nice editing tools. Keep up the good work.

Great app ruined by a terrible user experience from all the ads. Banners at the bottom, pop-ups constantly, request for ratings, attempts to get me to download other apps... This is insane! I'd be happy to buy this app outright if that was an option, but I'm not signing up for a yearly service plan for a camera app. Another good product ruined by too much advertising and an unnecessary ongoing charge. Edit: I appreciate your response and hope that you consider a flat purchase option, too.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Brian, sorry for the inconvenience. We are currently working on adjusting the timing and reducing the frequency of these rating prompts to improve your experience. We will also try to adjust our ads strategy to minimize the interruptions to you. Thanks for your understanding.‚ù§Ô∏è

scraped_reviews.content: Almost perfect for me. Unfortunately, I use macro most often when shooting photos and this app doesn't seem to work so well. Shooting in auto focus in photo mode seems to work better for macro shots. Also, a movable capture button would be nice. I give a 5 rating despite, as this is the best I've found for my needs. The ads are not annoying, which is a complete deal breaker for me. So, many thanks for that. I appreciate this app and it's now my go to for taking photos.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thanks for using our app and giving us feedback. We will take your suggestion seriously and try our best to make some improvement in this aspect. Hoping to bring you a better experience. Have a nice day.

scraped_reviews.content: I use this camera to photograph sports cards. To capture a card with a chrome, highly-reflective surface and also show the condition of the corners and edges in a single photo had become so much of a hassle, I started looking to buy a totally new dedicated camera. That is no longer necessary thanks to the sharpness and detail I get with this app. Definitely gets 5 stars from me!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jerry, we are pleased that you enjoyed the app. If there is anything we can do for you, just let us know! Have a wonderful day!

scraped_reviews.content: Took 1 photo. System adjusted the light to something different from what was on my screen. Clicked icon to edit, and fix. Twice. Both times, pop-up said it couldn't edit this type of photo. So, I tried opening the photo in my phone's basic photo album. It opened a loud ad before opening the photo. Long enough ad that I decided to delete this app. Well before the ad ended, I had already tapped the button to delete it.

Works well, ads don't interrupt recording. My stock phone app (OnePlus) stops recording after around 24 minutes. Kinda sucks and can't find a way to change it so I went to look for a different phone app to replace it. Tried a couple of other highly rated camera apps only to wonder how they got high ratings? Anyway found this one and it's good for my needs. Some ads but they don't interfere with recording so I can deal.

I have a Samsung galaxy note 9 phone. Great camera app, I love how easy it is to change modes and the other options flow well when using the app. Stopped using the app after 1 week though because ads popping up when I'm trying to take pictures is disruptive. I gave a reduced score for 2 reasons. 1. No pro version. If there was a pro version I'd gladly buy so I can continue using without ads. 2. App doesn't offer any quick launch options in it's settings like the default camera app does.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Lewie, sorry for the inconvenience. We are developing pro version and it will be online as soon as possible. Please pay attention to our app and update it in time. And we appreciate your second suggestion, it help us to do our job better.If you have any other questions, please feel free to contact us. Have a nice day!

scraped_reviews.content: So far, I'm astonished! To the high quality of pictures it takes, as well as extra editing options. ->-> Of course, there are ads!! <-<- So far, I find it has lots of ads, but I just downloaded the app a half hour ago. So really, t.b.h. , I won't know truly what i think of it until I'm able to put more time in and experience what it has to offer, as well as what it doesn't have! But im definitely keeping it! And we shall see what's in store!!
EDIT* WENT FROM 5 STAR TO 1- Now for some reason all my videos are grainy, hazy, or blurry. Quality of pictures has went way down.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we're sorry for the issues you're facing with image and video quality. Please send the affected files to xprocamerafeedback@gmail.com so we can investigate and work on improvements. Your feedback is vital for enhancing the app. Thank you for your patience!

scraped_reviews.content: This is my GO TO camera app for sure. It is so dependable, straightforward, and easy. I still can't believe they offer it free. I have been so frustrated with other apps I tried only to be relied complicated, and then wanted to charge me just to recover a photo I took with their camera. HD CAMERA APP HAS ALL YOU NEED FOR A HIGH FUNCTIONING CAMERA, TO CATCH ALL YOUR SPECIAL MOMENTS. and it just keeps getting better.and better, still 5 years running üèÉ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

Great camera without the pixel's gross post processing, actually uses my camera hardware too, but it sometimes it takes about a full second to take and store a picture. Enough that i can get pictures of my face because i went back to look at the camera Ads aren't an issue btw, they only pop up when you go to settings or to look at your images within the app
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Ren, we will try to adjust our ad strategy to minimize the interruptions to you. Additionally, we will improve the application's saving speed to give you a better using experience. Thanks for your understanding.‚ù§Ô∏è

scraped_reviews.content: I'm still learning but I don't feel it has the same level of editing options that were available in the old Google photos app I hate that they've changed Google's I've been using it for years and now I can't make my photos look the way I want them to and it's really frustrating I was hoping this was going to be the solution but so far.... not really.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Sarita! We're sorry to hear you're frustrated. XCamera offers various filters and editing tools, and you can access the edit option by tapping the gallery image within the app. If you have specific editing needs, let us know at xprocamerafeedback@gmail.com. We'll continue improving to meet user expectations.üòä

scraped_reviews.content: It is not usable. The shutter fires at 4 second intervals whether I touch it or not. Video and photo the same. It stops firing if I put it on a tripod, but then I can't shoot by Audible. I say shoot softly, loudly and on all sensitivities. Won't fire. Phone records fine. I uninstalled, rebooted, reinstalled 3 times. Same result. I tried to take a picture of my TV this morning and ended up with 30 pics and 3 videos. I had to type blind because your screen form is covered by the keyboard.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Sam, we're sorry for the inconvenience. Could you provide a screen recording and describe the issue? You can send the video to xprocamerafeedback@gmail.com, and we‚Äôll assist you as soon as possible. Have a nice day!

scraped_reviews.content: It demanded that I install Tik-Tok (the chinese app in legal trouble) before offering any menu or functionality. The only other "click" was to pay $3.99 for pro, IMO they should make that mandatory from the start (rather than "making an offer" like the mafia.) From the menu (after paying for pro), I turned off "take shot on touch". But every time I moved my grip on the large chromebook, it took another shot. Photo size (4:3 versus 16:9) seems impossible to adjust. I deleted this App.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Rick, sorry for the inconvenience. We will fix photo size issue in the next version. Please stay tuned. Additionally, we will try to adjust our ads strategy to minimize the interruptions to you. Regarding the issue of the camera taking photos automatically, please check if the voice control feature is enabled. Thanks for your understanding.

scraped_reviews.content: I'm an image engineer, not a photographer. This camera is technical enough for my likings, and simple enough for my weak right brain to make pretty photos. Came for white balancing, stayed for the bountiful other, easy to use features. Great camera overall!

I only tested the video camera. I didn't notice much difference in the quality of the video recording of this app's camera compared to the default camera on my mobile. Although there are slight differences between this app and my default camera, they are not easily noticeable.That's why I don't want to unnecessarily clog up my phone's storage by keeping this app on my mobile. So I will uninstall the app right now.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We're sorry to hear the app didn't meet your expectations. We're continuously working to enhance video quality. If you have specific feedback or videos, please share them at xprocamerafeedback@gmail.com. We'd appreciate the chance to improve your experience!

scraped_reviews.content: I'd love to be able to give this app a higher rating but I honestly can't! Actually a "1" is too high since I've never gotten to take a single picture. THE ADS are just too much. I spent 3+ minutes looking at a notice telling me that the app may contain ads or watching a TicToc video that just had to send me here, to the Playstore to install it. I already have TicToc and am not fond of it either. Well, since I'm already here...lol...I figured I should tell you that you're wasting your time here!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Cheryl. We're sorry for the inconvenience caused by the ads. We're working to optimize the ad experience. You can also purchase an ad-free version for uninterrupted use. If you need more assistance, please contact us at xprocamerafeedback@gmail.com. We hope to improve your experience!

scraped_reviews.content: Perfect and makes you get the best quality from the photos
WOW this time is beautiful. Improved?? Not clear enough anymore and this is a new Galaxy 5g 8G 256.. Better than the Samsung installed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi hana, sorry for the inconvenience. Could you please send the blurry photo to us and add the description via "Settings - Feedback or suggestion"? And we will optimize it. If you have any other questions, please feel free to contact us. Have a nice day!üåπ

scraped_reviews.content: it is very good the graphics settings and all

Only just tried it, but performing well so far. Quick response and sharp photos. I love the option to lock a focus point using the volume buttons and that the controls are white on a black background so you can see them when using the app. (Replacing another app that was slow and unreliable.) [I always have data off when using a camera, so I won't complain about the ads.]
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thank you for using this app. We will continue to optimize it. If you have any suggestions, please feel free to contact us. Thanks for your feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: I just bought a new phone and for some reason the camera was lagging which was so weird as it is supposed to be a good camera phone mid range (won't name it) but this app sorted it right out and quality of photos is fantastic too

Not terrible, not great. I've taken some photos where it appeared to successfully photograph, but then didn't save (not v often, but enough to be frustrating & to miss the good photo opportunity). The main annoyance is there's no way of stopping it making a loud beepy noise every time you take a photo. V annoying if shooting in a nice peaceful place, or a candid shot. Sounds cheap & irritating. Deleted in favour of a quieter one. Ads are annoying too but I understand they're a necessary evil.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, sorry. Regarding the first question, could you please send us an email via ‚ÄúSettings - Feedback or suggestion‚Äù, and describe the issue ? About the sound, please click "Settings" - "Sound settings" - "Shutter sound". However the cameras do not have the option to turn off the shutter sound in video mode. Thanks for your understanding.

scraped_reviews.content: Amazing HD Camera App- Way better Than the Default! This app elevates my phone photography. Beginner friendly. I enjoyed trying the app, but I'm confused as to why I had to press "trial period" although done below, it says this app is free. if that's the case then good God, I found a great one. Highly recommend!
I really like the HDR mode of this app. It renders beautiful images. I use a pixel pro 10 max, which has 3 cameras. I would love to be able to choose which camera I want to use.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Erich, sorry for the inconvenience. Currently, the app already supports switching between multiple cameras on some devices. You can tap the icon on the far right of the shutter to switch them. If you have any other questions, please feel free to contact us via "Settings - Feedback or suggestion". Have a nice day.

scraped_reviews.content: I said one of the best camera is so good but I take a video it turns dark not brighten but photos camera was really good but I'm a vloger I want a video clarity my favourite app gives me a disappointment üò• I feel very bad about the issue
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi divya, we're sorry for the inconvenience. Could you please email us a description of the issue at xprocamerafeedback@gmail.com? We‚Äôll help resolve it as soon as possible. Have a nice day!

scraped_reviews.content: Very good camera app; but missing option to save exp. to how it was set. Annoying to set it every time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Roman! Thank you for your feedback. We understand the convenience of saving exposure settings and will consider this for future updates. Meanwhile, if you have more suggestions, feel free to reach out in the app. If you're enjoying the app, we hope you'll consider giving us more stars!üòä

scraped_reviews.content: pics are clearer than the other 6 camera apps I have. also very to easy to operate, and I'm very old, so simple is all I can handleü§™ü§£
Having an android phone, this helps a lot! It has really good zooming, and AMAZING quality. This is an easy 5 stars :)

This app does a hideous amount of data harvesting. The app is not the product. Your personal data, location history, photos, and who knows what else (contacts? Internet history? Maybe even Credit card details?) all gets hoovered up and sold to the highest bidder. And probably to dozens of other bidders too! Uninstalled as soon as i saw through it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi David, sorry for the inconvenience. We respect your privacy and do not access personal information. We understand your concerns and will work to improve the user experience. Have a nice day!‚ù§Ô∏è

scraped_reviews.content: So far I am enjoying this application. The adverts are a little irritating sometimes as I miss key moments to take videos/pictures
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Tshepo, we apologize for this issue. We will optimize our ad strategy for a less intrusive experience.ü§ù Thanks for your comprehension. If you have any suggestions for improvement, please feel free to contact us. Kind regards.üåπ

scraped_reviews.content: It seems to work. But there is a limit set to about 7mb images. In a stable light it has a stable interval where the color of the picture changes every half a sec from warm to a bit more natural. That is like flipping a coin on the light. Not great. And right after taking the picture and double tap on it to zoom in on details like a face, after few sec it zooms out on its own. Annoying. And the picture seems to be grainy and isn't capturing light reflections very well. Overall not all that good.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Vadim, sorry for the inconvenience. Could you please send the photo to us and add the description via "Settings - Feedback or suggestion"? And we will optimize it. If you have any other questions, please feel free to contact us. Have a nice day!üåπ

scraped_reviews.content: this app works OK, but there are two issues I have. 1. zoom control is too sensitive. i cannot slowly zoom in or out. there does not appear to be an adjustment for this. 2. you cannot negative zoom (fisheye) which the native pixel camera app supports. i paid for the app anyway and hope the developer fixes these two things.

1, best camera with selfy angle that put you far away, not stuck to the lenses. Impressive! 2, too many intrusive adds, you could have adds after a few photos. I'm downloading it to my other phone and there I will use the payied version, as it is good. QUESTION: can you make also a - 3 selfy? (be farther away from telephone, now is from 1 to 3 closer, I want from 1 to - 3 farther away)

This app is free for users, so we need to display ads to earn some meager profits. Thanks for your understanding. Do you want to set a timer on the selfie? Looking forward to your reply. Have a nice day.

scraped_reviews.content: exceptionally better then my Androids camera which is strange because Android cameras are usually pretty good however with this phone that I'm running now very laggy this app helps me to capture pictures and videos way better. I think that anybody that has a laggy camera should download HD camera for Android ASAP.
nice quality images,when working correctly. The app suddenly glitched and started to take photos at odd angles instead of where aimed, so I had to delete and reinstall the app
It asked me for a review before I ever even used it!!! Other than THAT, it has been a simple to use HD fix for the minimalist camera that came installed on my phone!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We apologize for the early review prompt and will adjust its timing. We're glad you find the app simple and useful. If you're happy with it, we would appreciate a higher rating! Let us know if there is anything else we can improve.üòä

scraped_reviews.content: I am really pleased with this Camera app. It takes clear and concise photos, with a number of options, such as video. It is the best camera app that I have ever used.
it's a pretty good app I really like but I wish the adds wouldn't pop up on the screen as much but it's overall a good app. I would recommend it.

scraped_reviews.content: A good app that lets me pick the MBs of my photos, so I can send them in chats or emails with no photo size limit issues.

scraped_reviews.content: its annoying that I would have to spend more on coins than go to the bookstore to purchase a physical copy of a book. there are so many chapters and it doesnt get to the point until you spend enough to make the book gods happy... what the heck is up with that. the books are great reads and I spend hours to get more coins manually instead of paying ir else I have to wait another day or two just to get another chapter to feed my addiction but I guess that is all book apps.

Great Stories, Wonderful reads. I'd give it 5 stars if they would charge the exact same for each chapter, instead of some being 15, some 35, some 48, etc... It's difficult to predict how much money you need to spend on a book when they don't have a set flat rate to charge. Because of this, I have stopped buying coins. Edited: I gave 2 stars now as you can't remove bookmarks, even though google says you can.

Way too expensive!! I purchased $40 worth of coins and couldn't get through 1 book. The book was ok, but it was very frustrating to get through. It had many grammatical errors along with repeated sentences. There's no way this particular story was edited with how many errors there were. It felt like too much filler and not enough substance. I canceled my subscription the same day! Don't waste your time on this platform when there's much better options out there.

I have been encouraged to write a review for more of the points that allow me to unlock chapters. I believe that only 5 star reviews get the points. My honest review is that the chapters are too short like most of these apps. Unlocking them costs a lot for approximately 2-7 minutes of reading. I'm not reading for the plot or the spicy scenes. I want the drama, I think its fun. but the typos are annoying, the names of the novels are terrible. I almost wonder if half of these are AI.

My first time using this app and I had an in-app alert to receive unlimited short stories for $9.99 the first week, then $19.99 each week after. I accepted, willing to continue reading and see what this platform had to offer. It unlocked the stories for the 1st 24 hours but then kept asking for coins to read chapters. No response from in-app support. I canceled the subscription and uninstalled. This specific offer is not listed with other subscriptions, either.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, you can email to contact@goodnovel.com within your GoodNovel UID and order number, we will help you.

scraped_reviews.content: The stories catch your attention and are easy to read. Have found some errors in spelling. They cost too many points to read the next chapter. It reels you in allowing to read 5 to 10 chapters and then you can only read one and it costs 20 to 35 points which you can only get in one day so maybe you can read 1 or 2 chapters a day unless you start a new book. better now that you can watch ads to unlock chapters.

I used to enjoy this app because it carries a lot of short stories I like to read during my breaks. But now, it requires a subscription to read them, at $20 a WEEK! Absolutely ridiculous. I'm not paying an app $80 a month to read some stories that don't cost $5 to read to begin with, on top of having to pay for coins to read other stories that aren't short. Ridiculous and money grabbing. I can't even use the coins I already have to read the short stories either.

I really like the story I'm reading but there seem to be a lot of typos so an editor would be able to help our author a lot. I'm undecided on whether to continue with this app until I see how easy it is to read without having to pay. Its definitely not free and you have to watch a little of adds to be able to continue to read.

So far, this app seems pretty honest about what it offers. I appreciate the fact it offers free coins per day as well as other ways to get free coins to unlock chapters. The app also has the same amount of chapters for free that you see in the ads as the actual app; before you have to use in-game currency to unlock the next chapter- which is awesome! I am just not looking forward to the way the amount increases for unlocking the next chapter to read. I'd say that's the only thing I don't like.

Okay, I have had to give them back a star. The issue with compensation for disappearing books that were paid for was never taken care of even though I emailed as they said. But, I still really enjoy the other authors on this app. It's gotten so expensive though! And the free holidays are gone. Just spent over $100 on one book because it's just that good but it would cost $70 more to finish. Says 666 chapters at 35 coins per chapter. And not anywhere else. üò¢ Several like that. Just can't afford.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please kindly send email to: contact@goodnovel.com and describe the issue along with your account information. Our service team will help you to solve the problem accordingly. Thank you and Good Day.

scraped_reviews.content: Stories can be surprisingly good, but it's so bloody expensive to pay to read. I signed up for a subscription thinking that might unlock at least *some* books, but it doesn't seem to do anything at all after initial coins are rewarded. What's the point of the subscription? Being charged exorbitant money for zero extra perks. Disappointing and scammy.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi ,You can submit your problem and user ID to the online service. We will handle it for you as soon as possible.

scraped_reviews.content: This app has a plethora of books to choose from for readers of all genres. I do think it's a bit pricey because it costs 35 coins to unlock a chapter and you don't always get enough through the daily reward bonuses. However topping up and getting bonuses that way, I can read quite a while that way, making this my number one reading app.

Addictive!! I have only read one book, but I am enjoying it. There are hundreds of options to choose and a variety of different genres. Some authors can get a bit chapter happy and upload thousands of chapters to attempt to keep you in their book, but you can always choose completed books. You can purchase coins to open chapters, but there are options to receive free coins and daily bonuses. Overall I enjoy the app and read everyday.

This app is great! You can read by doing different activities or by paying. And so far the stories are great! I would definitely recommend. I'm editing this review. This app was great but recently they redid it took away a lot of the ads that you could watch for coins. Now you have to pay astronomical amounts of money to get books that are mostly not edited. I'm trying to finish one book that I started before this and then more than likely I will drop the app. I just can't afford it.

This app is good and I loved the books but the problem is that the short books you can only read like 3-4 chapters based on what book you read and have to pay a membership to read the entire book while for the longer books you can basically read them for free without paying any money besides watching ads to get points so you can unlock the next chapter like its better to make the short stories free. And another problem is the spelling and grammar is also annoying cuz it ruin the vibe to read.

If you‚Äôre looking for a good read to snuggle up in a cozy blanket, this is not the book. The writers only give a 15 minute read with a couple of chapters a day. For a book you‚Äôre paying for, you can find other quality stories with faster delivery times with new chapters. Often, when the book is updated, the story is weak. It's as if the writer just throws something together to get something out.

It's starting to seem like a scam! I've had this app for over 2 yr. I've spent a lot of money on it. Most recently, spent $50-60 haven't finished the book I am reading. The app has policy charges that states due to copyright issues, you can no longer skip chapters. I call bs on that. Copyright is redundant if you never see those unpurchased ch. One could easily spend $100 for one book with $0.35 per chapter. If you wait for free stuff, you will take years to read one book. Make it($) make sense.

I canceled my premium subscription because I felt 20 dollars a week was too harsh on my pocketbook. Despite having canceled, however, for 2 weeks the money was still taken out of my account and I am not even using the app, due to it being unable to function with my screenreader. 40 dollars for something I have not used for more than a few hours. I am very cross, and would like a refund, though I doubt this is possible.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, please email to contact@goodnovel.com within your GoodNovel UID and the order number you made, we will check and help you within 72 hours.

scraped_reviews.content: Really good stories on this app. The coins per chapter gets higher with each chapter making it harder to unlock chapters! Therefore, it can get very expensive very fast if you buy coin packages. Doesn't have many options at all to get but a few coins each day. So maybe get to read a very short chapter a day without buying coins. Great books tho!!

The stories go through points quickly, so if you actually like reading, you'll either need to spend cash or an abundance of time earning points. It is best to stick to books free from my public library app. So far, it doesn't seem as though their writers utilize proofreading or editors to check for even basic errors. Even software like Grammerly would help improve the continuity and spelling mistakes. At least the story I've started, I can easily guess the ending so I can uninstall.

I really like the books, but I wished it didn't take so many points to just read a chapter. Should be where u cab at least go 2 r 3 chapters before u use any points. I do like this app more than some of the others I have downloaded. I can say that it is easier, but again, I don't like only getting to read a few chapters a day . I feel u could get more people here if u did something with the point system. , because I have lost interest in how it goes

The books are great but the cost for coins to unlock is too high. If I were to buy the coins needed to read a single, long book, as some are not complete stories, it could cost away more than any book is worth, in the end. I like that I can earn coins for free but that takes a lot of time to save up enough to read and unlock an entire book. I'd buy the entire book like I do on Kindle if it were available.

stories definitely grab you and very easy to read. there a few grammatical errors and I do wish you could see how many chapters are in the novels. so I used to be able to watch ads and have the opportunity to read several chapters but now the ads no longer pop up and so I have to wait two days before I can read a new chapter because they do not auto unlock unless you have the rewards available. it's frustrating and now I am not as locked in on the novel anymore. üòî

I have tried several of these reading apps and what I like about this one is that the books have continuous scrolling (rather than page flipping), and I seem to get enough coins to read a few chapters a day where some others make it hard to earn even a single chapter unlock in a day. it does have a subscription feature that has better prices than buying coin packages, and overall would be cheaper than some other apps I've tried, but I really wish there was an unlimited option for avid readers.

I actually like this reading app, and I have tried several.. like probably close to 60. The books I have found are worth reading. I actually think it's 3 stars because the points that you need to earn were not worth the money after the free ones.The opportunity for more points without having to spend a ton is nonexistent. I found short stories I was interested in, only to find out you must subscribe to actually read them and have access to them. Which comes at a very hefty cost.

Reading my 1st story. App seems user-friendly. It would be nice to be able to change book background color to something less harsh than bright white. Changing font style, size, and color would be nice. Even just a night mode would help. So far, the writing could use better grammer and editing, but the storyline is interesting. Will keep using app.

I am also here to get points. I spent $20 to only read 110 chapters. I didnt realize that the book i was reading was ongoing. I refuse to pay anymore. because spending more than $20 for a book is ridiculous. There are many typos almost as if English is not the writers first language. the chapters are not organized. Just seems like theres only so many pages in a chapter and they go by so quickly. at least the change on povs are not redundant. I would honestly only give it 1 star.

the app has good books that I would love to read the problem is its hard to read them without paying money. They advertise as being able to be read for free and yet the points system makes it hard to read even one chapter a day without spending 30 minutes trying to get points to read one. There are typos and errors as well in the stories. considering deleting the app and not even finishing the book I started its taken me 2 days to read 2 new chapters.

Not a bad app. got it due to an ad that popped up and being able to read the story with minimal problems is not. you don't have to spend money to unlock the chapters, sometimes you just have to keep reading or watching as many ads as you want to earn points. I just wish you earned more from the daily free points you can earn so you could unlock chapters a bit faster without paying, but I have no serious complaints

Absolutely bs. been waiting on an update on my book for a month now, and nothing. most stories on this app arent even finished and you have to read as they put out chapters, which can sometimes be 1 a day, 1 a week, or 1 a month. puts a time frame on bonus points you have to buy, and then takes forever to put out chapters so you lose those points. Id love a refund for everything I spent on this app.

I literally would give this app all of the stars in the world, if it didn't cost so much to read a book. I would absolutely love it if I could buy the chapters outright, instead of stopping and going soooo much. Also, if the cost of the chapters were more consistent, I wouldn't feel as if I was blowing through money. I loooooooooove the books and can't wait to finish one.

A good story caught my eye so I started reading it to find the chapters locked. You have to buy coins or watch a lot of ads to be able to unlock 1 chapter. The chapters are not the same price. Better rewards so you can read more would be great. I am not paying to read a book. You should be able to get thru more than one chapter if you have to use coins.

thought I'd note that I was asked to give a review for more points to keep reading and only 5 star reviews will count, apparently. the stories are good, but it takes a lot of points to unlock the next chapter. Technically you could read things by spending no money. but you'll be spending your time watching ads to gain points instead and it takes an unnecessarily large amount of points to read the next chapter. we'll see if this review actually gets me points for the truth under my 5 stars...

Good stories, however you're still required to purchase coins to continue a story even if you have an active subscription. What's the purpose of a subscription? Over charging. The benefits do not outweigh the cost by a longshot. Not worth it. Also, I did the review and didn't get the reward points, which was not the first time I did not get reward points for doing what the app said to do.

App in general is good. Ads keep getting longer and longer, especially Pinterest and Temu, which also bounce you around and don't give credit for ads viewed. Also, it's not just 2 ads to unlock a chapter, it's 3 with one 3/4 way through each short chapter. Please cut back the number of ads and get rid of Pinterest (almost 2 min ads) and Temu ads. Shorter ads are much better, under 30 sec. Should not have to click 'x' 5 or 6 times to close an ad. Frustrating.

I appreciate that there's a platform for people who want to write and can't get published. However I don't appreciate that the more chapters you get to the higher the coin count needed to read chapters. that's annoying. I also wish there was a way that either they could get an editor or we could edit for them as they definitely need editing

Honestly everyone would be better off and would save a lot of money subscribing to Kindle Unlimited instead of paying for the drivel on this app. Seriously, I've never read such badly written stories. Even the worst you can find on Kindle is 10 times better than this. Not to mention it would cost you hundreds to finish a long story.. no book I've ever bought cost that much ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

it's a great app, with lots of great stories! visually, I like the overall set up, I do get confused about how to get the next chapter. so far so good, but I wish there was cheaper alternatives to reading next chapters. It doesn't costs real money, but coins you can acrew with check Ins,etc. but unless you pay for premium, I don't get to read for very long.. but over all, great stories, and great idea and design!

I hate this app. I have found several books that I like, and am I the middle of, but I'm going to delete the app. It is infuriating that my bonus points expire after 24 hours. They say 48 hours, but that is not true. Even if it was, it's ridiculous that they expire so fast because life happens. Also, the books are way too expensive. I believe in supporting authors, but it costs $100 or more to finish a book.

it's getting old to get going on a story and then money or coins be asked for. I get the reason why but with the economy the way it is it shouldn't cost anything to use these apps. if you wanted income then publish the book to make it an ebook. it's a good app but seriously with the point and coins etc. it's annoying and I just want to read a good read without breaking the bank.

The stories are fun to read despite the typos and occasional grammar errors. I wish they would let you read a full story for 35 rewards points because after a while, its annoying to have to have to keep getting points per story. You spend time on the app, you'd think they'd reward that a little more. Might delete app altogether because its frustrating.

What's the point of the coins if you can only unlock some chapters!? The short stories require a subscription to read. I've spent money on this app for coins only to realize that I can't unlock anything I want to read. Nowhere on the app does it tell you that the short stories are only something you can read by paying money for a subscription. So you get into a story only to find out that they want you to pay $20 for a WEEK just to read a story with SEVEN chapters, 4 locked behind a pay wall.

This is an OK one. here's why I'm not giving it anymore stars then this. k I was read this one book and it was over 200 pages and not totally completed. so in the beginning u get to read about 2 chapters a day. Then when u buy a week's worth of coins to spend on ur book. it doesn't add up to that. I thought I would get unlimited access to the whole book but it only used my coins. and it's cost in coins 35 for each chapters. don't buy anything from them it's really not worth it.

stories are pretty good if you can overlook the poor grammar and spelling errors. But the chapters are too short and very costly. The story I was reading, just kept going. Like never ending, if I'm going to be sucked into paying for a book, I'd rather buy a $20 book than pay $75+ for 30 short chapters. I will be deleting this app and going back to one that doesn't charge you to try to finish the story.

I just downloaded this app today in order to read a free book that I saw in an ad. this book is well written and draws the reader in quickly. the app does require you to earn 'coins' to read through the chapters, but that is simple enough to do for free if you open multiple books and read the initial free chapters. you earn some coins just for the time you spend reading in the app. I recommend this app for the books you just can't seem to find in print yet.

The books are very captivating. The downfall is that every chapter costs 35 coins. You end up either reading one chapter a day with the daily login and watching ads, or you pay a lot of money to buy coins. It would be nice if the daily login would gradually increase to help loyal readers be able to read more.

the app has a lot of amazing books on here and you are able to see what other books are wrote by an author you like when u click on the author. it helps with finding series. I do wish sometimes that they wouldn't allow authors to post until they are finished with a book because there are times a book goes forever without update with no word from the author. but overall each chapter is cheaper than other platforms as well so that's a plus. and this platform allows multiple ways to get coins.

there aren't many options to read for free... the amount of points needed to read 1 chapter is crazy... I'll be deleting this app once I finish my review... there are other book apps with great stories that you don't have to pay to read just watch an ad and read as much as you like aannddd you can open 15 or 25 chapters at a time. so I'll just stick with that app and delete this one. in case you want to know the other app is called moboreader.

Foregoing the bonus the app attempts to bribe 5 stars with, while this is currently still my main app for stories to waste time with, the ads-progression is the only new-chapter advancement worth using. Their "time reading" bonus is a scam as I have timed my reading in ap, pausing for ads, and at 30 minutes on the timer it claimed only 9 in app. Writing is hit or miss, typical to what you find on these types of apps, and at least the options for watching ads to progress is functional and useful.

Got hooked on accident. I was reading what I thought was a post on Facebook but it turned out to be this story, well in order for me to finish I had to download the app. okay not a huge deal but not ideal. As I continue to read and get to the end of a chapter a pop up says I need 25 coins to continue reading! I did all these things and had 56 coins, paid the 25 to continue reading & now I have 11 ü§î but of course you can purchase more

title: Agoda: Cheap Flights & Hotels
description:
Agoda is your ultimate holiday planner. Find cheap flights and affordable hotels and accommodations in just a few taps! The Agoda app is your best tool for finding and booking travel deals, anywhere in the world.
 
Book flights on Agoda for domestic and international routes seamlessly. Find flight deals from over 200 airlines worldwide for countless options. Our unique search engine compares flights and prices in real time so you can book the best deal as soon as it drops.
 
Book hotels, villas, BnBs, and more with over 4,000,000 accommodations in the language and currency of your choice. Book accommodations to your liking with filters, hi-res photos, map views, local information, and over 35 million verified traveler reviews. Book hotel rooms tailored to your travel needs and budget, thanks to Agoda. 

Want to earn? With Agoda Homes, you can become a host and start earning on your property.
 
Travel and See the World for Less, knowing you can save up to 80% off with Select Member Offers, Last-Minute Deals, and much more. Agoda is the perfect trip planner to help you save on your next getaway. Book a flight. Book a hotel. Book your next unforgettable vacation with exclusive savings.
 
AGODA FEATURES
 
CHEAP FLIGHTS IN JUST A TAP
- Search for affordable flights from over 200 airlines and fly to almost any destination
- Book flights knowing you‚Äôre getting the best possible price
- Our trip planner saves your info and lets you adjust your flight booking directly in-app
 
BOOK HOTELS EASILY
- Book accommodations with over 4,000,000 options across the globe
- Reserve your next stay on Agoda ‚Äì whether it‚Äôs a hotel, BnB, vacation rental, or anything in between
- Find accommodations and book confidently by viewing user reviews, pictures, and local information
 
TRAVEL DEALS MADE FOR YOU
- Save with travel deals on cheap flights and budget-friendly accommodations
- Fulfill your wanderlust..affordably! Find countless destinations for cheap holidays
- With Agoda you can also enjoy exclusive offers with Secret Deals, newly listed discounts, and more
 
TRAVEL WORRY-FREE
- Agoda‚Äôs holiday planner saves your voucher, details, and maps right on your device for easy check-in and print-free travel
- Manage or edit your booking anytime, anywhere
Need help? Agoda has live agents 24/7 in multiple languages to make sure your journey is as smooth as it is cost-efficient
