summary: Book rooms at any of 4.2M properties worldwide. Find flight deals every day!

scraped_reviews.content: Be careful with hidden charges, especially when choosing pay later. When you choose to pay later, Agoda often applies its own currency conversion rate at the time of payment. This rate is usually much higher than the standard exchange rate, meaning the final amount charged to your card can be significantly more than the price originally quoted at booking. Juding by other reviews, these sharp practices are not uncommon on Agoda. Thankfully, I realised and cancelled the booking.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We apologize for the inconvenience caused. We always strive to provide the best experience for our customers. Please share your booking ID, email address, and concern through our Help Center page, "https://www.agoda.com/info/contact.html". We look forward to assisting you.

scraped_reviews.content: 15 yr user here with slightly over 1k nights booked. Used to be good. Not anymore. It is easier to gouge your eyes off than it is to reach their CS. Properties with "Request to Book" are almost always overbooked, charged upfront & then cancelled on the day of arrival with refunds taking up to 2 months. Cashback is kinda sus as the some of the supposed Cashback disappears on the day it is due. Use them to gauge prices then offer the property to pay that direct. You're welcome.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Our apologies for the unpleasant experience. Please let us investigate the booking issues. Kindly email the case details to us at googlesupport@agoda.com and include the case number (#839561) in the subject. We'll get back to you soon. ^Ekram

scraped_reviews.content: I booked a hotel on Agoda 3 months in advance with Pay at Property and even got email confirmation from the hotel. But when I arrived late at night, they said my booking was cancelled because I didn‚Äôt reply to a message on Agoda. The app still showed it as confirmed. Agoda support said the property can cancel and couldn‚Äôt help. Both Agoda and the hotel blamed me, and I was left stranded during a festival with no nearby rooms. I had to book far outside the city late night, never using again.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We apologize for the inconvenience caused. We always strive to provide the best experience for our customers. Please share your booking ID, email address, and concern through our Help Center page, "https://www.agoda.com/info/contact.html". We look forward to assisting you.
^Damien.

scraped_reviews.content: Using the app on the laptop will cost you on average $5 to $10 more than the phone which is just ridiculous as the prices should be the same across the channel. You also won't get the room advertised, most of the listings will not show you the room you will get. Worse when you try to look for the photos after the booking is made you can't see them. 80% off my bookings had the host giving me rooms not advertised and I had to fight each time to get the room I paid for or get cash discounts.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we apologize for the inconvenience caused. We always strive to provide the best experience for our customers. Please share your booking ID, email address, and concern through our Help Center page, "https://www.agoda.com/info/contact.html". We look forward to assisting you. ^phop

scraped_reviews.content: Booked 2 rooms for 4 adults and 3 kids, but the hotel received details for only 4 adults. The staff refused breakfast for the kids despite me showing the booking voucher and demanded extra payment. When I contacted Agoda, even their support team couldn‚Äôt reach the hotel manager. Later, Agoda admitted it was a system glitch and promised a refund upon bill submission. However, despite submitting the original bills, Agoda has not reimbursed the amount, forcing me to pay twice for the same service.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Ravi Sharma, we apologize for the inconvenience caused. We always strive to provide the best experience for our customers. Please share your booking ID, email address, and concern through our Help Center page, "https://www.agoda.com/info/contact.html". We look forward to assisting you. ^AA

scraped_reviews.content: Agoda scams you, they cannot be held accountable. Lost over 1000 usd for for flights due to an error on their side, they offered to refund 10% which I declined because it's not my fault. Too big to be held accountable. On other occasions, regarding hotel bookings, they lie and littlerly hang up on you. Agoda is criminal and I can't understand how they're allowed to operate.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi HFB, Our apologies for the inconvenience caused. Please let us look into your booking issues. Kindly email the case summary and booking ID to googlesupport@agoda.com and include your case number (#1011838) in the email subject. We will get back to you as soon as possible. ^Hafiz

scraped_reviews.content: Be very careful if you book without a Visa or Mastercard based credit card. If using a Thai bank app, you are absolutely committed to the original booking. There's no way to change dates or cancel and receive a refund unless you use a Visa or Mastercard credit card. **There is no way to pay/receive if changing the dates or canceling, if you used a Thai bank app.** It appears that you will just lose the money, as there is no option in the booking edit menu for anything except a credit card.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Drewko, we apologize for the inconvenience caused. We always strive to provide the best experience for our customers. Please share your booking ID, email address, and concern through our Help Center page, "https://www.agoda.com/info/contact.html". We look forward to assisting you. ^EL

scraped_reviews.content: Never to Agoda!!! I tried booking last night. I arrived at the property but no one was on duty at the front desk. I wasn't allowed to check in. I contacted the property owner but was out of coverage area. I wanted to cancel but I already paid and the booking was non refundable. Worst customer service experience ever. Planning to start a business or already have a growing business? Explore one of the top business apps to help you attract more customers!

Claim your free Yelp business listing to get discovered by millions of people ready to buy, visit and hire! Yelp for Business makes online business advertising easy!

Yelp gets 90+ million visitors each month searching for restaurants, home services and other businesses. Marketing on Yelp makes it easy to connect & reach customers, get more new leads or provide customer service more quickly. summary: Manage business listings, respond to reviews on the go & connect with customers.

scraped_reviews.content: This has been my worst experience on an app ever. They are scammers only interested in selling small business owners their 'premium package'. I made the mistake of signing up which involves giving them a business phone number. I would HEAVILY ADVISE AGAINST THIS. I have reviewed over 20 calls from 'Yelp associates'. I block the number every time I get a call. This hasn't helped at all, they just use a new number. They don't give good advice, they just push for a higher cost subscription package.

For 3+ months now it has been impossible to communicate with customers requesting a quote. When we try to "Request more info" the app freezes. I have been in contact with support (sent screenshot, logs, etc.) with no luck correcting the problem. It apoears that only Android devices are affected. We are able to use the app with an iPad or on a laptop. Come on guys lets get our act together. You claim to be on the cutting edge of technology. Time to show a little love to us Android users.

I'm not sure what has changed but I had a good experience with the app a couple years ago when advertising. This time they disabled my request a quote(messenger), and filtered all my call clicks so they came up as scam likely. I spent thousands all for nothing. Add insult to injury and we are almost a month into waiting for a manager to think I'm worth a phone call back. I don't write reviews often, and only when I've exhausted every other option. Don't advertise with them, use the free version.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for taking the time to review the Yelp app. You can reach our team directly here for assistance with any questions, comments, or concerns: https://bit.ly/3mOxzpv

scraped_reviews.content: This business deserves 0 stars. Do not use the "free trial" if you are a small business. They make it impossible to stop the payments that automatically happen after the free trial. They also have two separate products that they don't tell you about that you get charged for later without notice. It doesn't matter if you delete your account and page, charges still happen when you have no access to the page. Also, refunds are not guaranteed and take a week to consider!!!! big thumbs down here.

Do not pay for the ads!!!! I was able to start the ads at a set daily budget. They don't stick to the budget and charged more than 3X the amount of my set budget! On top of that, in order to cancel the ads, I was only given an 800 number (which if you are desperately training to stop them from hemeraging your bank account on the weekend, are out of luck, as they are closed.) I spoke with customer service and they wanted to send me a form for a refund for the days they weren't in the office. NO!!

I had a positive review from a client that they chose to not include for my stars. I can only assume it's because I'm not paying them. The sales rep was very misleading. Never believe gurantees for more work. I had several clicks for people looking at my pictures. But very few calls. Plus when people send a message, I wasn't able to respond on the app. I had to type my response in a different app, then copy & paste it from there. Complete waste of money. Will not give them another dime.

I do not recommend it. 0üåü. I listed my small business on Yelp Business, and they gave me a free ad spend, cool. we'll that ad spend ran out in less than 30 days, yet when I tracked it, it was still under budget of the given spend. charged me for that time plus more, and billing couldn't explain it. didn't refund me, and I got 0 traffic via phone/website from their ads over 3 months. complete waste of money. literally just through money down the toilet. please save yourself the time & money.

This app really is not good. I went through the entire business setup process on my laptop, listing my service categories and all appropriate details; upon downloading the app and checking out my profile, not only was all the info inputted on my business category gone, but it was listed under a completely different business category. Tried to edit everything back to how I originally set it up/how it needs to be, and after typing everything up, clicked save and got an error message. I'm over it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for taking the time to review the Yelp app. You can reach our team directly here for assistance with any questions, comments, or concerns: https://bit.ly/3mOxzpv

scraped_reviews.content: If I could give less than one star, I would. The promotions are misleading, making you pay more than you think you will. Even if there's almost no clients clicking on your page, they raise the price of click so they can charge you your full budget. The costumer service number almost never picks up, I think I was only able to reach them once, besides that it's just hours and hours on hold. They take DAYS to respond to the support emails, which is ridiculous for a big company like that.

I would give 0 stars if I there was an option. This service is not user-friendly; maybe if you pay for it, the site causes more frustration for your business than it helps, doesn't work well for mobile services, lists information that it states it will keep private, doesn't seem to have an option for business registered agents, bombards you with upgrade notifications and sales consultants, more or less waste time, and of course makes it difficult to delete an account. Would not recommend.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for taking the time to review the Yelp app. You can reach our team directly here for assistance with any questions, comments, or concerns: https://bit.ly/3mOxzpv

scraped_reviews.content: Kept calling me on the phone to sign up for free ad credits. He mentioned it was all free, and I wouldn't pay anything. Turns out this isn't the case. The credits are basically just a discount. Got charged a ridiculous amount automatically after a week. I'm pretty sure the leads I did receive weren't even real people, very few of them respond and their numbers go straight to a voicemail . Stay far away don't give a dime to yelp

They give a 300 dollar credit and when you decide to cancel they still charge you. It's happened twice, and all their customer support ask is can you prove it which of course you can't and they also don't give an option to remove your card. Had to do a charge back and change my debit card just to prevent this from happening again. Lots of potential if they weren't being so greedy. Be more open like Amazon's app and people would trust your company more.

Horrible customer service i have been calling for a week, still no answer. I'm currently on hold waiting for an hr so far. Don't fall for the last chance to get 300$ credit if you reactivate your ads.. I did it on the 27th by the first they hit me with a 60$ charge. And you can't get no one on the phone to help you get it fixed.. then the leeds you get seem fake because you get a request for a job and reply right away, and then you don't get any responses.

This is the MOST TERRIBLE, MONEY HUNGRY, AND PATHETIC COMPANY I've ever seen. When they're quoting that I would not be charge for ANYTHING ELSE besides when the ad being clicked on and not realizing it's over $8 per clicks. Also offered some type of free credits for me to list the ad for free and turned out I'm still being charged over hundreds of dollars for a couple of days the ad was active. The representative was also EXTREMELY RUDE! STAY AWAY FROM THIS COMPANY! Google is your best choice!

Beware scam service. They offered $300 credit trial. I received zero calls over three months. They back charged me when I went to cancel, approximately $300. The guy who was my main contact was extremely unreliable. He would consistently miss appointments and take over a week to respond. Also hasn't responded to my questions about the charges, and it's been over three weeks. I didn't think I'd find an advertising company worse than Angie's list.

I have not been getting app notifications, from Yelp, for months. I have gone in, through the app AND desktop, and toggled the preferences, and I even uninstalled/reinstalled the app, but it's still an issue. Needless to say, customers contact me, and unless I manually check my app and/or email messages, the lead stays there, sometimes - for days (according to what's going on, in my life); it's beyond frustrating. Also, it's been over 4 yrs, and I've not bought your ads, so PLEASE STOP CALLING!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for taking the time to review Yelp. We're sorry you're having trouble with receiving notifications for your business page. If you continue to encounter this issue, please let us know by contacting our team directly at feedback+android@yelp.com. From there we‚Äôll be better equipped to assist you.

scraped_reviews.content: The customer service for this app is horrendous. I had ads running a few months back, but I shut down all my products because I just wasn't seeing any results. Then earlier this week I got charged 300 for seemingly nothing. I didn't have any products. First day I called, I was on the phone for over 2 hours and they never respond. Then I called the number listed under the charge, and they told me they couldn't do anything. So they just sent me back to the over 2 hour wait number. Now I'm waiting.

Such a horrible experience. Please do not fall for their lie. I opened and account, even had a customer service rep. assisting me setting up everything and never mentioned about two payments, one of $200 and something and another one of $109 to be deducted from my account even before completing the month. Both payments were deducted the same month. I requested the refund and told them about the situation, they responded me by stating that they will review it and 7 days the declined the refund.

So I have a small little cleaning company . Just me, no one else and I do it as a second form of income. Almost all of the request for quotes I got were scams. They were 90% yelp accounts that had just been created, no 7 friends no picture, just the generic gray picture and some name. At first, I thought it was great, but once I realized what was going on, I just stopped responding. All of a sudden I owe them $ for leads where there was never a real person to contact. STRAIGHT GARBAGE.

I thought yelp was a great business tool, but it doesn't work for you unless you pay for ads to boost your page. If you get 5 star reviews they'll be taken down as they drive traffic to your page. You can't have your page removed unless you pay for ads. Cluttered interface, you don't have control of look and feel, you have to ask permission to change some things. It's frustrating. At least you get some traffic and can post photos. Ask questions before you list to see if it's a good fit or not.

I dont know whats been going on here, but after a really good start and impressing me with the level of customer support, that has all gone away. Supposedly my support agent has had some personal things to deal with, which is fine, but since then though ive had zero help. I wrote to ask about some billing issue im having and it beem two weeks with no reply. I want to cancel my account but theres no option for it. Stay away from this app. Its very shady.

Worst way to promote advertisement. Very expensive and not worth the number of business phone calls and messages I got. I was told I would get a free month of $600 boosted advertisement and that after the months up, it was supposed to automatically cancel on its own and that I wouldn't have to worry about being charged. The next month on the 1st, I was charged over $400 that left my personal card left in negatives. I verified repeatedly if this would happen. Also, wait times are horrible!

Horrible they always up the price for responses and then getting a refund is impossible even if it spam. Even after your charged your contact info is blocked for the customer. You'll spend way more money than you make. Don't do it. I got a call once for advertising and it came from a potential spam call number. There should be an option for negative stars.

I'm sure I'm not the only one who has seen something about *update* the app. I have done updates on other apps with and w/o reminders, and done so without any issues. My device is a good Samsung phone, plenty of room left for more apps if I need to add them. So there really is no reason to see some notation that says my device is not compatible with an update. Please CORRECT this as soon as possible. I don't want potential clients to be held back from contacting me, or having me reply.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry you're having trouble with the app! If you are continuing to encounter these issues, please let us know by reporting it here so we can assist you further: bit.ly/2fe0miu

scraped_reviews.content: Three is no 0 star otherwise I was going to put that. I opened an account for my new business and after a while they called me and asked me to give me an ad credit for 350$, while I didn't want it. So they got my card info and said it's going to be from your credit. Finally they charged me 218$ extra from my card for something I didn't want and even didn't give me 1 client. Called several times but nothing happened. Beside it, 3 of my new clients put review and all of them become not recommended

Bots. They use bots. People who contacted me within app, but no one ever called and that's how I was charged for clicks and them contacting me. Besides , the credit they offered me was stuck on "$81 of credit left' with no updates and then I was charged with payment the next day, why didnt it go down from $81 to lets say $50, $30, $10. I don't know how to describe it. Tech issues maybe

Call nonstop with pushy sales tactics as if that's not all you see on your account in the first place. To an extent, that's to be expected. What caught me off guard is the "Not Recommended" reviews. I have received five 5 star reviews, and somehow, four are not recommended and therefore not visible without scrolling to the bottom of the page. Doesn't seem like they're on your side as a small business owner unless you do the sponsored ads. Don't get your hopes up.

If i could give 0 stars i would. Dont pay for ads with yelp for business. It brought nothing in only charged about 600 bucks a month. Absolute rip off. The "upload a photo of your license" does not open.. youde think being able to verify a license would be pretty critical. But I've called about it alot of times and no fix.. not to mention yelp hides my good reviews. Rethink your marketing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry you're having trouble with the app! If you are continuing to encounter these issues, please let us know by reporting it here so we can assist you further: bit.ly/2fe0miu

scraped_reviews.content: Having a very difficult time with this. It keeps telling me to change my name in order to reply to customer reviews, even though it's my legal name on my account. I can't respond to our customer reviews because of this and it keeps giving me an error when I try it on the app and website. Not to mention there's absolutely zero way to try and get in contact with Yelp suppot. It only sends you to their support forms which is useless most the time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Rebecca, Sorry to hear you're having trouble. Can you get in touch with us at feedback+android@yelp.com so we can assist? Thanks for taking the time to write a review!

scraped_reviews.content: This company is completely fraudulent. They charged me $900 for ads that brought absolutely no results. I received no calls, no messages, and no new customers ‚Äî nothing at all in return for the money they took. When I tried to resolve the issue, their support was unhelpful and dismissive. Be very careful ‚Äî they lure you in with promises and then charge you for worthless advertising. Total scam!

this is a terrible app to run ads through. the interface is not the problem but theres a flat fee for the service (which is expected) and then they pile on additional fees and even when you are paying for this you have to pay to message some POTENTIAL clients that dont even respond to you... on top of that you can be blocked for responding to a request and when you ask for a refund because the customer is clearly not serious you cant even get that. $600 plus whatever you message. use Google ads

The APP is not formatted well for use on a cellphone. You cannot scroll and see what you are writing when responding to reviews or questions from customers. This makes it very inconvenient for a business owner to quickly respond to customers. Most of the time I wait until I have access to my laptop so I can properly respond.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for taking the time to review the Yelp app. You can reach our team directly here for assistance with any questions, comments, or concerns: https://bit.ly/3mOxzpv

scraped_reviews.content: When I touch a picture at the bottom of the picture gallery, it sometimes shows pictures that were removed by you at my request, or won't even show the picture that I touched!!! It instead shows the one next to it!! Makes me wonder, that if I can still see those pictures, perhaps the public can also!!! üëéüèª ALSO, it still takes away good, LEGIT reviews!!! Took already over 15!!!!!! If they would fix these screw-ups, people would love the app! üëéüèªü§¶üèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

scraped_reviews.content: such a cumbersome platform. nearly impossible to communicate with clients. cannot put my ACTUAL business type because it doesn't exist in Yelp's pre-determined list. would not recommend. updated 8-31-25 this app is still terrible. I get an email telling me I have a new lead. I click on it, and it takes me to another window that says "would you like to respond to the message?" yet doesn't actually show me the message??? Again, a very cumbersome app. Anyone using this for business in crazy.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for taking the time to review the Yelp app. You can reach our team directly here for assistance with any questions, comments, or concerns: https://bit.ly/3mOxzpv

scraped_reviews.content: Yelp created questions for potential clients that do not apply to my business and will not allow them to be changed. Bad enough, but I am convinced they are sending me bogus leads in an attempt to get me to sign up for their service. I get nearly daily "leads", respond to them promptly and on the rare occasion that I get a reply at all, it is that the service is no longer needed. can voint on one hand the number of leads that panned out in the 13 years listed.

warning!! if you sign up you will get never ending telemarketer calls, 2 customers in 2 months. then if you do get a customer that leaves a review their software will flag and remove it!! only bigger companies get to have reviews posted. they want you to pay for this abysmal service AND on top of that, purchase leads! what a horrible waste of money!! I remember when Yelp used to be there to help the little guy, or thats what i thought, nope, they've turned into a scam too. very sad. -5 stars!

popup for add services interferes with app and unable to reply in mobile app to customers only on laptop. support couldn't help steer clear of yelp unless you like frustrations in reply to helps reply i have reported issue and support could not correct app only works properly on computer won't on android phone the page to allow you to respond to a lead is not available on mobile app
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry you're having trouble with the app! If you are continuing to encounter these issues, please let us know by reporting it here so we can assist you further: bit.ly/2fe0miu

scraped_reviews.content: wont show good reviews unless paid. it's all a scam and it needs removed from the playstore. a lot of others say the same thing. they say contact us but they don't respond.

I did my due diligence and was aware of the advertisement overselling and spam. the first sales email I got contained lies that even if someone gave a cursory glance, they would have known better. "I can see you haven't logged in in a long time" um, no I did this morning and I created it 2 days prior. "ha well wanna buy some ads?" from you? Try a little research next time sales bot. deceptive, shady but local and worth establishing a presence on if you own a business

The market of people that use Yelp are pretty wide. There are losts of great people out there. As a business, it is very helpful that I can pause the advertising when I am backed up with jobs and need some time to get through the business already scheduled.
This app and website have been largely useless, and getting support to log in when my account access randomly stopped working has been an exercise in futility.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for taking the time to review the Yelp app. You can reach our team directly here for assistance with any questions, comments, or concerns: https://bit.ly/3mOxzpv

scraped_reviews.content: This was the worst experience that I've had. As soon as my page and Yelp ad was online, spam calling never stopped. Up to 40 spam calls per day on average, and I have no time to pick up sales calls now and it was so bad that I decided to close the Yelp page, of course Yelp did not help at all and I don't know if they will refund me. Anyway, I thought I'd drop this review here to all small business owners, especially in this domain, go to Angi, it's not worth it here at all not recommended.

BUSINESSES BEWARE: I have been attempting to cancel my business advertisements on this app for over a week and half. I had called several times and was left on hold for well over 20 minutes unable to reach anyone beside the initial "can I have your name and the business you are calling about". Then on the first of the month I was charged for the advertisement services I had been attempting cancel. This isn't the first time I've been unable to reach customer service for assistance. yelp is scam

I SPECIFICALLY SEARCHED FOR FREE AD APPS AND I FIND YET Another app designed to steal your information... I went through and set up everything only to find out at the end that I've only got 2 hours of free ads and in order to actually post an ad even for that 2 hours, they require a credit card... liars don't do it unless you can pay.

although I used the free business yelp.( First off, the app is quite easy to use, might I add). I got this as a test run.*1 month* But, I keep getting pressed into buying a package deal.Calls come crazy to buy a package. I have a few hits, but I also have gotten a lot of scam leads. I have also gotten scam emails. Asking for Name,sex,address, etc. The fu thing is right when i get those leads.i get a call from Yelp asking if I am i ready to sign up for Yelp leads. I'm not pleased with this. Sorry

Opened and closed my page within 5 days, they didnt confirm my claim to the page and called every single day to advertise instead of solving my issue. they would continue to talk even though I told them I'm not available at that time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for taking the time to review the Yelp app. You can reach our team directly here for assistance with any questions, comments, or concerns: https://bit.ly/3mOxzpv

scraped_reviews.content: Got a few phone calls after spending $1.5k+ on advertising for a few months. it was a trial didn't work out but im giving them 1 star because I canceled services at beginning of June yet kept getting charged $180 a month for a "business upgrade" they claim i signed up for the day I ended my advertisements? why would I sign up for a business upgrade after I ended advertising with you, makes zero sense! I called their customer support and they wouldn't give me a refund or at least credit
Lower your prices. Price Gouging at its finest. YELP seems to not be Small Business friendly. Will be posting on all platforms and updating as they update their software. cause this is NOT it. SMH.
they try any way they can for you to give them money and make it extremely difficult to cancel any subscriptions and when you do they still make you pay for that month in full.
YELP has truly lost a lot of credibility. In August, I paid almost $200 for four leads, and none of them responded to my messages. The app has become a complete scam.

summary: Read Manga, Comics & Manhwa of Romance, Action, Fantasy, Drama, BL and more!

scraped_reviews.content: The app has a way to gain gems for free, but it can take months to get enough saved up to read a single comic. Most comics start free, then make you watch ads to read 5 comics a day, before it straight up won't let read anymore without paying with real money currency. Everything costs a lot. Even their premium membership only gets you 26 comics for the entire month. The comics are so short you could finish that in an hour. Such a disappointment
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, there. We are sorry for the inconvenient you encountered. Can you please contact us through the feedback section? We can talk about more details and we will improve it in the future. Thanks!(‡∏Öœâ‡∏Ö*)

scraped_reviews.content: it's okay, in my opinion. There's a good variety of options to read, but my main problem is that many of the stories use the premium option or gems to be able to access episodes, and it is hard to earn said gems. I know that this is probably good for the artists sake (I've heard that many artists use ads and stuff to get paid when making these) but it's disappointing (in my opinion) to start a good series, only to find out 1 third in, that I have to use a currency I don't have, to read it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi friend! Thank you for loving our comics! Gems can help support the creators behind your favorite comics and protect their rights. And we're improving the reward system for a smoother experience! Our [Daily Free] updates free comics every day‚Äîcomplete series and daily previews ready for you to enjoy! Check it out! üåü

scraped_reviews.content: The WUF timer constantly unlocks the chapter that I've just read and gets wasted. Plus there's tons of stories that can only be unlocked with gems, but the chapters are ridiculously short and a lot of the stories don't seem very high quality either to be worth the money/effort. The coins are virtually useless too, with like 3000 converting into .1 gems, an insultingly low amount lol. The 'Unlock with gems' banner also appears very abruptly when scrolling and I accidentally wasted 100 gems once.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi friend! Thank you for your feedback! Please note that when you open a comic, it will resume from the chapter you last read. And our team is working to improve the reward system for a smoother experience. Stay tuned!

scraped_reviews.content: I've mostly enjoyed using this app, but won't be subscribing again next year. Premium free content aren't available for offline reading. Offline reading is important to me as I have an underground commute without access to the internet. There's some quality control issues with translations. If I can find a title on another app, I usually read it there for that reason.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello friend. Thank you for your suggestion, we have noted it down and will consider it in the coming future. (*‚âß‚ñΩ‚â¶)

scraped_reviews.content: Okay, Webcomic is a great app to read Mangas. I enjoy the way in which we have to obtain coins then transfer them to gems to continue reading or wait a day to read again but I do wish they would finish some of the mangas (I've only read one so far and it was incomplete). Other than that, I look forward to reading others! :>

Needing lots of gems aside (I use many apps so this is normal for me), my biggest issue is the translations. Typos, incorrect pronoun usage, wrong synonyms (to, too, and two or example), and sometimes the bad grammar itself requiring me to do mental gymnastics. Not all series have bad translations though, so it's inconsistent across the app. I'm able to read on, but it does get a bit annoying if you binge read like I do. I found a lot of fun series I couldn't find elsewhere, so that's a plus!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry for the inconvenience you encountered. We will improve the translation quality. If you encounter any translation problems during the reading process, you can tell us the title, the chapter number, and contact us through the feedback section with a screenshot. We will correct it asap. At the same time, you can also report the issue. Thanks. ‚ù§

scraped_reviews.content: I've used this app for about 1 year now and back then, you could unlock comic chapters with coins (which you can get for free) but now a lot of the comics cost gems (which cost real money) I know it's how the authors make money but I have stopped reading many of my favorite comics because of this. I wish we could go back. :( The description on the app also says "FREE comics" but that doesn't seem the case. If you want to read actual free comics I suggest webtoon, but that's just my opinion.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello there.Due to the author's request, some comics require gems unlock.The author needs to rely on income to create and live.But we'll tell your suggestions to the authors.There are also many excellent comics on our platform that support using coins or watching videos to unlock.You can still read comics for free.Thank you very much for your use!‚ù§

scraped_reviews.content: I truly wish I never updated it. Ever since I updated the app, I can't finish any of the stories I was reading before. There is no longer an option to unlock with coins for most stories anymore. You have to unlock it with gems that cost money now. I was in the middle of reading some really good books but now I can't finish them. Plus the fact that coins can expire now. I am very disappointed in WebComics. Fix this mistake. I love this app but it's really frustrating.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Some of our comics are only available for gem-unlocking  according to the author's request.Some of our authors are devoting their efforts, working day and night in order to bring us the newest content,but they can barely make ends meet.We will provide more ways to unlock comics in the future.If you have more questions,you can contact us by email‚ù§

scraped_reviews.content: Great app! Wonderful community, you can post things and read lots of content. Guys! I know you have to read with coins after like 15-20 chapters, but I'm not joking you. It's easy to earn and there are ads you can watch to unlock them. Very accessible! I prefer this more than webtoon for some reason. Lots of different kinds of stories! There is a choice to read all comics for $6.99 a month (3.99 for first), but that is an option. Go free if you want. It's fine! Super easy! :)

I've reviewed this app before, and it was a 5. But now? You can read a lot of different stories with unique storylines and beautiful character designs, but that doesn't matter if you can't read the whole comic. Many comics that I've been following for quite sometime, into the 100's of chapters, are now 'Gems Only' without access to being able to watch ads. I'm no longer able to read a comic I wasted my coins on. I understand you have to help the artists, but screwing over the readers isn't right
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello there. Some comics require gems-unlocking due to the author's request. Creating comics need a lot of hard working, hope you can understand authors.
And we will provide free comics (all chapters are free) every day , please follow the„ÄêFree Now„Äësection. 
Please go to the„ÄêDaily Free Coins„Äësection to collect FREE Coins and Gems. Thank you!(*‚ù¶œâ‚ù¶)

scraped_reviews.content: It use to be good when everything was free, or costed coins. If you want some jems, you would have to pay doing a offer. Only if you want a lot of jems, though. They don't give us a lot of options. They barely give you a day, or three to read for free. Like literally... I haven't been able to read for almost a month because every comic cost jems. I try to get 1-3 days to read for free, but of course I can't. You need to have premium to do so. Which is paying them every month. Money chasing app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, friend. Thanks so much for your reaching out. We can understand your feelings. We will consider providing more chances for reading free comics. Hope you have a good day. ‡∏Ö'œâ'‡∏Ö

scraped_reviews.content: I used to love this app. I would stay up reading, waiting for updates and adding more and more comics to my favorites list so I'd have something new to read everyday. I even signed up for the subscription because it was worth it. But since the update in February, I haven't read anything. I'm still a premium subscriber but it costs to read anything, the coupons are useless. I have yet to find any comic where I could use them, even the once for specific comics. This app is not worth it anymore.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, friend. Please upgrade your app to the latest version. Not only can you collect free gems in the Free Gems section; you can also exchange coins for gems in the MALL section. And you could also read free comics in the Free section of Discover page. We will provide more free ways to read comics. Thank you so much for your feedback. (*‚ù¶œâ‚ù¶)

scraped_reviews.content: I think this app is great. Right off the bat I recieved 5000 coins and I thought that was great! Then, when you read a comic, the first 20 (depends on the comic, some are more some are less) are free. After that, you have to use the coins and unless you are reading 1000 comics at once you are able to easily pay it off (10-25 coins). The app works almost flawlessly. My only critic is to make it easier to follow comic creators (and others)!!

Used to be able to at least somewhat keep up with 2 or 3 comics that I really liked, but even then it took way too much time. The amount of wasted time to watch well over 10 commercials, followed by waiting around and hoping to maybe get a free day is just insane. I have been an avid reader for well over 2 years and have only gotten a free day twice and a free 3 days once. Paying for anything is way too expensive. Now the coins option is gone. Will be deleting if that is not fixed soon.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello friend, thank you for your feedback. We have made some changes in our new version, but we will add more benefits for readers in the future. Stay tuned. Thank you and have a lovely day! (*‚âß‚ñΩ‚â¶)

scraped_reviews.content: I downloaded this app with high expectations, so to be honest, maybe it was my fault that it didn't meet them. The format is great, and it very easy to use. Its the comics that let me down. There's little to none good fantasy comics, a section that should be filled. And it feels like every art style is the same too. I get it, this type is popular, but what's up with the insane amount of romance? Maybe it's just me, but this app was disapointing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Megan Malsky. Thank you for your feedback. We release different kinds of comics every week. Hope you can find comics you're interested in. And if it's convenient for you, could you rate 5 stars for us? Your priceless Five Stars will always motivate us to make WebComics better! (*‚ù¶œâ‚ù¶)  -Nichole

scraped_reviews.content: From 5 to 1 star. This was an amazing place to read comics, and there were never problems. Before you payed in coins that were easy to collect if you logged on daily. Gems were an optional thing in which you pay to get special accesses. Now, there are so many coins but not enough gems. Nearly every comic I'm reading has turned to gems. I can only read if I get a free day- bad bc collecting is longer than reading. This app is only good if you can pay or waste time and storage playing games.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello there. According to the author's request, some comics require gems-unlocking. Creation is a difficult process, hope you can understand the authors. We will consider adding new unlocking methods other than gems-unlocking to provide readers with opportunities to read new comics as much as possible. Stay tuned. Thank you for your feedback!(*‚ù¶œâ‚ù¶)

scraped_reviews.content: Well it used to be good, but then they updated it so that you need coins to even read the comics now. Even then, good is kind of a strong word, seeing that almost every comic I have read on the platform has numerous grammatical errors and translation errors. I'm no grammar professor, but if you want me to pay for the content that you allow on the platform, perhaps consider hiring a better translation team, as well as a localization team.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: hi,Timothy Shekerko,hi,thank you for your feedback. At the request of the copyright owner of comics,some chapters need paying coins or gems for reading.And at the new version, we adjust the coin system. As for grammatical errors, we are working hard to make it better. Translation is not that easy, so,plz, I hope you can get it.

scraped_reviews.content: So this app used to be cool. You could subscribe for 60$ for the year and read every comic then, no extra money. Now it is way expensive and I'm disappointed. Look comics cost between $60 and $100 to read to completion on these sites when they aren't even physical copies. I can get a lot more physical copies of comics with more pages for way less. In response to webcomic's response: my problem is that you're over charging. I understand how the new method works. I'm saying it's a scam now.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, there. The Premium is a brand-new feature(differentiate from the old membership "Plus"). After subscribing to premium, you can enjoy multiple privileges, such as getting gems and coins gift packages, Read in advance, claim free comics every week, No-ads, etc. We will consider adding more Premium privileges in the future. (‡∏Öœâ‡∏Ö*)

scraped_reviews.content: Don't waste your time. Many of the stories aren't translated professionally and are confusing. Others have panels in the wrong order. And very few are "free" and I'm fine with watching adds to get tickets or coins or whatever to do my part to support. But they have it so you get 1/3 through a comic with tickets or ads then all of a sudden it only takes gems. No warning either. It's just a terrible customer experience. Worse if you buy premium you don't even get full access.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, friend. Comics require gems-unlocking due to the authors' request. Hope you can understand. Please upgrade your app to the latest version. You can collect free gems and exchange coins for gems in the MALL section. You can read free comics in the Free section. We will provide more free ways to read comics. Thank you or your feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: I am going to at least give this app a three star for the creators and will take this time to say that "Stay With the CEO" and "Minty Summer" will always hold a special place in my heart. That, and when I first got this app, it was AMAZING!!! However, I came to get very disappointed when comic after comic after comic became pay-to-read only, and by the time I got through deleting the ones that I could no longer get via coins, I was down to three comics. I want to give a better rating but can't.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, friend. Thanks so much for your support. Some comics require gems-unlocking due to the authors' request. Creation is a difficult process. Hope you can understand the authors. But you can collect free gems in the Daily Free Coins&Gems section; you can also read free comics in the Free section of Discover page. (*‚ù¶œâ‚ù¶)

scraped_reviews.content: Disappointing. I've had this app for a while and it was wonderful! But now everything costs gems which costs money. They added a way to get gems but it's a waste of time trying to download a game andreach the certain level needed just to read a chapter. And sometimes the rewards won't go through. Stories I've been reading since the beginning now cost gems and I'm unable to continue. Definitely not worth the hassle of getting involved in a story anymore.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello there. You can collect free gems by inviting friends. We will add more unlocking methods in the future. If you encounter problems in the process of collecting gems, you can contact us through the Feedback section and provide us with screenshots. We will check for you.(*‚ù¶œâ‚ù¶)

scraped_reviews.content: I used to really like this app, but then they changed to gems instead of watching ads for free chapters or coins for chapters. Now, it is almost not worth using the app anymore. Most of the comics have switched to wanting gems which you have to buy (or play games for or something, which I just don't have time to do considering I have several comics to read). I will probably just delete the app and go with a different one. It used to be much better. I wish they hadn't changed it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello there. Some comics require gems-unlocking due to the author's request. We cannot change the author's decision. But we added a new way to get free gems. Please upgrade the APP to the latest version, and then go to the Discover page-Daily Free Coins section to collect free gems. We'll add more ways to collect free gems and coins. Thanks.(*‚ù¶œâ‚ù¶)

scraped_reviews.content: I really love this app and I've been following a lot of the older comics but they've started to charge gems. I was hoping there would be a feature where when a chapter costs gems, there would be a coin cost too. The coin cost can be way more than the gem cost, I would say about 1000-3000 maybe? I have a lot of coins that I don't use so I think it would be great for me to finally have a use for them. Of course, you don't have to agree but I'm just suggesting some ideas. Overall, I love this app!

This isn't the worst comic reading app on the play store, but I certainly wouldn't rank it among the best either. I have spent a few $ on it already, so can speak as a paying user. The comic selection is very good with lots of titles and genres. The main problem is the currency (there's 2 different kinds as well as reading tickets) which gets confusing. On top of that there's a subscription service. The translations aren't always the best either, with lots of grammatical errors.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello there. In order to provide you with better service, could you please give us more details about the translations part? Or some suggestions? If convenient, you can contact us at webcomics@sidewalkgroup.com. Look forward to your letter. (*‚ù¶œâ‚ù¶)

scraped_reviews.content: It's a good app, but the coins can get frustrating. I understand that it needs to gain money somehow and using coins to unlock the chapters is probably the best way, but it was easier before. Still, I really like Webcomics because some of the characters almost feel real (I sure wish some of them were) and most of the funny situations are actually relatable. Above all though, other than the coins, it's great to download.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. We can understand you. We will also try to offer more free ways to unlock chapters and hold more activities for you to gain more Coins in the future. And if it's convenient for you, could you rate 5 stars for us? Your priceless 5 stars will always motivate us to make WebComics better!(*‚ù¶œâ‚ù¶)  -Zoey

scraped_reviews.content: Very interesting comics! However, after the update, the app became very frustrating. Whenever there is a new comic, it will ALWAYS be locked with gems. The novels are always locked with gems too. I know that the app includes a feature to earn gems by playing games, but that just didn't work for me. In addition, I have a tiny problem. Can you add a feature where we can log in with an account, so we don't lose our progress when reading on a different device?üôè
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, there. You could go to the Discover page -Daily Free Coins section-Free Gems section to collect free gems. We'll add more ways to collect free gems and coins. Reading records are kept locally. So when you change your phone, your reading history cannot be synchronized. Thank you for your feedback and have good day!(*‚ù¶œâ‚ù¶)

scraped_reviews.content: I have no problem with the current app, other than the auto scroll got removed, which is really a shame, because I used it all the time. There are also more ads right now, than in previous version, but you're not forced to watch them. I also love how the chapters are now an infinite scroll between each chapter, makes life a lot easier. I love the app for having plenty of romance genre comics to read. It's a shame though that the ones I love the most usually get dropped without any notice.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we've now turned off auto-scroll feature. But we will consider whether or not to let this feature back. Thank you for your feedback.‚ï∞(*¬¥Ô∏∂`*)‚ïØ‚ô°

scraped_reviews.content: It has a wide selection to read. Sonetimes coins are hard to come by without purchasing. I've experienced a few times where one of the comics I am reading is missing a lot of pages ( they are all blank pages) no matter what I do, I can not get those pages to appear and end up missing key points of the story. Another issue i have is, in order to re-read certain stories, you have to repurchase the chapter. As someone who likes to re-read the previous chapter as a refresher, I find it aggravating.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello there. We will hold more events to get coins. Could you please contact us by webcomics@sidewalkgroup.com or Feedback section? We would like to know more details about your problem, if convenient, could you please provide us with the screenshots? This allows us to solve your problem faster.Thanks!‚ù§

scraped_reviews.content: I used to love this app! Good comics, easy currency, not too many ads. Now, it's all ads. Everything that used to be free requires you to watch an ad now. They've also added ads to the ends of each chapter. Basically, now if you want any coins (even the daily ones just for opening the app or the 10 reward coins for reading for 5 minutes) you have to watch an ad. I was fine with it when it was just ads on chapters and to unlock chapters, but they've gone too far. üò§
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, there. Videos can allow users to unlock comics for free. We have recorded your suggestion. We will consider making improvements in the future. Thank you very much for your feedback. And if it's convenient for you, could you rate 5 stars for us? Your priceless 5 stars will always motivate us to make WebComics better!(*‚ù¶œâ‚ù¶)  -Zoey

scraped_reviews.content: The general story lines Iof the five or six I read read were ok, but there were a lot of issues I couldn't over look. Grammar was awful, characteristics would randomly change (hair color and style, eye color and shape, things like that), stories could be inconsistent, felt rushed, and some thing's just didn't make sense. I understand most of these are armature made, but people should try to take more pride and put more time into what they publish. I don't want to wade through a dozen rotten manga to find one good one. And unfortunately the ones I read were on the 'hottest' list, so I don't see them getting much better.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Simi Barnes. Thank you for your suggestion very much! They are really important for us! We're trying to improve our translation and the quality of comics. If you have any detailed suggestion for us, please tell us through email or feedback. Your priceless advice motivate us to make WebComics better.  Could you rate 5 stars for us?   -Nichole

scraped_reviews.content: It's okay. While there is quite a large collection of every genre, I would argue that the comics are mediocre at best and abysmal at worst. I find that most of the comics have plain, cliche, overused storylines, and the art just seems to keep recycling itself in every comic. To be fair, considering that this is a free app with free comics, the grammatical error filled translations are expected, and the below-average, nothing-special comics (with a few gems, I must admit) are not necessarily unappealing if one is into mindless, harmless comics. The app itself is very easy to navigate with large features and quick, smooth transitions. I honestly think the app itself, disregarding the stories, is quite advanced and probably makes up for its large range of nothings. TL;DR: Decent, mostly bad stories, but nice features.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thank you for your feedback. We'll try our best to improve both our contents and translation. And we will add more different kinds of comics every week. Hope you can find comics you're interetsed in. If it's convenient for you, could you rate 5 stars for us? Your priceless Five Stars will motivate us to make WebComics better! (*‚ù¶œâ‚ù¶)  -Nichole

scraped_reviews.content: The selection of comics to choose from is very good so no matter what you're looking for, you'll find something that peaks your interest pretty easily. My only complaint is the chapter unlocking system. Sometimes, comics will suddenly switch from allowing the chapter to be purchased with coins or gems to just gems and even remove the option to unlock with an ad. I could've looked over this and given 5 stars if ads weren't something that could be removed as an unlocking option. The same applies to how there's a limited amount of ads that you can watch. (I don't get how you can just run out)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello.Due to the author's request, some comics require gems unlock.The author needs to rely on income to create and live.Hope you can understand the authors.There are also many excellent comics on our platform that support using coins or watching videos to unlock.And we will advise the ad provider to add more ads.Thank you very much for your use!‚ù§

scraped_reviews.content: This is s a pretty good comic app. You can immediately scroll to the next chapter, and the updates are decently frequent, you aren't likely to wait half a year to read that one comic.       However, you are required to pay for some comics with coins. Luckily these are easily required every 5 minutes, or even from just signing in.       Adding to that, there are a few comics that you can find on other comics. It pays for that by making it easy to find the comics it contains, sometimes updating faster than others.       I feel that the thing that annoys me most is that the grammar in the comic is fairly lacking, making the comics sometimes not as effective as they could be.        Even though it has all these cons, it makes up for it with its interesting art, good stories, and quick updates. I really hope this app can make a website so I can find this on my computer as well.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: hi, we are trying to improve our translation.plz,wait. we will become better! And as for website, we got one. You can google it.

scraped_reviews.content: The comics are okay. The story lines are (very) repetitive but updates are frequent. However, the translation is sometimes hard to understand. The number one thing: the comics never load on WiFi if I'm outside the house. Even if I'm at full bars nothing will load, but as soon as I start using data, the panels load in less than a second. Another big issue for me is the poor customer service. I've emailed and used the app to send feedback but after a few exchanged messages they stop replying.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: hi,Flame Ember. sorry about that. As for the email, we may miss that. agian,sorry. We'v replied back. You can check it.

scraped_reviews.content: I like the concept of the feature they are adding soon where you can add comments to the frames as well as the comic overall.  The stories are really interesting, and most of the art is amazing. As for the kinda slow update schedule, I have a life, sadly, so I can't always binge when I want to anyway.  And each time a comic updates, it's a surprise on which one it is,. *zooms in to 125% cause I just realized I can't see anything I'm typing*  As for the design of the app itself, I wish there was a night mode, where the white turns black, and the pinks, blue or yellow, that way when I do binge read, my eyes aren't dying anymore than they already are. Changing chapters is a little tedious though. When you tap the screen in the comments section (cause you know you're gonna read some comments), the page will oftentimes move up or down instead of showing the tap at top or bottom. A side swipe feature to change the chapter like turning a page would be more beneficial and sleek. As for the coin thing, I don't understand the purpose. I'm getting paid to use the app as you can exchange coins for merchandise, it's a waste of time & $ on the developers' part.  Great app, room for improvement.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, the perfect screwup. Thank you for your previous suggestions! We've recorded your suggestions and we will improve our app! And if it's convenient for you, could you rate 5 stars for us? Your priceless Five Stars will always motivate us to make WebComics better! (*‚ù¶œâ‚ù¶)  -Nichole

scraped_reviews.content: Great app I love the comics so much!! There are a few problems though like when I watch an add to get a reward, unlock a comic, and even get extra coins it won't give me them. Worst part is that sometimes the same adds apear multiple times and does the same thing. There is also times when comics get repeated, have no text, and are not even translated. Don't know if it's just my phone that's why I give it 5 stars, other than that it's an amazing app!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Regarding video, do you send us a screenshot of the video via email? Let's see what video is? In addition, you can send us feedback about the comics and translation issues through the toolbar of the reader. We will solve this problem in time. Thank you very much! ‚ô•(‡πë> ‚ÇÉ <)‚ô•

scraped_reviews.content: Pretty good, could be better interface, but lots of cute comics and the purchase system is pretty simple Edit: It's been some years now. Lucky spin no longer yields the "read free" tickets. It shows them on the wheel, but I haven't won one in at least a year, despite trying daily for months. That alone is immensely disappointing. All the types of currency are annoying, and I have no use for red tickets as they don't seem to effect any stories I read. Whenever i watch an ad, it plays 2 back2back
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for your support! „ÉΩ(‚âß‚àÄ‚â¶)Ôæâ

scraped_reviews.content: As many others here have said the app has completely changed from how it used to be. You can find most of the same comics on other apps for free or for cheaper. I understand it's "per author request" but it is an inconvenience to most readers. I recommend Webtoon instead, it's free and has a very wide variety of genres and art styles. I know where to find the free section but there isn't always something for everyone there, very disappointing, already deleted
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, friend. Comics require gems-unlocking due to the authors' request. Creation is a difficult process. Hope you can understand the authors. But you can collect free gems in the Free Gems section; you can also read free comics in the Free section of Discover page. Thanks so much for reaching out. (*‚ù¶œâ‚ù¶)

scraped_reviews.content: This app has a lot of good comics on it, I have been using it for a long time now, but recently they upped the price for red tickets from 200 to 350 coins for 1 ticket. Granted they give you coins everyday but on average only around 400 to 500 coins and you have to watch 17 ads(actual number) to get them. So, it's very difficult to read more than one or two chapters of a comic a day without spending money. This was my favorite comic app but is no longer and I'm going to delete it. üôÉ ~CharlieYT
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, there. We adjusted that one chapter unlocked by one red ticket. So the price of the red ticket has been adjusted. Hope you can understand. We are considering adding more ways to read for free. Stay tuned. You can also read free comics in the Free section. (*‚ù¶œâ‚ù¶)

scraped_reviews.content: I used to LOVE this app so much, I'm literally on it daily. Yet they're changing things way to constantly that it's becoming annoying to use. Paying for chapters is fine but they don't really give an easy way to get a decent amount of coins. Then with the membership, which i purchased when they first added it, just keep going up in price to the point where it's not even worth it anymore.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: hi,I know it's not that easy to get coins and you guys love reading these books. It's not easy to wait. But we working hard to adjusting this system,plz wait. You will see a better WebComics in the future.‡∏Ö'œâ'‡∏Ö

scraped_reviews.content: This app is great I love it. But, before when you hit a locked chapter all you had to do was exchange some coins to unlock or watch a video. It was that easy. If you could maybe consider doing that again ot would be very helpful. And honestly it's not fair how in 90 days the coins you have already collect will be expired saving coins isnt hard whatsoever but saving up to a lot takes time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello there. Thank you very much for your feedback, we have recorded it now. If you have more questions, you can contact us by email. We can discuss more details together.(*‚ù¶œâ‚ù¶)

scraped_reviews.content: At first I wasn't sure if I'd like this app, but after using it for a while I'm in love. There are tons of ways to get coins, and if you don't want to spend coins just watch a short ad for free. They even have a plus program where for a monthly fee all comics are unlocked. I'm now a plus member and I don't see myself changing that anytime soon. Other apps like this I've tried don't even come close to this one, I 100% recommend this to anyone who likes reading web comics.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: hi,Cassandra Karls.Thank you for your support very much! (‡πë¬¥„ÖÇ`‡πë)  -Zoey

scraped_reviews.content: First off, the art IS really high quality. I'll give it that much at least. However, the level of plot is generally pretty trash. I'm not saying there are no good ones, because there are a few I read religiously, but the majority are really cliche and all are the same thing over and over. Comics need good art AND story. Without both it isn't worth reading. I'm not expecting amazing, but at least good enough that I won't be thinking, haven't I read this before? The app itself works well enough.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi,Kirsty Remedios.Thank you for your suggestion.We'll improve our contents in the future. Please look forward to them! Hope you can continue to support us!And if it's convenient for you, could you rate 5 stars for us? Your priceless Five Stars will always motivate us to make WebComics better! (‡πë¬¥„ÖÇ`‡πë)  -Zoey

scraped_reviews.content: Well, what can I say other than I see bl, I want the bl. It's quite great and I love the comics! There's so many to choose from! However, you have to pay for gems to pass through ads and then to read some other comics. I have to come back every day, it's a great strategy! But when you pay for gems, you're using real money. And you only get 5 ads each day to read the comics that are limited. However, I still love it, and always will!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello friend. Thanks for your kindly understanding. Have a nice day. (*‚ù¶œâ‚ù¶)

scraped_reviews.content: You need coins to read later chapters and the majority of the comics are of poor quality storytelling/art(many of them look similar like they're made by the same artist). I recommend Webtoons as an alternative, they handle 'coins' in a better way and the ads are almost nonexistent. Also, they only notify you of chapter updates and rare special events, unlike Webcomics which will give you a notification for anything even when you have the alert turned off.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello there. We will work hard to add more different styles of comic works. At the same time, you can upgrade the APP to the latest version, the new version has a more precise push settings button. For advertising issues, you can contact us through the feedback section and we will check for you.‚ù§

scraped_reviews.content: This used to be my favorite web comic platform. It had so many wonderful stories qnd the artwork was always beautiful. BUT now it is too expensive to read on it. What once was one of the less costly apps has now become one of the most expensive. I would read multiple stories at a time but now can't afford to finish many of the ones I've started because it's too costly. I wish it wasn't as expensive as it is now. I feel bad to have recommended it to so many people. Now I just purchase mangas.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, friend. Comics require gems-unlocking due to the authors' request. Creation is a difficult process. Hope you can understand the authors. But you can collect free gems in the Free Gems section; you can also read free comics in the Free section of Discover page. Thanks so much for reaching out.(*‚ù¶œâ‚ù¶)

scraped_reviews.content: I've read some good comics on here and I find the costs for reading chapters is reasonable compared to other similar apps and mostly I just watch ads. some of the translated comics are not translated very well though and there's just generally lots of grammar mistakes (sometimes to the point it's hard to understand what they mean)... it's sort of hit or miss wrt that, but it's free so it doesn't hurt to just check what they have
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. We are trying to improve our translation. Would you like to help us translate comics? If you are, please leave us your E-mail address.

scraped_reviews.content: I love it!!! My favorite stories are in the passion section...Vampire Adonis &, Handsome and cute. Although, I notice that frequently there are grammatical errors, I nevertheless am in love with the graphics, plots, and options. However, I would like to address the fact that, when you think about the prizes you remember the few words... Busy, use his when you think of the prices of the aforementioned. Also, the word options come to mind in for said prizes because, you offer to little. Four to five choices is only so much to look forward to. Now, I feel as though you've created this app splendidly and it's worth 5stars but, here is always room for improvement. Good luck and I'm looking forward to the updates and new manga recruits. thanks.

This app was working quite well, but then the points that I had saved up for a very long time suddenly disappeared. When I messaged the app assistance line I was told the amount I had was the only amount there was and I must be mistaken. I even brought up that all the point transactions were recorded in my history, the app just said I had no points. I am unsure of the exact amount I had, but I know it was over 5,000 because I had been saving them up to get a panda plushie. I am very pleased with app reading and notification, but I do not like being offered a point system then being told that I must be mistaken after my points disappear.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Disney_rocks _always. Sorry for inconvenience. Please contact us through feedback and email. We will solve your problem asap. And if it's convenient for you, could you rate 5 stars for us? Your priceless Five Stars will always motivate us to make WebComics better! (*‚ù¶œâ‚ù¶)  -Nichole

scraped_reviews.content: I used to love this app and I still do. It just that, since the new layout and having to get a membership to be able to read further and waiting at least 5 days to read if u don't have a membership. Is making me less likely to use this app. Some comics only use gems up to a certain point in the comic which is surely disappointing. Although I understand the authors need to generate income for them to continue.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thank you for your feedback. Earlier access to chapters is a special service to PLUS. Non-PLUS can also read these chapters, but you'll have to wait a little bit longer.We will consider adding unlocking methods other than unlocking with gems in the future, and consider holding more discounts. Thank you for your use!‚ù§

title: Key Collector Comics
description:
Key Collector Comics: Unlock the Full Spectrum of Comic Books - Specializing in Key Issues!

Your Ultimate Guide to the Comic Universe ‚Äì Key and Beyond
Key Collector Comics isn't just about "Key" comic books; it's a treasure trove for all comic enthusiasts. While we specialize in identifying and cataloging key issues ‚Äì those pivotal comics that mark first appearances, iconic cover arts, and crucial storylines ‚Äì our app also offers an expansive database encompassing the entire spectrum of comic books.

Why Key Collector Comics Stands Out

‚Ä¢ Specialized in Key Comics: Unmatched expertise in flagging key issues that define characters and shape comic lore.
‚Ä¢ A Universe of Comics: Access an all-inclusive database, featuring both key and non-key comic books.
‚Ä¢ Complimentary Collection Management: Organize and manage your entire comic collection, key or not, at absolutely no cost.
‚Ä¢ Instant Discovery: Spot valuable and interesting comics in any collection at a glance.
‚Ä¢ Simplified Pricing Guide: Quick, ungraded book pricing for informed buying and selling.
‚Ä¢ Personal Cataloging: Track your key issue ownership and curate a wishlist for future acquisitions.

Endorsed by the Greats, Loved by Fans

‚Ä¢ Celebrated and recommended by comic icons like Alex Ross and Neal Adams.
‚Ä¢ Exclusive giveaways and fan engagement within the app.
‚Ä¢ A pristine, ad-free experience focused solely on your comic passion.

Elevate Your Comic Experience with Key Collector Premium

‚Ä¢ Real-Time Key Issue Alerts: Never miss an update on key comics.
‚Ä¢ Innovative Cover Image Search: Identify comics effortlessly.
‚Ä¢ Hot Keys & Hidden Gems: Explore trending issues and rare finds.
‚Ä¢ Daily Curated Content: Stay updated with fresh, daily comic insights.

Dive into the world of comics with an app that's passionate about key issues and reverent to the entire comic book universe. Whether you're a key issue hunter or a broad-scale collector, Key Collector Comics is your essential companion. Download now and start a new chapter in your comic collecting journey!


‚Ä¢ Subscriptions which offer additional features beyond the free set of features are available on a monthly or yearly basis.
‚Ä¢  Subscriptions provide access to Key Alert Push Notifications, Hot Keys, Dollar Bin Diver and other curated content that is updated on a daily basis.
‚Ä¢ Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
‚Ä¢ Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
‚Ä¢ Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
‚Ä¢ Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
‚Ä¢ Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable

https://www.keycollectorcomics.com/privacy
https://www.keycollectorcomics.com/terms
