summary: Comic Book Collection Management & Price Guide

scraped_reviews.content: app looks and layout are great. search function is straightforward with different options but hard to find the comic you're looking for even with accurate info. can't find half of what I'm looking for to add to my collection. I don't know if paying for the subscription would make it any better, maybe. needs a barcode scanner or cover scanner for manual input.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thanks for the review! I just wanted to let you know we just released a huge update to Key Collector Comics which allows users to view non-key issues. There is now a non-key toggle which when turned on will show you non-key issues as well as key issues when searching. We have over 400k issues in our database now!

scraped_reviews.content: Loads of things are listed as keys, I wish you could filter by selling over cover price, or maybe over $10. Also wish you could filter by more recent, like maybe within the last month or year, something like that. There are quite a lot of lists to look at, almost overwhelming. I agree with someone else's comment it would be useful to be able to have favorite categories/lists at the top

Not good for pricing comics. Key collector focuses mainly on keys which is great but I am not happy overall with inaccurate values on books, especially the modern age. They also fail in placing any importance on variants unless it is a ratio variant. My biggest problem is when I had tried to submit a key that is not in their database, I had received no response. I am going to look for other apps...

I wish it didn't crash everytime I use it. It just freezes after a couple searches as I scroll through. Otherwise, it's a valuable tool, even if it's time consuming because of that. Wish they didn't include "iconic image" books that have that as the only reason for being key, but others may not agree with me on that. Update 4/29/22: sorry for the delay in replying. Yes, it got better but still crashed on occasion. I see you've updated it again, so maybe that will help, thanks!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: There is a bug which affects hybrid apps on Android devices. When a user has any kind of settings turned on within the "Accessibility" settings on their phone performance issues arise. Unfortunately this is an issue Google needs to fix. Please reach out to support@keycollectorcomics.com for more information.

scraped_reviews.content: I am not personally happy with the app. I am a long time comic collector. Here is my experience. I initially subscribed for a year. I noticed that alerts may sometimes contain errors or poorly vetted info (i.e., baby Naomi, Sleeper destroyed). When things come to light, the alerts may be deleted without alert that there was an edit. Trusting the app blindly has the potential to lead to poor purchasing decisions. When I discussed an issue with the developer on social media, I got muted. YMMV.

It's an excellent app, and does a great job of doing it's purpose, but some comics aren't on there, particular Sonic the Hedgehog and Mega Man comics made by Archie. There is no way to add comics yourself, so all I can get is volume one of Mega Man. Also, I read comics digitally, and there is no digital comic option when you add comics to your collection. Otherwise, everything is fine.

I absolutely LOVE this app! It gives you detailed info about any and every comic you can think of! You search the name of a series or character and boom, a beautiful, detailed list of all the key issues in that run. The layout is user friendly and super easy to use, I honestly can't say enough good things about this app! Anyone who collects comics should have this app, it's very helpful! The prices may not always be 100% currently accurate, but there are links to eBay that show current prices!

The app provides some good information for comic collectors. But it also has major stability issues. Expect slow page load times, frequent freezing, and app crashes. 2 stars since I'm paying for the service and customers may only catalog the comics that key collector decides to allow, and that's not a lot. Currently only able to catalog a small portion of my collection. Adjusted rating to 1 star due to developers response. Blaming Google when Key Collector is the only app with any issues.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thanks for the review! I just wanted to let you know we just released a huge update to Key Collector Comics which allows users to view non-key issues. There is now a non-key toggle which when turned on will show you non-key issues as well as key issues when searching. We have over 400k issues in our database now!

scraped_reviews.content: Decent app, wish there were more like it in the app store, but IT CRASHES EVERYTIME I USE IT. VERY FRUSTRATING. Oh well, I'm not paying for an app that crashes everytime I use it. EDIT: I've reinstalled it three times, I'm not wasting more time on trying to make it work properly. Oh well. ***Edit: The newest updated version is just awful, I hate that nothing is showing up in any search until I adjust the filters now. This app is useless. I'm deleting it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: I'm sorry for your experience. Our main service provider experienced a major outage this past Saturday. This was an issue that was out of our control. Trust me, we were as frustrated as you with this, unfortunately we were at their mercy and had to wait for them to resolve the problem. The app is working fine now.

scraped_reviews.content: so far the scanner is mediocre, I can't seem to find out how to get a shareable link for my wantlist or my collection. seems kind of generic. sometimes it takes 20-30 tries to even get the cover to ve recognized. it defaults to $2 on most comics it doesn't know, and even though it says It can find values on cgc if you become pro, it's bs. it has no idea values lol. extremely rudimentary app, better off using free Google sheets and just doing it yourself. not worth the 20 bucks.

very detailed database, takes abit to get used to the search methods but is great to use after you know how! I wish it had options for adding graphic novels with multiple issues as one entry, or atleast the ability to make a list within a collection to group together issues from a single collection issue.
Great app and developers. They list to their customers. That's hard to find in businesses these days. Keep up the great work KCC!

So many great features. But the most important feature is the worst functioning feature...the scanning of comics. Absolutely awful. It often takes 10-15 sometimes 20 attempts to get the book you scan to come up. This desperately needs fixing. Until it does, I will be using other comic collection apps.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôre sorry you‚Äôre having this experience. We have not gotten any other feedback along these lines and have put extensive testing into making sure this isn‚Äôt an issue. We will continue to try and replicate this issue so we can resolve it. Please reach out to support@keycollectorcomics.com with more information if possible. üôè

scraped_reviews.content: Doubling their prices when there are better apps out there for keys. Go elsewhere once they bang you with the increase which will be your next renewal.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, this is the first time we have ever increased our subscription and we are still reasonably priced when looking at competitors. Also, you can fully index your entire collection with Key Collector without a subscription. A subscription is only required for advanced features.

scraped_reviews.content: The regularity of the updates on this app has gotten much better. This app is really good for seeing market trends and provides a nice filtered view of the more important new comics. I miss Nick's picks, though. I know it's hard to pick comics that might be increasing in a flat market, but it was always nice seeing someone's opinions.
super helpful, gives me accurate prices, quick and easy to use, 10/10

Impressive but not perfect. It's really useful when you find a comic and it shows you the price ranges from its lowest to highest price especially if (like me) you're trying to value a collection. Unfortunately I can't give it more than three stars as I've found that there are lots of comics missing, forcing me to go online to check which kind of defeats the point of the app.

Great app, but crashes sooo much. I tend to only use the web version as it is stable enough. The app lags while loading a title or scrolling, and then crashes nearly 100% of the time. I've exhausted every method to fix it. It's the only app of mine that does it, so it must be a bug. EDIT: Newest update has seemed to fix this issue. Changed to 5 stars now.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we just released a new version. Have you noticed an improvement with the app crashing at all? Thank you for your feedback and continued support for Key Collector Comics.

scraped_reviews.content: lower the price. If you are going to double the price, at least have the correct prices on every comic. it's 2025 ai should be doing it for you.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, if you could e-mail support@keycollectorcomics.com we would love to take a look at the prices you are referring to. Over the past 8 years we have never increased the price of our subscription. This will allow us to implement more advance technologies into our application, like AI. Thank you

scraped_reviews.content: Nice app, but not worth the subscription that doubled in price this year.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, I would like to point out that our app does not require a subscription. In fact we are the only comic book collection app that will allow you to catalog your entire collection for absolutely free without any limits. We have also never increased the subscription for our services prior to this increase.

scraped_reviews.content: Fantastic app, membership is very well priced and there is so much information. I have a few suggestions (possible I don't know how to use it and it already does this) 1. A symbol on the page of owned issues if the price of a comic increased or decreased that week like they do for individual issues. 2. Be able to categorise comics and have separate paid values for each. Specs, collection, hot etc. 3. Be able to track the value of your collection, at least a basic value each month or year.
latest update continuously prompts about notifications being enabling
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We just released a new version that should solve this issue. Thank you for bringing it to our attention.

scraped_reviews.content: easy to use. add your comics and learn

Been collecting since 2008, always thought how cool it would be to have an app just like this. One that would send you updates on the latest trends and possible movie deals on books you might have passed on looking through the dollar bin at your local comic store. I've had it for a week on my phone, good app overall, I've had no issues with it.

Using the free version. Prices for most graded comics don't automatically update often as the quick graded comics, and have to be manually input to stay current. Would also love if the collection list page highlighted books whose values had changed, rather than just the green arrow on the book page. I end up looking through my whole collection to see where the difference in value came from.

Though this app delivers information and worthiness of various keys, it has major downfalls. Inflation to the market, errors in released information, and uncooperative customer service are to name a few. Keys that are published often spike books up to amounts that are not their true value but rather an artificial "hype". Increases in sales and value are directed tied to the app's market manipulation. Though this app has helped revive backstock, it has ultimately went to the other extreme.
I left a bad review and must of mistaked it with another app, I apologize for my mistake, and have edited my post accordingly.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we have raised our price in the last month that is true. However, we have not ever raised our prices over the last 8 years that we have been offering a subscription service. Also, based on our feature set even after the increase our prices are in some cases still 2x cheaper. And no subscription is required to catalog your entire collection.

scraped_reviews.content: A great resource with way too high of a monthly cost to get more basic features.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello,

Thank you for your feedback. I would like to point out that Key Collector offers price guidance and allows users to catalog their entire collection for absolutely free, you simply need to create an account. None of our competitors offer these features for free.

scraped_reviews.content: The base code of the app is fine but the listings are WAY too limited to be useful. You can't add any comics to your collection that aren't on the price list, which makes the entire thing useless. I can't estimate the value of my collection if over 75% of the books I own can't be listed. Maybe add a "submit to database" feature or something.

It is a godsend for comicbook collectors everywhere. The best way to keep up to date on the latest hottest issues or soon to be hot. Also features from time to time great contests. So if you love comics and really who doesnt? Give it a try and if you like what you see become a subscriber and get even more comicbook information like I did.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: What a nice review.  Thank you Todd.

scraped_reviews.content: At first I was excited to get this app and wished I had this when I was a kid and had built a 10k book collection. However, as an adult, the search function isn't always straight forward, the values aren't even close to being accurate on a lot of issues or is missing values altogether and as I'm writing this review, the app isn't even loading properly. I just bought a bunch of back issues that I want to catalog and the app isn't even working right now after several attempts to close and reopen.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry you are having this experience. We just released an updated version of the Key Collector Comics app. I'm hopeful that this will address your performance issues. We are actively working on addressing your concerns with the pricing.

scraped_reviews.content: Eh... It works when it wants too. The app needs some touching up. Constantly force closes or freezes for like 3 to 5 minutes at times. Would also like a less time consuming way to add comics to my collection. Update 4/31/22 Still don't care for this app, prices are inaccurate and the term "Key" is thrown around very loosely.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we just released a new version. Have you noticed an improvement with the app crashing at all? Thank you for your feedback and continued support for Key Collector Comics.

scraped_reviews.content: I primarily use the website, but also love the app. Whoever designed the app and web site did a really good job. Great filters to where I can just click what I own. This has saved me a couple times from buying a comic I already own. I hope they add an option to add Trade Paperbacks and digital copies someday. However, I have no complaints.

the only app you'll need as a comic collector it offers so much you'll just have to dive-in and see for yourself. üòÅ plus, you know it is someone who cares about the community seeing the price is not and arm and leg and is very affordable for us all. I think it hits the right spot for most of us when I say this app trumps them all in regards of looking up key issues. üîë Stop what your doing and purchase it now. üíØ if you have any regrets in life it would be not purchasing this powerhouse. üîë
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Wow. Thank you for the glowing review. We really appreciate it.

scraped_reviews.content: Super easy, constantly updating. Any serious collector needs this app. And, you can track the value of the keys in your collection. I'm up to 6k, just off the books I know I have, off the top of my head. On a scale of 1-5, this app is a 26. At least try it, I guarantee you keep it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Haha.  Thank you Jared.  I love the review.

scraped_reviews.content: This app has everything it's crazy, so much information. This app would especially be great for people just getting into the hobby and trying to learn which books are hot and worth money. The only thing that needs improving is the price guide part. It only has a Low, Medium, and High price it doesn't go by grades like 7.0, 7.5 and so on. That's literally the only downside on this app
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi,
We've forwarded your feedback to our developers. Thank you for taking out the time to send us your suggestions!

scraped_reviews.content: Great app keeps you informed on what to buy and what's coming out plus gives you a price point for what your collection could be worth and has all the key comics you could want to find out about and they're constantly adding more all the time. Only down side is if you want to have all the features you have to pay a fee per year but understandable and it's small.

Love the app, pretty easy to use but wish they had fuller runs major and minor keys are of course listed and prices are pretty good at what I find online but if they had a bigger library of comics I'd pay for a larger search selection if they had a option for it, for a free app it works fine just need to grow over time I guess, I'll keep it to look up my keys but I'll probably be getting a 2nd app from a different maker soon but I'll pay for a wider range if they made it a option
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thanks for the review! I just wanted to let you know we just released a huge update to Key Collector Comics which allows users to view non-key issues. There is now a non-key toggle which when turned on will show you non-key issues as well as key issues when searching. We have over 400k issues in our database now!

scraped_reviews.content: I think I've reviewed a total 3 apps in my life and those 3 were only to stop them from asking but THIS app is epic! Def 5 stars. If you're into comics casually, are a collector or a seller, this app is a must-have. Super convenient, do yourself a favor and subscribe to the monthly-youll find the value in it in less than 5 minutes
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much.  I appreciate you taking the time to write the review and saying such great things.  It really helps out to get more attention to this and ensure it remains available!  Thanks again!

scraped_reviews.content: As a collector, I feel it's a must have for the smallest collectors to the fanatics (like myself). I had a few issues when 1st using the app, contacted support. One day later I received an email from the actual developer (not a typical auto response). I've never seen that before. Received the best cust. supp. I've ever gotten. Constant communication and troubleshooting while remaining extremely patient and polite. App works flawlessly now on all my devices. Thanks Key Coll. And especial Jameson!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: There is a bug which affects hybrid apps on Android devices. When a user has any kind of settings turned on within the "Accessibility" settings on their phone performance issues arise. Unfortunately this is an issue Google needs to fix. Please reach out to support@keycollectorcomics.com for more information.

scraped_reviews.content: EDIT #2 - Back to two stars. Keeps crashing again. Couldn't be more annoying EDIT / UPDATE: I had this as a TWO STAR app. I was having SEVERE issues with the app freezing and running EXTREMELY slow, even after paying for a premium subscription. After posting these issues here, I received a response, and, sure enough, after the latest update, everything works GREAT. Really appreciate the customer service there. Great resource for collectors, researchers, historians, etc. HIGHEST RECOMMENDATION!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: It seems as if there is a bug which affects hybrid apps on Android devices. When a user has any kind of settings turned on within the "Accessibility" settings on their phone performance issues arise. Unfortunately this is an issue Google needs to fix. Please reach out to support@keycollectorcomics.com for more information.

scraped_reviews.content: Great app super helpful!! Totally worth the annual sub. As a collector I dreamed of having something like this at my finger tips for years. I no longer have to rely on my shotty memory when diving in long boxes... Nor do I have to sort through endless news streams and spend countless hours of reaserching to figure out what the next hot book might be. This app does it for you! The developer is super helpful and holds amazing contests built right into the app frequently. Wether you're new to collecting, hardcore collector, a flipper or somewhere in between. I promise you'll find this extremely useful and user friendly.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Man, Andrew, I had the exact same experience and thats why I decided to do this.  Thank you so much for an awesome review and your support. I appreciate the time you took to write this review.  Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: This app has so many great, helpful features. But it is extrrrremely lacking when it comes to the Most Important feature. Scanning and adding comics to your personal collection. It does a terrible job of recognizing the comic you're scanning and will give you off the wall results instead of the book you're trying to add. It's hell, honestly. Love the app. But that feature is so awful that I've given up on using it to log my books. I used CLZ previously, and it's night and day.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello,
Thank you for the feedback. We actually have a feature in development that is focused entirely for improving this feature on Android devices. We're hoping to roll it out this week if not next. Also, this is a feature that we are actively working on improving and hope to be able to improve the results you are seeing.

Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: This App is great! Key issue hunting just got easier! Love this app! I'm going to update my review because the app has improved so much.. I recommend becoming a subscriber! This app is fantastic!! I have been here since its beginning and it only gets better plus if something is missing or incorrect Nick wants to know... He works for us guys so let's put him to work and make this the #1 go to app for all of our hunting needs!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks Brian!

scraped_reviews.content: Was working fine until a few weeks ago. Now the thumbnail images of comics and individual images of comics are not loading up at all. I tried reinstalling and turning phone off and on etc, etc but nothing works. Also on website the images not loading. Notice comes up saying try again later. Any ideas.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we're sorry that you are having this experience. It sounds like a third-party service is blocking this content for some reason and it is more than likely a issue related to your device, internet or location. Could you please reach out to support@keycollectorcomics.com so that we can further investigate this issue and help you resolve it?

scraped_reviews.content: Outstanding for keeping ahead of the game...but lowered my star from 5 to 3 because 3 reasons... 1. If in a low internet area...forget it, it takes FOR-EH-VER to load. Even after getting a new 5G phone. 2. They NEEEEEEEEEEED to add a bar code scanner....BADLY!!! 3. THE BIGGEST THING....it neeeeeeds to be cloud based, like CLZ....load times cut in half. Overall, I keep my collection in CLZ but use this for updated in the comic community. I work in a comic store, so that is what gets 3 stars.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're always working on new features Rod. Thanks for letting us know which ones you prefer

scraped_reviews.content: Brilliant App and very fair priced membership at ¬£1.69 a month :) seen a review saying there are comics missing, it only shows key issues unless you toggle non-key issues in top corner. Not had any issues myself finding any of my collection. Would be interested to know how they choose the Weeks Key Issues though as technically it's investment advice.

Jumped on this app when it first came out...absolutely love it! Love the notifications and the ease of navigation. It has definitely been useful in helping me acquire comics I had been wishing for but had not gotten around to purchasing...with the notifications I was able to purchase my wish list comics at a reasonable price before they skyrocketed. Thank you!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for taking the time to write such a great review!  I appreciate your time and support!

scraped_reviews.content: I have used this app for a while and it's a very good app for key collectors like me. Just the downside of the app is that you have to pay the other features in dollars. Maybe in the next update you can subscribe and pay with your own currency (like for example for me it will be ¬£) or maybe don't have a subscription and everyone can use all those features for free
scraped_reviews.replyContent: That's a great suggestion.  We're constantly developing and making the resource more friendly to collectors in other countries is definitely on the build plans.  THank you for the great review and your patience. We'll get there

scraped_reviews.content: A good start. The app needs work. I feel that the golden age crime and horror needs work. Otherwise, it's very useful to help log and maintain a collection, especially when at the shops or cons.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello, thank you for the feedback. Could you provide some further direction on what you mean regarding the Golden Age Crime and Horror needing work? If there is something that needs adjusting or we are missing issues from this genre we will do our best to get it updated quickly.

Thank you

title: Fitness App: Gym Workout Plan
description:
Whether you are trying to lose weight, gain muscle mass or want to have well-defined 6-pack abs ‚Äì our gym planner fitness app offers full body workout plans with many free 3D exercises, to help you achieve your body goals. You can choose from a variety of exercise plans targeted at specific muscle groups, such as chest workout, upper body workout, abs workout (stomach workout), arm workout and full body workout at home, or tailor them to a certain goal, such as fat burning workouts, conditioning workouts, or bodyweight workouts. You can also get ready workouts with diet. This fitness app stands out from other free gym workout apps, as it has a gym progress tracker and a workout planner that allows you to have your own workout diary, maintain your workout routines, and find the best personal coach in any city for online fitness workouts and bodybuilding sessions. This cardio workout app is one of the best workout apps for men and free workout apps for women, as it allows to select a gym routine for men or a gym routine for women. Meet other members, log your workout, such as beginner workout, gym stomach workout or abs home workout, ask questions, and receive competent answers! Keep fit at home or at the gym with the online community of your strength training app!
Why Fitness Online?
- Stands out from free workout apps: Ready workouts with a diet plan created by bodybuilding champions who work as coaches on our cardio workout apps.


- Workout diary: Track your progress with our fitness tracker and workout tracker.


- In-App Encyclopaedia with information on exercises, health and diet.


- Over 850 exercises with high-quality 3D animations.


- Diet plan - weight loss: Over 5000 food products with nutritional value tables and a calorie counter.


- Sports nutrition: Essential additions to your diet for fast muscle building (gain weight).


- Personal feed: Share your workouts, ask questions about exercises, meet and chat with other users of our community.


- Text our coaches using the built-in chat feature. Send recommendations to your friends and help them lose weight, get perfect abs, workout arms and chest, and maintain a healthy diet with our gain weight app.


- Trainers‚Äô headquarters: Pick a personal trainer based on rating and feedback.
How does it work? 
This men exercise app at home allows you to work out on your own. Develop your own weight loss program, use our calorie tracker, create a diet plan and start working out. You can update your schedule and track results in the workout diary. Alternatively, choose a ready training program with a diet for your specific goal, such as fat loss workout, and abdominal exercises for men.
Want to try harder? Hire our online personal coach. You can choose your personal trainer based on budget and feedback. Get an invoice, make the payment and start your transformation. Your coach will provide you with a workout plan and a tailored diet plan, create a monthly course with a full set of exercises and meal plan to reach your goal, whether that is to lose weight in 30 days, lose belly fat, build muscle, get six-pack abs, big arms or a wide chest or get back in shape after an illness or pregnancy ‚Äì all of this at home.
When you‚Äôre on a monthly course, your coach will monitor your results for a monthly fee, provide recommendations or on your meal plan and adjust the exercise program, if needed. You can always chat with your coach and discuss a plan that fits your schedule. We invite the best fitness coaches with extensive knowledge on all kinds of working out goals, no matter if you‚Äôre trying to lose weight fast, get six-pack abs, get big arms, get a wide back, build muscles or just get more muscle definition. We also offer many cardio exercises at home for your overall health and well-being. Want to become a fitness coach on our app? Take our test and prove your skills. Email us on coach@fitnessonline.app, or on support@fitnessonline.app in the event of technical issues.
