scraped_reviews.content: Great app with potential to be even better. Good exercise variety including functional and mobility exercises not available in most other apps. Nice exercise progressive overload settings with the ability to recommend target weight as pct of 1 rep max and ability to use pyramid sets. This app would be even better if the weight as a pct of your 1 rep max was automatically calculated and there was the ability to create your own exercises. I'm really looking forward to future updates.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello! Thank you for your suggestions - we‚Äôll factor them into our roadmap.
Please note that smart weight selection is in development, and we‚Äôre working to release it ASAP.
We also expand our exercise library in large batches 1-2 times a year. If you have specific requests, please contact support; we‚Äôll review them with care.
Happy training!

scraped_reviews.content: There's not too many exercise choices without equipment. The great majority of what's listed is different kinds of planks, squats, push ups, and jumping/clapping. That might be enough for some people, but im looking for stuff that I don't normally think of off the top of my head. I'm trying to find stuff i can do to stay healthy without straining my chronic pain. Once I picked through all the choices that might work for me I was left with only 12 exercises. Other apps had more ideas than this.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello! We‚Äôre constantly working on expanding the list of exercises in the app. We usually add big batches of new exercises 1-2 times a year. If you have any particular recommendations, feel free to get in touch with our support team, and we‚Äôll review your suggestions very carefully.
Thank you for your feedback and enjoy your workouts with our app!

scraped_reviews.content: This app is VERY misleading. It says it's free. However, after 3 workouts in any given category, you are forced to subscribe in order to move on to the next workout in the series. So much for a FREE workout app. With that being said, the workouts are very effective, and I love the app. I am just not prepared nor in a position to be able to subscribe..... I guess I am going to have to continue to search for a truly FREE workout app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello!
We‚Äôre terribly sorry for this misunderstanding, we didn‚Äôt mean to deceive anyone. The first three workouts of every program are completely free, so you can choose the one you like the most. You are still able to create your own program free of charge, too.
We wish you a wonderful workout session!

scraped_reviews.content: I am using the free version and created my own workout which was very time consuming considering you need to enter sets, weight amount, etc. for each individual exercise. Unfortunately, when I begin to workout, it's very counterproductive! I have to stop and enter the reps that I did, the weight used, and why when I said what I wanted to do beforehand? The exercises do not manually go to the next one. It's just odd.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello! The actual reps/weights/secs may differ from the pre-planned ones. You just need some time to get used to filling in your diary. You can also auto-fill it by clicking on the recommended indicators or on the past indicators at the bottom.
If you subscribe, auto-transition will be available.
Thank you for your feedback! Have great workouts!

scraped_reviews.content: This app is great. I've been using it for almost 2 years. It shows you EXACTLY how to do a workout and gives you other variations to pick from. The app WILL insult you at the end of the workout if it thinks you didn't give it your all ü§£. I'm doing advance workouts to challenge myself,so I cannot do a lot of the heavy lifting yet that the app thinks I can do. So I do get insulted at times and other times I get praised. I love this app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks! Pleasant to receive such reviews! Wish you the best workouts!

scraped_reviews.content: Been using this for like a year and some months now. It has workouts that works and suggestions that you can alter between. My main issue with the app is the suggestion or alternate exercises. Some of them may not be something that you're interested in doing or your gym/ home gym may not have available. When cycling through alternate exercises I just wish there was more than 5 so I can do a workout that I actually can do or enjoy doing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for your advice! We'll keep it in mind while developing the app! Happy training!

scraped_reviews.content: Wouldn't recommend this app at all. I downloaded a workout and started. After 4 days of workout, it said, "Now I need a subscription to continue. When I was starting the workout, there was no way to figure this out, and now, after 4 days, it gives me this stupid surprise. Don't be shocked if you pay and half way into the workout, they ask you to pay more to continue
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello!
We‚Äôre terribly sorry for this misunderstanding, we didn‚Äôt mean to deceive anyone. The first three workouts of every program are completely free, so you can choose the one you like the most. You are still able to create your own program free of charge, too.
We wish you a wonderful workout session!

scraped_reviews.content: I love the app and the variety of gym workouts you get, the diet, supplements recommendations as well as the community. The only issue I have is not being able to lock your previous day(s) workout the next day. For e.g on my cardio days I sometimes forget to lock my sessions because I would've went for an outdoor run and I leave my phone behind, when I get back I forget to lock the workout. I'll only remember the next day but then the app doesn't allow that üò´
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello! Thank you for your feedback and suggestions! We‚Äôll keep them in mind as we continue improving our app.
In the meantime, if you forgot to log your session and would like to add it to your diary, our support team can help - please contact us through the app.
Best of luck with your workouts!

scraped_reviews.content: As for now, everything looks promising. There are some parts that can be adjusted. i.e. for home workouts would be great to have the ability to checkmark things like dumbbells or jumping rope that you possess. and to be able to pick, which weights of dumbbells you have. So that program will use that data for training.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello! Thank you for the suggestions - we‚Äôll keep them in mind as we improve the app.
In the meantime, if you‚Äôre missing some equipment, you can try selecting a suitable exercise by using its alternative: tap the 2-arrows button in the top-right of the exercise window. Or create your own program using the equipment filter.
Happy training!

scraped_reviews.content: I have been using the free version for about 3 months, and I love it!!!. It was a little confusing and kind of complicated first, but once I learn how to set my daily routines I won't change it for any other app. I like that I can learn the correct posture for the exercises.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello!
Thank you for choosing our app! We truly appreciate your feedback. If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to reach out to our support team through the app. We're always here to support you on your fitness journey!
We wish you success in your future workouts!

scraped_reviews.content: best app for gym. the only problem: once you choose a workout you can't really configure it anymore (yes, I know you can change it for another one, it's not what I want)
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello! Thank you for your feedback!
At the moment, it isn‚Äôt possible to make changes to pre-made workout plans, as these workouts are not editable. However, you can create a custom plan tailored to your needs and edit it at any time, even during an active session. You can also replace any exercise in your training program with an alternative.

scraped_reviews.content: First week was great and then I found out they want you to subscribe I'm uninstalling. why don't they tell you that up front that you have to pay to use all the app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello!
We‚Äôre terribly sorry for this misunderstanding, we didn‚Äôt mean to deceive anyone. The first three workouts of every program are completely free, so you can choose the one you like the most. You are still able to create your own program free of charge, too.
We wish you a wonderful workout session!

scraped_reviews.content: I made a premium subscription,it was cancelled after 3 days, the purchase status is showing 'refunded' but I never got the refund on my card, what is going on how can I get my refund back
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello!
The payment for your subscriptions is taken directly by GooglePlay, and not by us. You are the only person to manage your subscriptions from your smartphone, please rest assured we have no intention to mislead you.
If you have any questions regarding payments, please contact support via the app, and we'll be pleased to assist you!

scraped_reviews.content: it lets you do like three workouts period and then it says you need to buy subscription that is $7 a month and that is too expensive for a 13-year-old kid
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello!
Fitness Online is one of the most affordable apps of this kind on the fitness market. However, you can still use it without subscribing: you can create your own workouts, and use it as workout diary.
Alternatively, choose an annual plan to get a lower monthly rate.
We wish you success in your future workouts!

scraped_reviews.content: I didn't fully use this app but I did appreciate the ability to use this app without having to create an account. I could skip most questions and go directly to making an exercise plan, so for that it's a 5 star app already. however I had to lower it to 4 stars as the app does NOT have the feature to add in an exercise that isn't already in their database. fix that and I can come back and use it to get this to a 5 star app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello! We‚Äôre constantly working on expanding the list of exercises in the app. We usually add big batches of new exercises 1-2 times a year. If you have any particular recommendations, feel free to get in touch with our support team, and we‚Äôll review your suggestions very carefully.
Thank you for your feedback and enjoy your workouts with our app!

scraped_reviews.content: it doesn't let me use a music app while using this app. every time the rest alarm goes off it shut off my music completely. if I turn off the alarm, it still shuts it off when the timer ends. also, if I'm in the app too long (less than a minute) it shuts off my music. if it's something that can't be fixed, I'd like a refund.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello!
We're sorry about the issues that you've encountered! It is likely to be a bug. Please kindly message our customer support via the app, and we'll make sure to assist you ASAP!
Thank you for your review!

scraped_reviews.content: After using this app for a few months, I can confidently say it's the best fitness app I've tried. I really appreciate the level of customization it offers‚Äîeven without a subscription - you can tailor your workouts to fit your goals. The detailed instructions for each exercise were especially helpful as a beginner, making it easy to learn proper form and technique. I‚Äôd love to see the exercise library expand even more, and I‚Äôm excited to see how the app continues to grow with future updates.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello! Thank you for your feedback!
We‚Äôre constantly working on expanding the list of exercises in the app. We usually add big batches of new exercises 1-2 times a year. If you have any particular recommendations, feel free to get in touch with our support team, and we‚Äôll review your suggestions very carefully.
Good luck with your workouts!

scraped_reviews.content: I put full effort into my workout and exceeded the expected reps and weights. The only difference was doing 3 minutes less cardio and skipping a 20-second stretch. Yet I got a message saying, ‚ÄúYes a lot has been done but still you don't want to give all the best. What a pity right?‚Äù This tone is completely unacceptable, especially since I pay for this app. It‚Äôs disrespectful and demotivating. This has happened before and it needs to stop. Please fix it!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello!
We‚Äôre terribly sorry if it hurt your feelings, we didn‚Äôt mean to upset nobody. The final phrases are to motivate and make our users smile, and surely not to offend anyone.
If you don't want to receive them anymore, you can always turn them off in your settings.
Happy training!

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using this app for 18 months, and it's honestly the best in the market. I began my fitness journey in September 2023, and without this app, I would've quit early. The workout tracking and history features keep me motivated, and the user-friendly interface is very smart. My only suggestions: include more gym/machine-based exercises and reduce home-style ones as it is useless. Also, the yearly subscription offers aren't attractive enough‚Äîthis needs improvement.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello! Thank you so much!
We regularly add new exercises 1‚Äì2 times a year. If you have specific suggestions, please contact our support team ‚Äî we‚Äôll review them carefully.
Additionally, our subscription price is among the most affordable in this category. The yearly subscription offers a much better monthly rate with a significant discount.

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using this app for a few weeks and so far I'm loving it. I like that I can build various workouts and track my progress. The instructions are clear and there's a lot to choose from. I haven't looked at the diet/nutrition areas, so my rating is solely for the workout section
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello! Thank you for your feedback!
By the way, an updated, personalized, and professionally structured nutrition section will be launching in the app soon. We are doing our best to have it released ASAP.
We wish you lots of success in your workouts!

scraped_reviews.content: Great app and fitness tracker. I use it for working out at home and the workout routines have been excellent and they challenge you more over time. In the past I had struggled at times to know what workout to do each day but this helps take away that stress. The only issue I have is being unable to sync it with Google health connect. I see no options for it under data sharing
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello!
In our next update, our app will be compatible with Google Health Connect, ensuring a seamless experience. Thank you for your patience. We are doing everything we can to release the update as soon as possible.
If you have any questions or need further assistance, please feel free to contact our support team via the app.
Have a great day!

scraped_reviews.content: I really enjoy this app, as it provides a very detailed and convenient workout guides, which is really great! Couple of things that may be improved: 1. When in workout, switching to other apps, and open FitnessOnline again, exercises are grayed out and spinner under the header indicates that app is getting something from the internet before re-enabling. 2. Sync with Google Fit brings in 8 min of treadmill only as a walk, but not the rest of the workout exercises that pertain gym equipment.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for your suggestions! We'll keep them in mind when working on improving our app! Best of luck on your workouts!

scraped_reviews.content: This is the 1st app I paid to subscribe ever in my life. I downloaded several work-out apps and this is the best for gym work out. Highly recommend! I was new to gym work out, didn't know what to do, how to use machines or how to set up the routine. This app helped me big time to get into gym work out. Very informative and even fun! This is my day 15. Very satisfied. Except loading takes too long time. Please fix the app speed. And it would be nice if there's more various stretching.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello! Unfortunately, such situations are inevitable in an actively developing app, however, we‚Äôre trying our best to get everything fixed ASAP. Please message our team through the app, and we'll make sure to assist you very quickly.
Thank you very much for your time!

scraped_reviews.content: I am very satisfied with all the features and the interface of this app. It covers all my needs. Very well thought, thank you! I would only recommend one thing: It would be great if the users could adjust pre-made workouts. For example, due to some issues I would like to remove a few exercises from the plan, or add extra exercise from available ones. I am still able to continue without doing some of them but when it comes to extras, I can't keep track what I had done extra.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello! It is not possible to make changes in pre-made workout plans, as such workouts are not editable. However, you can always create your own workout program and tailor it to your needs.
Good luck with your workouts!

scraped_reviews.content: Very good application. Perfect category of each muscle and the workouts for them. The only sad thing is that it doesn't count calories unless you're an upgraded user ( which is impossible for me to pay and upgrade because of payment system of the country that I'm living in). So I have to guess the calories I burn during my workout and it's not so accurate. But in general the app is pretty good!üëèüëçüèº I like it!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello!
If you have any questions regarding payment, please write to support in the app - maybe we'll be able to help you!
Happy training!

scraped_reviews.content: Great app, nice trainings, but still lacking in some areas. Personalisation is one of the things to improve. Other apps offer trainings that adjust to current goals/weight, there is bigger control over what should be a focus of given workout, whether cardio should be added or not. Second point is the price. I can get apps for fraction of the price. Annual subscription of other apps costs same amount as one month of this app. It is definitely overpriced.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello! Thank you for your advice! We'll keep it in mind while developing the app!
Please note that you can use the app for free if you create your own workout program. This will also allow you to set everything as personalised as needed.
Happy training!

scraped_reviews.content: August 23. I enjoy the app and it's features. For me works great. Suggestions: 1) New machines are being builded every year. So expanding the library would be great as well. I'm not saying it's bad. It's huge and most of the times there is an alternative excercise. However, I've seen some in the gym they are not in the app that would be nice to have. 2) Would be nice an option with customisable templates for Diet without deleting the current selection.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello! We‚Äôre constantly working to expand the list of exercises in the app. If you have any particular recommendations, feel free to send them to support. We‚Äôll be very grateful for that!
We're working on a full diet plan now as well.
Thank you for the review and happy training!

scraped_reviews.content: By far the best fitness app out there for me. You select the workout, customise it, monitor and track your progress and includes info on how to perform a move with a clip of how it should be done. Doesn't bombard you with adds or sign up now. You can use these features without signing up too, only thing you cant adjust is rest time so workouts look longer than they are but subscribe to amend this. Awesome app, tested others and this one is worth subscribing too just to maintain the app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for your feedback! We wish you lots of success in your workouts!

scraped_reviews.content: hate having to wait to open other workouts, I am just trying out the app and just picked a random workout now I can't change. Just silly some days I want to change my workout.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello! There's an opportunity to skip any workout day if needed. It may be slightly difficult to get acquainted with all of the app's functionalities at once, we totally get it! Please contact our support team via the app, and we'll be happy to assist you!
Thank you for the review!

scraped_reviews.content: This fitness app is hands down the BEST for anyone serious about gym workouts üí™üèªüî•‚öîÔ∏è. The workout plans are perfectly structured for beginners, intermediates, and pros‚Äîwhether your goal is building strength üèãÔ∏è, muscle growth üí•, or fat loss üèÉ.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for your feedback! We wish you lots of success in your workouts!

scraped_reviews.content: So far the best fitness app used. Easy to navigate and you can create your own plan as you wish.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for your feedback! We wish you lots of success in your workouts!

scraped_reviews.content: I'm on day 3 and I'm not usually one to exercise but the workout plan I'm on isn't overwhelming and I can do at home.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for your feedback! We wish you lots of success in your workouts!

scraped_reviews.content: I downloaded many workout trackers and this one is the best in terms of ease of use, available options and information. However, I wish I could edit completed workouts, because I made a mistake but couldn't go back and edit. Plus, I do different cardio on different days, so I'd love to be able to add that in addition to my saved workout.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello! Thank you for your feedback!
It is not possible to make changes in pre-made workout plans, however, you can always create your own workout program and tailor it to your needs.
If you want edit completed workouts, please contact our support team via the app, and we'll be happy to assist you!
Good luck with your workouts!

scraped_reviews.content: For the subscription app (which is not completely free), the tutorial and plan is good enough. But the fitur could be improved, especially for the timeline part. It shows notifications but where should we check it? We couldn't even see/check our pass post, need to scroll down til 2025 is finished. For the plan, I also hope that there will be more choices like for example, it says only for the perfect booty plan but for those beginners who don't wanna grow thighs and calves, it's a problem!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! To view your older posts, go to "More" ‚Üí "My Profile" ‚Üí "Feeds". To check comments and replies, open the "Feed" tab, tap the blue arrow at the top, and select "New comments" ‚Äî you‚Äôll see the posts with replies. For any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact our support team ‚Äî we‚Äôre happy to help! Have a great day!

scraped_reviews.content: I usually stick to popsugar workouts on YouTube but wanted to try something different, did download so many apps, they all were kind of annoying, especially when you need to pay for it. Then accidentally downloaded this app, and I must say, definitely it's Worth it, free workouts giving options for gym and home. Literally everything you would get for an app you need to pay for. Thank you so much who ever created this app. I am loving the different workout options that's available as well.
decent app. seem to be able to get a decent recommendation through the free version.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for your feedback! We wish you lots of success in your workouts!

scraped_reviews.content: Good app with many exercises and short video animations. The huge problem is that it freezes for several seconds every time you jump from the list of exercises to the details of an specific exercise and back to the list. It constantly uses the internet connection to unlock every single screen you browse. If you have bad internet connection, the app will lock all the time. Another huge problem while doing a group of exercises is that you can't mark/highlight those that you already exercised.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello! The app needs some time after downloading to load all the data. Then it shouldn't have any problems like that. Please write to support in the app - we'll help you with that.
Secondly, if you fill in the workout diary while exercising - it will be marked in overall progress.
Thank you for your feedback! Have great workouts!

scraped_reviews.content: Good little app, I've been using daily and love the layout of it. thank you for your response that's great to know and makes it better for my use, can't believe I didn't even notice lol I've change my rating for you to 5 stars.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you so much! It is a great pleasure to receive such wonderful reviews! We wish you to hit all your body goals with our workouts!

scraped_reviews.content: Great app, has really helped with motivation and knowing what to do with a good variety of exercises... 2 weeks in and so far so good üëç
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for your feedback! We wish you lots of success in your workouts!

scraped_reviews.content: very good and straight forward app. no theatrics like others. gives you workout plan and diet and its very easy to use and no hidden charges
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for your feedback! We wish you lots of success in your workouts!

scraped_reviews.content: this is a great workout app, just have to fill out the info and do what the workout says. it can not get any easier than this!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for your feedback! We wish you lots of success in your workouts!

scraped_reviews.content: Wow! Wish I'd known about this app earlier! Just rejoined the gym after a number of years absence. All my confidence has gone and my first visit back to a quite "posey" gym, had me wandering around the gym not having a clue what to do and no plan or structure. I was about to sign up for some expensive personal training to give me a routine and some confidence, but after finding this app, now I don't need to! The recommended weights are brilliant as it's given me a guideline too!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks! Pleasant to receive such reviews! Wish you the best workouts!

scraped_reviews.content: I would recommend this gym app over any other one. I usually create my own workout routine and dont go off of already made one. This app, out of many that i have tried, has the biggest variety of exercises. I would just like it if they added a "Till failure" option (4 sets till failure) instead of needing to enter the exact number.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello! It‚Äôs a great pleasure to receive such wonderful feedback. Thank you for your kind words and suggestions! We‚Äôll definitely keep them in mind as we continue to improve the app.
Best of luck with your workouts!

scraped_reviews.content: Update- yes I'm talking about Google Health Connect. Go look at their reviews. I downloaded it - again- and it doesn't work. It doesn't even show up on my phone. Multiple reviews indicate the same issue. So there isn't any way to connect to your app or any app. They don't offer any help on the issue.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello! We‚Äôre sorry for the issues you‚Äôve encountered, and thank you for the update.
Our app syncs via Google Health Connect, which is maintained by Google. Please contact us via in-app support and we‚Äôll help you review your settings and suggest possible solutions.
Thank you for your patience!

scraped_reviews.content: I enjoy the app. The only thing I'd like for you guys to install to this is a pre-made kettlebell workout plan!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello! Thank you for your suggestions! We'll keep them in mind when working on improving our app!
Best of luck on your workouts!

scraped_reviews.content: very good, but there should be an option to see to prepare my mind for exercises, I don't want to wake up surprised
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello! We‚Äôve already changed the algorithm - now the next workout unlocks right after you complete it and enter your set data during the session. No 12-hour wait! If you run into issues, contact support via the app - we're here to help ASAP!
Have a great training session with Fitness Online!

scraped_reviews.content: great for following a plan but i had a nosey round and now can't find old workouts really frustrating.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello!
To change the plan, please go to "Workouts" and tap the button with the three lines in the upper right corner. Your workout plans should appear there, and you‚Äôll be able to open the one you need.
If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to reach out to our support team through the app.
We're always happy to help!

scraped_reviews.content: locked workouts even when paid for lets this down big time. 12 hour waits
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello!
We‚Äôve already changed the algorithm for the next workout day. Thus, if you complete your workout and fill in the data on completed sets during the workout, and not afterwards, the next workout will be available without the 12-hour wait.
If you have any issues, please contact support via the app, and we'll make sure to assist you ASAP!

scraped_reviews.content: I like this app because it guides me on weight recommendations, helps to maintain an automatic log of the exercise and reps done. And if you get the paid versions then there are bonus options in terms of nutrition, supplements and other guidance you can receive from other trainers... Overall I would highly recommend this app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks! Pleasant to receive such reviews! Wish you the best workouts!

scraped_reviews.content: Really great workout app! It gets a little bit getting used to especially to logging the sets you did. I just wish the rest time between sets isn't locked under subscription, that would've been really useful for free users to see how many seconda left until the next set
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We‚Äôll keep doing our best for you to achieve maximum results in your workouts! Thank you!

title: Any.do - To do list & Calendar
description: ü•á "#1 To do list app out there‚Äù - WSJ üèÜ Editor's Choice by Google Over +40M people, families and teams rely on Any.do to stay organized and get more done. It's a simple and powerful to do list app with built in tasks, reminders, daily planner and calendar - all-in-one. ü•á "A MUST HAVE APP" (Lifehacker, NYTimes, USA TODAY). Any.do is a free to-do list, planner & calendar app for managing and organizing your daily tasks, to-do lists, notes, reminders, checklists, calendar events, grocery lists, and more. Organize your tasks & to-do list ‚Ä¢ ADVANCED CALENDAR & DAILY PLANNER - Keep your to-do list and calendar events always at hand with our calendar widget. Any.do to-do list & planner support daily calendar view, 3-day Calendar view, Weekly calendar view & agenda view, with built-in reminders. Review and organize your calendar events and to do list side by side. ‚Ä¢ SYNCS SEAMLESSLY - Keeps all your to do list, tasks, reminders, notes, calendar & agenda always in sync so you‚Äôll never forget a thing. Sync your phone‚Äôs calendar, google calendar, Facebook events, outlook calendar, or any other calendar so you don‚Äôt forget an important event. Even on your Wear OS device. ‚Ä¢ SET REMINDERS - One-time reminders, recurring reminders, Location reminders & voice reminders. NEW! Easily create tasks and get reminders in WhatsApp. ‚Ä¢ WORK TOGETHER - Share your to do list and assign tasks with your friends, family & colleagues from your task list to collaborate and get more done. --- ALL-IN-ONE PLANNER AND CALENDAR APP FOR GETTING THINGS DONE Create and set reminders with voice to your to do list. For better task management flow we added a calendar integration to keep your agenda always up to date. For better productivity, we added recurring reminders, location reminders, one-time reminders, sub-tasks, notes & file attachments. To keep your to do list up to date, we‚Äôve added a daily planner and focus mode. INTEGRATIONS Any.do To do list, Calendar, planner & Reminders Integrates with Google Calendar, Outlook, WhatsApp, Slack, Gmail, Google Tasks, Evernote, Trello, Wunderlist, Todoist, Zapier, Asana, Microsoft to-do, Salesforce, OneNote, Google Assistant, Amazon Alexa, Office 365, Exchange, Jira & More. TO DO LIST, CALENDAR, PLANNER & REMINDERS MADE SIMPLE Designed to keep you on top of your to do list, tasks and calendar events with no hassle. With intuitive drag and drop of tasks, swiping to mark to-do's as complete, and shaking your device to remove completed from your to do list - you can stay organized and enjoy every minute of it. POWERFUL TO DO LIST TASK MANAGEMENT Add a to do list item straight from your email / Gmail / Outlook inbox by forwarding to do@any.do. Attach files from your computer, Dropbox, or Google Drive to your to-tasks. DAILY PLANNER AND LIFE ORGANIZER Any.do is a to do list, a calendar, an inbox, a notepad, a checklist, a task list, a board for post its or sticky notes, a task & project management tool, a reminder app, a daily planner, a family organizer, an agenda, a bill planner and overall the simplest productivity tool you will ever have. SHARE LISTS, ASSIGN & ORGANIZE TASKS Planning & organizing projects has never been easier. Now you can share lists between family members, assign tasks to each other, chat, and much more. Any.do will help you and the people around you stay in sync and get reminders so that you can focus on what matters, knowing you had a productive day and crossed off your to do list. GROCERY LIST AND SHOPPING LIST Any.do task list, calendar, agenda, reminders & planner is also great for shopping lists at the grocery store. Simply create a list on Any.do, share it with your loved ones, and see them adding their shopping items in real time.
descriptionHTML:
ü•á "#1 To do list app out there‚Äù - WSJ
üèÜ Editor's Choice by Google

Over +40M people, families and teams rely on Any.do to stay organized and get more done. It's a simple and powerful to do list app with built in tasks, reminders, daily planner and calendar - all-in-one.

ü•á "A MUST HAVE APP" (Lifehacker, NYTimes, USA TODAY).

Any.do is a free to-do list, planner & calendar app for managing and organizing your daily tasks, to-do lists, notes, reminders, checklists, calendar events, grocery lists, and more.

Organize your tasks & to-do list

‚Ä¢ ADVANCED CALENDAR & DAILY PLANNER - Keep your to-do list and calendar events always at hand with our calendar widget. Any.do to-do list & planner support daily calendar view, 3-day Calendar view, Weekly calendar view & agenda view, with built-in reminders. Review and organize your calendar events and to do list side by side.

‚Ä¢ SYNCS SEAMLESSLY - Keeps all your to do list, tasks, reminders, notes, calendar & agenda always in sync so you‚Äôll never forget a thing. Sync your phone‚Äôs calendar, google calendar, Facebook events, outlook calendar, or any other calendar so you don‚Äôt forget an important event. Even on your Wear OS device.

‚Ä¢ SET REMINDERS - One-time reminders, recurring reminders, Location reminders & voice reminders. NEW! Easily create tasks and get reminders in WhatsApp.

‚Ä¢ WORK TOGETHER - Share your to do list and assign tasks with your friends, family & colleagues from your task list to collaborate and get more done.

---

ALL-IN-ONE PLANNER AND CALENDAR APP FOR GETTING THINGS DONE
Create and set reminders with voice to your to do list.
For better task management flow we added a calendar integration to keep your agenda always up to date.
For better productivity, we added recurring reminders, location reminders, one-time reminders, sub-tasks, notes & file attachments.
To keep your to do list up to date, we‚Äôve added a daily planner and focus mode.

INTEGRATIONS
Any.do To do list, Calendar, planner & Reminders Integrates with Google Calendar, Outlook, WhatsApp, Slack, Gmail, Google Tasks, Evernote, Trello, Wunderlist, Todoist, Zapier, Asana, Microsoft to-do, Salesforce, OneNote, Google Assistant, Amazon Alexa, Office 365, Exchange, Jira & More.

TO DO LIST, CALENDAR, PLANNER & REMINDERS MADE SIMPLE
Designed to keep you on top of your to do list, tasks and calendar events with no hassle. With intuitive drag and drop of tasks, swiping to mark to-do's as complete, and shaking your device to remove completed from your to do list - you can stay organized and enjoy every minute of it.

POWERFUL TO DO LIST TASK MANAGEMENT
Add a to do list item straight from your email / Gmail / Outlook inbox by forwarding to do@any.do. Attach files from your computer, Dropbox, or Google Drive to your to-tasks.

DAILY PLANNER AND LIFE ORGANIZER
Any.do is a to do list, a calendar, an inbox, a notepad, a checklist, a task list, a board for post its or sticky notes, a task & project management tool, a reminder app, a daily planner, a family organizer, an agenda, a bill planner and overall the simplest productivity tool you will ever have.

SHARE LISTS, ASSIGN & ORGANIZE TASKS
Planning & organizing projects has never been easier. Now you can share lists between family members, assign tasks to each other, chat, and much more. Any.do will help you and the people around you stay in sync and get reminders so that you can focus on what matters, knowing you had a productive day and crossed off your to do list.

GROCERY LIST AND SHOPPING LIST
Any.do task list, calendar, agenda, reminders & planner is also great for shopping lists at the grocery store. Simply create a list on Any.do, share it with your loved ones, and see them adding their shopping items in real time.
summary: Daily planner with to-do list & tasks, reminders, checklists, calendar & agenda

scraped_reviews.content: Good todolist. Best thing about the app is the push notifications for reminders. Helps remind me to pay bills and do other important things. For more detailed reminders with better categorizations, look elsewhere like todois. But overall, I've used for years and have been really satisfied especially with the cross platform( phone, tablet, pc) intergration
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for sharing your experience! üòä For more advanced categorization and project management features, you can upgrade to our Workspace or Family plans. They include powerful tools while keeping the same cross-platform ease you enjoy!

scraped_reviews.content: Annoying in the extreme - Every few days it randomly pops up a blob that overlays on top of whatever is on the screen and says "Help me plan my day!" and there's no setting to turn it off. Crazy intrusive. Also the voice interpretation ai doesn't work. You have to phrase what you say in one exact way that it expects, otherwise it doesn't set the reminder. And even when you do phrase how it worked before, it will often stop interpreting what you were saying before you finish speaking. garbage
scraped_reviews.replyContent: The daily push can be easily disabled by going to Settings => Daily push ü§ì As to the voice option, we're not entirely sure to what you're referring. If you can please send us more details at https://www.any.do/contact_form we will be more than happy to look further into this for you!

scraped_reviews.content: I have been using this app for many, many years and until recently I had virtually no complaints. However, something seems to have changed recently and my reminders simply stop at some point. Is there a limit on how many times a task can be snoozed before it goes to sleep forever? I have found that I need to check the app every evening and 1) see what I have forgotten and 2) reinstate reminders for tasks that have dismissed themselves (no longer reminding me.) Such a bummer!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for sharing this! ü§ì That behavior doesn‚Äôt sound expected. Could you please contact us at https://www.any.do/contact_form with a few details? We‚Äôd love to investigate and help fix this for you.

scraped_reviews.content: My husband and I have been using Any.do for years. Up until the more recent update, we had been able to share shopping lists with each other as well as any other "to do" lists for no extra cost. Now, that feature is considered "premium" and is no longer available unless we pay. We'll have to find a different app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback. Shared lists are now part of our Family plan, which includes 4 members and 4 shared boards for a flat fee. Learn more here: https://support.any.do/en/articles/8635977-any-do-subscription-plans-explained

scraped_reviews.content: It used to be simple and effective, but it now has the most loud and obnoxious ads. Beware of opening this app in a class, library, church service, or any other quiet setting that you'll happen to need your lists or notes. It will advertise to everyone around you. I will be uninstalling this app. There are plenty of to-do list apps out there. You don't have to settle for this one. Edit: My phone is always on silent mode so that has not worked. I found another free app that works great! Thanks!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: For a completely ad-free experience, you might consider our premium subscription. In the meantime, using the app in silent mode or enabling the "Do Not Disturb" feature on your device can help prevent any disruptions.

scraped_reviews.content: Willing to rate higher if I see some fixes and improvements: The interface on PC is difficult to work with Lack of a "select all" button Unable to choose which list to view on the widgets Otherwise, I do like that there are no ads and it's free for the basic account that gives me all I need. I also like that this is universal across PC, android, and apple.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: If you're referring to bulk actions, we already offer it on desktop: https://support.any.do/en/articles/8637094-bulk-editing üòä As to choosing specific lists for the widget, you are welcome to suggest this as a feature as explained right here: https://support.any.do/en/articles/8634447-uservoice-suggest-a-feature

scraped_reviews.content: I used to love this app and recommend it to friends regularly. The updates have made it harder to use. I don't need anything fancy. I just need a list. I don't want to clear or uncheck all items on my grocery list, I just want to go through it and untick the ones I need today. I regret ever using the 'smart' grocery list bc now, even though I have turned it off, it won't revert to basic and my list is essentially useless.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry you feel this way. We plan to issue a feature to convert Grocery Lists to regular ones in one of our next versions. We apologize for any inconvenience.

scraped_reviews.content: I've had this app for years but I feel like I can't trust it in 2 situations. If I set a reminder & then I have to 'snooze' the reminder either an hr later or the next day, or whatever.... it is successful in doing that, but if I hit the snooze more than 2 or 3 times, then the reminder becomes unreliable. Sometimes it works and sometimes it doesn't. Also, if I set monthly reminders, it will work, & then not work! I just missed paying a bill, b/c I didn't get my monthly reminder. Frustrasting!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôre sorry to hear about your experience. Our team strives for reliability, and we‚Äôd love to understand the issue better. Please check your notification settings and ensure the app has the necessary permissions. If the problem persists, reach out to our support team under settings -> support we‚Äôre happy to help!

scraped_reviews.content: I want a day planner that lets me set a time for tasks without there always being a reminder notification. This app can't seem to provide that. I'm also not happy with how the free option wasn't made available to me during sign up. Seems fishy to say "free forever" on the homepage, but when it comes to signing up, I only saw a 7 day free trial. The help section was a joke, so I unsubscribed immediately.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Any.do is a free app. We provide 90% of our features at no cost. We never require our users to upgrade. All users can use the app for free for as long as they please. Any user can dismiss the trial and user the app for free. If you have any feedback regarding our help center we will be happy to hear via our contact form: www.any.do/contact_form

scraped_reviews.content: Love this app! This is the only app that lets me move items around on my lists, like moving unavailable grocery items to the bottom. I also like that my completed items stay with me if I want, like my packing list, so after a trip I can make all items active again for the next trip without having to think of everything again. And the completed items on the grocery list jog my memory for the next shopping trip. I just use the basic app and am very happy with it.

Only a so-so task list, the low rating is because they charge your card without any warning. It wasn't until today that I realized $90 worth of charges on my card when I only authorized $30. BEWARE! Also, charging your card without your approval/notification is okay becuase "it's buried somewhere in the 400 page terms of service you agreed to" is NOT a valid excuse. This is clearly set up to charge your card without you knowing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We never require our users to upgrade. All users can use the app for free for as long as they please. A payment can only be made upon the user's authorization. Regarding the account, our team will be happy to look into it, should you contact us at- www.any.do/contact_form.

scraped_reviews.content: I used to love this (five stars) before you changed it. I was able to set repeatable tasks for each day of the week, but now if I set a repeating task today, for example, for every Wednesday, the reminder will come up today, not Wednesday. I want the reminder on the day I want. I am very disappointed. By the way, I won't use Any Do for my grocery list. I use a better one that keeps a running cost (including tax) for each store I go to.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are aware of this issue and working on an updated version that will fix it. Stay tuned! :)

scraped_reviews.content: Since I wrote my original review in 2017, I have continued to use and rely on the app, but I still have my frustrations. Often, I will type a to do before selecting the time, but the time buttons are so small that I will accidentally hit outside of them, and my to do disappears, meaning I have to retype it again. Also, the pop-ups and list don't sync. So, if I delete a to do on the list in the app, the pop-up remains. I'd also like to be able to remove a batch of to dos at once. The features outweigh the frustrations for me with this app, and I do depend on it daily. I've been using this app for years and loved it... until the last couple of weeks. It has stopped notifying me when a task is due. I have uninstalled and reinstalled, and it works for one day and then stops again. I need an app that notifies me. I am frustrated because I have depended upon and used this app for years without issue, and I have quite the list made!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're so sorry for this Elizabeth! Please note that you can change your font size on you device to be able to see the buttons clearly, regarding the reminders please submit a bug through Settings - Support, our team will be happy to assist you and make sure you are able to use the app properly :)

scraped_reviews.content: This app was great for me for a while, then I didn't need it for a whole. When I came back it seemed lackluster, but overall fine. What made me dump it was that the app appears to have teamed up with target or some other retailer and they would add stuff to your "shopping list" without your permission and I would get these pop-ups on my phone telling you they added some random product to your list. I never had a list nor used the products pushed and no way I saw to stop it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear you're experiencing issues with your app. Please reach out to our Support Team, at- www.any.do/contact_form, mentioning the app version you are currently using, and we will be more than happy to advise accordingly, and make sure you are able to use the app properly! :)

scraped_reviews.content: Instead of shopping around, I downloaded Any.do because of how widely used it is. Setting up one day's schedule should have taken me just a couple of minutes. But the app seemingly randomized which day of the week an entry was for. On two occasions, it picked a day over a year away. After twenty minutes of fighting the app, I finally had my schedule together. I spent another ten minutes trying to get any notifications to work, with no luck. Fortunately, uninstalling only took a few seconds.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are not aware of any issues with randomized times for entering tasks, so that sounds odd. As per the notifications, there may be an issue with your device allowing the app to send notifications properly. If you're still experiencing any issues, kindly let us know at- www.any.do/contact_form, so we can get to the bottom of this for you.

scraped_reviews.content: There are certain things I love like the fact that it sorts my grocery list by aisle automatically. But overall this app stresses me out. I just want an app that allows me to share my grocery list. But the grocery list seems buried in an area that isn't intuitive. I don't need something to schedule every second of my life which seems to be more this apps aim.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Any.do is primarily a productivity app, its main purpose is to help you handle all of your to-do's, using powerful tools and integrations. The Grocery List is one of the features we offer, which is found under the Task View. Although it's a powerful tool, it is not the main aspect of the app, as Any.do wasn't created to be simply a Grocery app :)

scraped_reviews.content: I like the app, it is a bit convoluted at times. Stupid expensive! $2.99...Per month! There's hundreds of other apps to choose from. What this app brings in functionality nowhere near justifies the price. I don't care for ads, and I'm happy to pay developers for their work. I pay for monthly subscriptions to a few apps, some higher than this. I just can't see it justifed here in any way.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Any.do is a free app. We provide 95% of our features at no cost, including all core features. We never require our users to upgrade. We modeled all our pricing tiers off of similar services so we could stay competitive. We also occasionally offer promotions, you can inquire about them at premium@any.do!

scraped_reviews.content: I have had this app for almost a year. I was really enjoying it. I mostly used it for my grocery list and weekend to do list. However, I will be uninstalling it now because it deemed it appropriate to automatically add "Welch's brand Fruit Snacks!" to my grocery list without permission. I encounter ads in a lot of places, but I refuse to use an app that panders to corporations in such a way that it starts adding branded products to my damn grocery list.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: This could happen if a user pressed on an advertisement for a product. We will be more than happy to look into this for you and sort this out, should you send us a bug report. Please submit a bug report (Settings- Support- Bug Report)

scraped_reviews.content: Very annoyed that I have to keep signing in and then it deleted all my lists. Ive been working on a master shopping list for several months. Im trying to track what my regular purchases so that I could have just opened an app such as this, gone down my list, and checked off what I needed. But when I logged back in AGAIN, my shopping lists were gone for the third time. When it works, its great. It just doesnt work enough and I dont have time for this.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, that's odd, please send us a bug report in your app via Settings - Support, so we can get to the bottom of this for you :)

scraped_reviews.content: I tried it years ago and never really got it going. Then I switched to Wunderlist and became an organized machine! Now Wunderlist is being retired, so I thought I'd try again, guessing it would be much better by now and that my ability to use it to my advantage would be vastly improved. Nope. No ability for folders or some other way to group lists together so I don't have to flip through all my lists to find the one I want. Not even a list view to make them easier to find.

Overall, the app is pretty good. I have a few complaints, but they don't imapct the basic usefulness of the app. 1. The app doesn't make a noise when a reminder comes up. 2. It has been sporadic and may not keep a reminder posted even when it hasn't been marked complete. 3. The format for setting a reminder day is clunky. Recurring reminders are especially difficult and may not even be available (for example, there is no way to set a recurring reminder to every 6 months).
scraped_reviews.replyContent: This sounds very odd as we're not aware of any issues with receiving or setting up reminders. Please submit a bug report via Settings - Support and our team will look into this ASAP.

scraped_reviews.content: Need to go up to premium to really make it useful. Premium is $30+. Otherwise it is a basic calendar that "might" be as good as the one the phone come with. It could be easier to use, but I'm not putting the time into figuring that out when I'm asked to upgrade. It comes up almost everytime I try to use 1 of the options. The simplest of free calendars allows me more options than the free part of this calendar. I just deleted it. Not worth going through error reports right in the beginning.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: 90% of the app is completely free. You should only receive a pop-up about Premium if you try to use a Premium exclusive feature, plus one time when you first log in. If you are seeing it more than this, please submit a bug report in your app via Settings - Support so we can look into this for you.

scraped_reviews.content: Stupid popup reminding me to add reminders or do something covers my keypad and stays for a long time with no way to close it. I can't keep checked off items. It reminds me multiple times, every couple of seconds, to clear off the checked items, again blocking me. I can't move items between lists and if there is a way, it isn't easy enough for me to figure out. Cumbersome.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: These are strange issues! We highly recommend you submit a bug report in your app via Settings - Support, so we can help you get to the bottom of this issue.

scraped_reviews.content: Eh, it wasn't for me. Maybe it's because I was using the free version, I didn't think this app was very intuitive at all. First of all, it's very annoying to not be able to set my own reminder times for tasks. I had the option to either choose 9 in the morning or 6 in the evening. What the heck? Secondly, the reminder feature goes off a little too often. Only one reminder is needed. I know I could have turned notifications off, but I did want reminders for my tasks. I should have been able to control the number of reminders. Also, it was pretty lame that I couldn't make multiple lists. I was just dissatisfied overall with my limited options. I deleted and am using another to do list app
scraped_reviews.replyContent: You can set a reminder for any time you want using the "Custom" option in your reminder settings. Also, you should only get one reminder per task. If this is not the case, please submit a bug report via Settings - Support, so we can look into this for you. You can also make as many lists as you want from the Grid View screen.

scraped_reviews.content: It's a mess. I add new tasks and tag them. But they will randomly disappear, reappear. And the tags will disappear. Editing and adding them back in doesn't help because once a tag disappears you can't add it back in again. Disappearing tasks is the worst because there's no warning. They're just gone. They're not listed as complete, they just disappear. Sometimes they'll come back but sometimes I have to re-enter them...assuming I remember. I pay for this app, so the fact that the basic functionality of keeping my list intact is random and spotty is unacceptable. It may have something to do with syncing... no idea. But either way, I'm going to use another app because I just don't trust it anymore. These errors seem to be recent, like in the last 3 months.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: This sounds very odd! We highly recommend you submit a bug report in your app via Settings - Support so we can look into this issue for you.

scraped_reviews.content: This app was great until the latest update and the grocery list changed. Now, it's just annoying to use. It takes more steps to get to what I want to do. The app forces a default list to display that I don't use, so I have to navigate back to the home screen to get to the grocery list. I preferred generic Shopping List where I would enter all items. I don't want a different list for each store. The predictive function stinks because you have to clear the field after you add the suggested text.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry you feel this way, please note that you can disable the Grocery List from your setting (Setting > set Smart Grocery List too off). You are in no way obligated to use the Smart List :)

scraped_reviews.content: Mainly, I want the option to have a bigger font!! I forgot to cancel after the free week so I guess I am stuck with it for a year... but the ONLY reason I wanted to cancel thus otherwise good app is the font size. 7/3/19. I did not want to increase the font size of all the other apps etc on my phone in order to increase this one. The others were an adequate size. Since I could not change the size of the font internally to the app, I ended up not using it at all and now I am cancelling.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Heya, you can increase fonts from your device's Settings :) As for any subscription issues, you're welcome to reach out to Premium@any.do and our team would be happy to help!

scraped_reviews.content: Good lord, i wish i hadn't finally updated the app a few days ago. I just want it to stop adding items to a grocery list - I'm not even on the app and I'll randomly get a pop up at the bottom of my phone that some specific brand of organic milk has been added to my grocery list. I've deleted the grocery list, and it'll pop up again the next day. For years this app was perfect - used to be so simple and basic, but the recent updates are running it.

Cant skip a task... So Tick Tick isn't going to let us deal with failure in a healthy manner? Which is to accept and acknowledge over tasking yourself, and try to do better next time? I use this app to put in thing like weekly chores. Sometimes I just don't have enough time to get around to all of the recurring tasks I set. It is unbelievably fricken annoying to not have a skip for those instances. Especially since half the time I delete every occurrence just trying to get my inbox neat.

Was great until a recent update and now it's unusable, I've been using this for YEARS with no problems. Any sub tasks I put in just vanish, same with notes. I just tried to create a new list and it wouldn't let me. I'll just find something else at this point. Edit: support just reached out asking me to contact them. I don't have time to debug your app for you. I've already found something else.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry you feel this way! We encourage users to reach out to us directly in order to better understand the issue, or feedback and get to the bottom of things so we can offer a full resolution. We work hard to resolve any issues! :). If this is not the type of solution you are looking for, we respect your decision to move to a different app.

scraped_reviews.content: There's an issue where the bottom pop up notifications do not display in Android 10. Which is my entire reason for using this app and why I paid for a year. I understand bugs happen but I'm losing the value I paid, for a reminder app that doesn't remind me... I reached out to support, they said a fix is coming in a few weeks. I asked to have my subscription extended for the loss of use, so far no resolution. I'll give 5 stars once my money doesn't feel wasted. Thanks
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we don't support beta versions for your OS, and we have a fix for the notifications issue already out to our beta users, which you can learn more about here: https://support.any.do/super-users/ , with the update rolling out to standard users in the next few days. Because you were using a beta version of Android Q, we can't refund you.

scraped_reviews.content: Love the interface, love the concept. But it lacks several key features on the Android side. The app both web, and the download version have sync issues, to keep your data inline you must keep the Web version up and the if you are using the downloaded app, you must keep it running to keep anything sync. Then you will lose any type of reoccurring tasks.   Love the sub task concept, really slick but if you cannot keep them in sync it does not work very well.   Another item that does not work, though I have requested it is that face that landscape mode is not coded for in all of the app, again in both the web and app version, makes it difficult to use on a tablet if you are switching to a keyboard for example.   So because of syncing issues, missing key landscape issues in several places in the app, lose of data due to syncing issues I had to uninstall the app. Lucky for me I am using 2 or 3 to do list so I have my primary one I am still using, so nothing lost except time. Though I was really hoping this one would pan out.   So though I am marking it as 1 start, I like the concept, and lots of it, but it is buggy,, and needs some serious testing to work out the syncing issues.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry to hear that you experience async issues! You are welcome to reach out to our support so they can help you get Any.do's sync back on track (at Customers@any.do). We are planning on adding more support for landscape mode in the future.

scraped_reviews.content: It suddenly quit syncing. I've tried logging off and back on again with no luck. When I try to do it manually it just already says that it was synced "just now"...even though none of the things I have added show up. Never had this problem before. If I can't get it resolved I will remove app and find something different. Very frustrating. Update: I did a FORCE STOP on the app, and it seems to be back to normal. It works for what I need (shopping list) but isn't the easiest for rearranging the list, and the advertisement at the bottom of the list is very annoying and makes rearranging the list even more difficult.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please note that you can move items between categories on the Smart Grocery List by tapping the item you want to change the category of, and choosing your desired category. The pop up at the bottom simply suggest adding identifiable grocery items to your list, and is not an ad. To learn more, visit our Help Center at- support.any.do/grocery-list.

scraped_reviews.content: $$$ Im being charged a full year up front and not at end of year or monthly as advertised! Great app, and i was hoping to enjoy it. I have been busy so i didnt have time to appreciate the 7 day trial, and that is ok, so i was going to do that during first month in wich should cost me about +-$3.00. But instead i was charged $35.88 right at the end of first week. When i went tovunsubscribe, it said I'd have to keep full year subscription, so there is NO monthly... Messed me up, im NOT rich!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: A payment can only be made upon the user's authorization, and we allow you to switch up or cancel your subscription plan, in accordance with our TOS. That said, our team will be happy to assist with any subscription issues, should you contact us at https://www.any.do/contact_form.

scraped_reviews.content: Meh. A little too complicated and doesn't really do what I want it to. Shopping lists aren't easy to create. The app is really pushy about going premium and wants you to rate it within the first minute you've opened it. Let me get used to the thing before you bombard me! Also, all the buttons are really small and kind of hard to push
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Are you experiencing any issues on Android 6.0? If so, report a bug through the app and we will work to fix them ASAP!

scraped_reviews.content: I don't like the fact that drag and drop of tasks is not good. It works only in a specific manner. That is It does not indicate when you can drop the task after dragging. There is no visual clue. Wow! On snooze the task gets rearranged in calendar view. The only feature I never seen in any other apps. Never miss a call back that was important. The best part I like the most is the in app notification from where you can select task and postpone as usual.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry about that. We are not aware of any issues with the drag and drop functionality. Kindly contact us at- https://www.any.do/contact_form, with any relevant information (as explained here- https://support.any.do/sending-files-to-support/), and we will be happy to look into it for you.

scraped_reviews.content: I'm not sure what happened, but now the app randomly creates and adds weird items to a grocery list that I keep deleting. No matter what I do, it keeps making a grocery list every few days while I'm not even using the app. Love the pop-up task reminder at the bottom, but the ghost grocery list creation and randomly adding items has me looking for a different app for my to-do lists.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: This seems to be an ad (outside of our app) that you're interacting with. Please clear the app's data from the device by going to Settings‚ÜíApps‚ÜíAny.do‚ÜíClear data/cache/storage - varies per device. Then, uninstall and re-install the app via Google Play. If it still happens please send us a bug report via (Settings-Bug Report).

scraped_reviews.content: Not for me! Off the bat, it assumes that you have an extra hour on waking to plan the rest of your day. Um, no! If I did, I don't need an app. Doesn't allow duration entry. Sounds that cannot be turned off. Time frames not sensible, creating custom EVERY time gets OLD. Supremely confusing. Doesn't allow duration entry. Can't repeat that enough. It does work, but if you're cramming in 10/hour, you're better off just spreadsheeting it. Tried them side-by-side, Excel won. And I ü§¨ü§¨ü§¨ hate Excel.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: You can set duration in the calendar integration for events, tasks are set to act as action items. You can set reminders and due dates by typing in natural language like reminder me tomorrow at 9:30. You can also drag and drop items in the time category for easy planning. If you need assistance please contact us under settings-> support.

scraped_reviews.content: The app is pretty good and has good features. However, when I shared a grocery list with my fiance it wouldn't let him accept and it it sent him TONS of emails regarding it. Literally 1 every few minutes for hours and I have no clue how to stop this without him just unsubscribing. Given that sharing is a big part of why I wanted the app, it does put a damper on things for me.

This could be an AWESOME app. I upgraded so I could add stuff from my various devices. I like that I have my tasks, calendar and even grocery list in one place. However the app CONSTANTLY CRASHES!! EVERY SINGLE DAY it crashes and the ONLY way I can go back into it is if I force close it thru my settings and then open it back up. If that annoyance could be fixed, this could easily be a 5 star app that I would recommend. But at this point, I'm ready to cut my losses and go back to paper and pen!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we're sorry to hear you're experiencing issues with the app! We will be more than happy to look into this for you and sort this out, should you send us a bug report (Settings- Support), with the relevant details, so we can get to the bottom of this for you!

scraped_reviews.content: Confused. I'm not sure what happened and I'm glad I didn't have a long grocery list because I just had to transfer everything from my "Grocery List" to a new one so it would open like a normal list and not as a pop up. I don't understand why y'all thought that was a good idea but whatever. I've clicked everything I can think to click. "Convert to regular list" isn't an option that I've seen anywhere. Is that only in premium?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: You can convert your Smart Grocery Lists into regular lists by opening their list options and selecting "Convert to regular list." :)

scraped_reviews.content: I have the same recurring tasks to do every day. I need a to-do-list reminder to buzz me when it's time. The problem with this app, is that those reminder times somehow start drifting every day, giving me different times the next day! That is an annoying fail! Screw it, I'm going elsewhere. if I find a better app, I'll let you guys know. UPDATE : Suggestion did not work, and I found an app, that does not drift. I have moved on.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Our team will be happy to look into it for you, should you submit a bug report via the app's Settings - Support. That said, if this is not the type of solution you are looking for, we respect your decision to move to a different app.

scraped_reviews.content: I switched to Any.do when Wunderlist ended. I wanted a simple interface that let me share lists and tasks with my husband. Any.do did that, but in the least efficient way possible. Our initials are the same and tiles aren't customizable, so it was impossible to tell who a task was assigned to. The app always defaulted to tasks even if I had just been using a shopping list. It was a huge pain to navigate. Not what we needed at all.

This overpriced app just keeps getting worse. Now, you can no longer add items using Google. careful...they don't notify you before charging your card for another year. Not an email or anything. This was once a useful app. Now it's just a money grab. New additions...besides not working with Google, it now is buggy with slow loads and glitches. And although I have a "Premium" subscription, they want even more money to use all the features. I'm guessing the 5 star reviews are from when it worked.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Google has recently announced that they no longer support the integration with third party apps, although you can use the standard voice input of your device! As for the renewals - per our TOS, they are automatic unless the user cancels the subscription prior to the renewal date (via Google Play). Go to any.do/contact_form for further assistance!

scraped_reviews.content: At first I thought 'wow this can do everything! It's exactly what I need.' When I downloaded it and got to test it out, I noticed the features I needed the most were on premium. I'm fine with that, but only if premium was a one time payment. Not monthly payments for a membership. Monthly payments are for bills, taxes, video subscriptions, vpns, maybe even online storage subscriptions, but most definitely not calendars or to do lists. Those should stay as free or a small one time payment.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Any.do is not only a product but also a service. We are continuously adding new features, keeping your information synced and safe 24/7, and providing Priority Support for any need you may have. Since Any.do is offering much more than a standard product, we have decided a subscription is the best pricing for it, like similar apps on the market :)

scraped_reviews.content: Clean, simple interface. Generally fast and easy to add things as I think of them. However.....I wish the app didn't think it was so smart. I find the auto-spelling annoying. Putting in 8-10 ft. electric cord under lists was automatically interpreted as August 10th. And the assumptions about categories for shopping lists is annoying. 5 different things to get a hardware store end up in 4 different categories. Changing the categories for shopping lists is not easy to manage (and why do they show up under Tasks at all?)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry about that! Please note that you can disable the Smart Type reminder, by clicking on the highlighted time that shows in blue. As per the categories, when each item is added, it is filed under a relevant category, or a new one is generated accordingly. At this time, please note that categories can not be added manually or edited.

scraped_reviews.content: App still needs a lot of work. It's not at the point of being worth a paid subscription. It needs more organizational tools, an easier way to repeat tasks daily/weekly/monthly, as well as a timeframe for each task (not for notifications, but for organization). Also, when getting events from the calendar it should only grab current or future events to reduce the clutter.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: What organizational tools are you looking for? And what are we missing with our recurring tasks?

scraped_reviews.content: Great app! But have a few suggestions that would make it the best app in the market! Trust me people are looking for this! 1) The ability to add your schedule with a few clicks. For example you can set reoccuring events, but peoples schedules alternate. Would be great to be able to click the days you work group then at the same time and categorize them under work. (For reference look at the nursegrid app) 2) add your spouse or family directly. So everything is synced real time.(familywall)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We have forwarded your idea to the product team Thank you for your feedback. We truly value our users input, and our Product team is always adding user suggestions to our roadmap. Regarding the real time sync with your family, I would recommend trying out shared lists, you can find more about it here: https://support.any.do/sharing-lists-and-tasks/

scraped_reviews.content: Only rated 2 stars because of the ability to sync with the calendar apps on the phone and the ability to cross out any tasks once finished. However, the app is fairly simple with tasks laid out like a shopping or to do list with the inability to edit the timings of tasks. I had set an appointment for 1:30 but the app had automatically set it for 10:00 am and not allowing me to edit it. Also, it would have been nice for the tasks to be laid out in calendar format with color-coding options.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Maira, please note you are able to edit your tasks, and your reminder times, by simply tapping on your tasks, furthermore, using our Color Tags, you will be able to color code all your tasks, you can learn more here: https://support.any.do/color-tags/

scraped_reviews.content: Love this app. I like to utilize lists to keep myself organized as well as to feel the small accomplishments. (Even on days when you can't get through everything it's nice to see the progress you're making) I use it for groceries, to do lists, tasks that will help reach a short/longterm goal, work to do lists, and more. It's great that you can have more than one list, set reminders, attach a file, add notes or a tag with priority. It's the best app I've found.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the awesome review! Glad seeing you're enjoying using the features! ü§ìüíô

title: BRImo
description:
BRImo merupakan mobile banking favorit masyarakat Indonesia dengan total 35,8 juta pengguna hingga saat ini. Dirancang untuk memfasilitasi berbagai transaksi keuangan nasabah kapan saja dan di mana saja, BRImo hadir dengan berbagai fitur unggulan yang memenuhi kebutuhan finansial dan gaya hidup dalam satu aplikasi. 

Nikmati pengalaman finansial yang serba mudah dan serba bisa hanya dengan BRImo. Jangan sampai ketinggalan untuk merasakan kemudahan layanan BRImo yang banyak dipilih oleh jutaan pengguna!

‚Ä¢ Registrasi dari Dalam dan Luar Negeri
BRImo memungkinkan pendaftaran akun BRI dan buka rekening secara full digital tanpa perlu kartu debit, baik dari dalam maupun luar negeri. Nasabah dapat mendaftar menggunakan nomor HP dari 11 negara, termasuk Jepang, Korea Selatan, Hong Kong, USA, Saudi Arabia, UAE, Kuwait, Malaysia, Taiwan, Singapura, dan Timor Leste. Proses pendaftaran menjadi lebih fleksibel dan mudah.

‚Ä¢ Transaksi Antar Negara
BRImo memudahkan nasabah yang memiliki kebutuhan transaksi internasional melalui fitur transfer ke lebih dari 160 negara. Selain itu, BRImo mendukung pembayaran menggunakan QR di luar negeri (Singapura), memberikan kemudahan bertransaksi saat bepergian.

‚Ä¢ Lifestyle dan Entertainment
BRImo menyediakan berbagai layanan gaya hidup serta hiburan seperti pembelian voucher game, streaming, tiket BRI Liga 1, hingga pemesanan dan pembayaran tiket transportasi termasuk pesawat, semuanya dalam satu aplikasi.

‚Ä¢ Investasi
BRImo menyediakan beragam pilihan produk investasi bagi nasabah, mulai dari dana pensiun hingga emas. Bekerja sama dengan Pegadaian, BRImo menawarkan layanan jual, beli, dan cicil emas. Nasabah dapat mengelola investasinya dengan mudah melalui dashboard KSEI dan akses langsung ke BRIGHTS untuk pembelian saham.

‚Ä¢ Transaksi Sehari-Hari
BRImo memudahkan berbagai transaksi harian, mulai dari pembayaran tagihan dan cicilan, top up e-wallet dan pulsa/paket data, hingga pembayaran QRIS dengan sumber dana kartu kredit. BRImo juga memungkinkan setor tunai tanpa kartu di ATM BRI, memberikan kemudahan ekstra dalam mengelola keuangan. Dapatkan BRIpoin setiap kali bertransaksi dan tukarkan poin tersebut dengan berbagai e-voucher menarik.

‚Ä¢ Layanan Pelanggan yang Mudah Diakses
BRImo menyediakan layanan Contact BRI bebas pulsa, serta fitur chat dalam aplikasi untuk pengaduan transaksi, memastikan nasabah mendapatkan bantuan dengan cepat dan efisien.

‚Ä¢ Cashback Realtime
BRImo menjadi satu-satunya aplikasi mobile banking yang menawarkan cashback secara realtime untuk berbagai transaksi finansial, memberikan nilai tambah bagi setiap transaksi yang dilakukan. Jangan lewatkan kesempatan untuk menikmati berbagai manfaat eksklusif hanya di BRImo!

Butuh Bantuan?
Hubungi Layanan Pelanggan BRI:
* Telepon: 1500017
* Email: callbri@bri.co.id

Ingin Tahu Lebih Banyak?
Temukan informasi lengkap tentang BRI dan layanan lainnya:
* Website: bri.co.id
* Facebook: BRIofficialpage
* Instagram: @bankbri_id
* X: @kontakBRI
* Youtube: @BANK_BRI

scraped_reviews.content: so far, so good. But, then, there is a problem. The App doesn't represent overall transactions, like, withdrawal from an ATM does not counted in how much you expend in monthly transactions so there is a huge gap in the In App Expenditure Calculation.
