scraped_reviews.content: Terrible experience, especially on 'Activities'. Not supported to sort by year, unable to find specific transaction (and sort of), and sometimes while scrolling to find older transactions, it will pull back to recent transactions that frustrated to users. Then, they must scroll again. If they scroll too often, the system will warn them. Thus, they have to scroll carefully, unless they can't do. Don't you try to find any solution to make this easier than now? Really annoy with this experience.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we apologize for the inconvenience. We would definitely like to assist you with this. Please reach out to us via email callbri@bri.co.id. Tks~Hela

Very slow response for any click of the menu that takes about 5 seconds to respond, and 90% always forced out or freeze after the last update about 3 weeks ago. customer service always mentioned defects in my own cellphone that can't open the app, the phone is fine and running all apps very fast normally. Fix your app, it's very inconvenient to have these issues!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Sobat BRI, we apologize for the inconvenience you've experienced. For further assistance, please send the details of the issue via email to callbri@bri.co.id. If the issue has been resolved, we would greatly appreciate a 5 star rating from you, Sobat BRI. Tks~Yoga

Also, the latest update seems to have caused this problem, making it practically useless.

title: WhatsApp Business
description:
Everything you love about WhatsApp plus built-in tools for business

WhatsApp Business is a free-to-download app with built-in tools to help you work smarter, build trust, and grow your business. You get free calls* and free international messaging* plus business features to help you do more with conversations.

Download the app to get business benefits like these:

‚Ä¢ Work smarter. Save time by letting the app do the work for you! Send customers automated quick replies and away messages so you never miss an opportunity. Use labels to quickly organize, filter, and find important conversations. Create a status to share an offer or news, and even take orders and payments** in-app to create a great customer experience. ‚Ä¢ Build relationships and trust. With a professional business profile on a secure platform, you build credibility and trust with customers. Use the app to provide more responsive customer support and build long-term loyalty. Subscribe to Meta Verified*** to reinforce your authenticity. ‚Ä¢ Sell more and grow. Get discovered, advertise, and make more valuable customer connections. Boost sales by sending targeted offers to customers; create ads that click to WhatsApp; showcase your product catalog; and give customers the convenience of in-app orders and payments.**

FAQs

Are all features free? The app is free to download and use, with a mix of free and paid features. Can I still use my personal WhatsApp? Yes! As long as you have two different phone numbers, your business and personal accounts can live together on a single device. Can I transfer over my chat history? Yes. When you set up the WhatsApp Business app, you can restore a backup from your WhatsApp account to transfer your messages, media, and contacts to your business account. How many devices can I connect? You can have a total of five web-based devices or mobile phones on your account (up to 10 if you subscribe to Meta Verified***). *Data charges may apply. Contact your provider for details. **Not available in all markets ***Available soon globally
descriptionHTML:
Everything you love about WhatsApp plus built-in tools for business

WhatsApp Business is a free-to-download app with built-in tools to help you work smarter, build trust, and grow your business.

You get free calls* and free international messaging* plus business features to help you do more with conversations.


Download the app to get business benefits like these:


‚Ä¢ Work smarter. Save time by letting the app do the work for you! Send customers automated quick replies and away messages so you never miss an opportunity. Use labels to quickly organize, filter, and find important conversations. Create a status to share an offer or news, and even take orders and payments** in-app to create a great customer experience.

‚Ä¢ Build relationships and trust. With a professional business profile on a secure platform, you build credibility and trust with customers. Use the app to provide more responsive customer support and build long-term loyalty. Subscribe to Meta Verified*** to reinforce your authenticity.

‚Ä¢ Sell more and grow. Get discovered, advertise, and make more valuable customer connections. Boost sales by sending targeted offers to customers; create ads that click to WhatsApp; showcase your product catalog; and give customers the convenience of in-app orders and payments.**


FAQs


Are all features free?
The app is free to download and use, with a mix of free and paid features.

Can I still use my personal WhatsApp?
Yes! As long as you have two different phone numbers, your business and personal accounts can live together on a single device.

Can I transfer over my chat history?
Yes. When you set up the WhatsApp Business app, you can restore a backup from your WhatsApp account to transfer your messages, media, and contacts to your business account.

How many devices can I connect?
You can have a total of five web-based devices or mobile phones on your account (up to 10 if you subscribe to Meta Verified***).

*Data charges may apply. Contact your provider for details.
**Not available in all markets
***Available soon globally
summary: Simple tool for businesses to talk to their customers.

scraped_reviews.content: 1. There should be a feature for saving videos contacts save on status directly instead of always going to status saver or screen recording or begging please sendüò≠üòÇ 2. Another feature for having a play track for a video posted on status. so that if you didn't get one thing, you can go back instead of replaying from the beginning 3. Stop reducing picture and video qualityüò≠ Business Whatsapp is a great app. let's make it better

As a professional model and artist, WhatsApp Business has been extremely useful for me. It helps me stay organized, manage client communications, and respond quickly with automated messages. The catalog feature is perfect for showcasing my work, and labels make it easy to track different projects. A must-have tool for anyone managing a creative or freelance career!

WhatsApp is great but I feel it can be improved on. Firstly, it's now a bit of a challenge to access files when posting a status. Previously, files were arranged on WhatsApp the way it's been stored on the file folder and you could simply access a particular pic or video. Now though, pictures and videos are clustered into "recents" then a few folders. Secondly, it's really frustrating when we post a status update and the quality of the video or pic reduces drastically! Please improve on this!

It is a great app. However, there are few things that could be done. The app should allow one to post photos and videos on status in their original quality especially when one has reliable internet. Let there be options like, "medium , low, high/original" quality. Some tracks are also not available on whatsapp status. Messages also do fail to deliver sometimes even on high internet. Names of people and their status updates also dissapear from time to time .

I have to check the app constantly, as it has never managed to stay running in the background, and if the app isn't open I don't get notifications of messages coming through. I updated the app last week, and have had the message "App maintenance in progress" appear, which makes the app completely unresponsive. For several hours during the morning (UK time), it's this message or just a black screen when I open the app. Clients have been unable to contact me, and massively affected my business!

I'm using both WhatsApp Business and Messenger, and they generally work fine. However, for the past few weeks and still ongoing, I've been facing an issue where, during voice calls, the other person can't hear my voice. I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling the apps, updating my phone's software, and switching to a high-speed 5G Wi-Fi, but the issue remains. Interestingly, voice notes work perfectly, and regular SIM-based calls also work without any problems. The issue only on voice calls.

I don't know how to put this, but your quality is terrible, especially when I'm posting videos on my status. At least when I'm sending to someone I have an option to send HD can't you put that option when posting on a status too? Your App is great but how our content lose quality when we're posting it's terrible and it's bad for business! please improve!!!!

my experience with this app is bad. I get logged out from my account every day saying a spam message was noted whereas there are no such things. After a while I'll recover the account saying they're sorry their system flagged my account, like this whole thing is getting me so angry üò° and yet they don't want to work on their system.

I‚Äôve been using WhatsApp Business for a while now, and at first, it was a really good app smooth, reliable, and easy to use for communication. But lately, it‚Äôs been seriously disappointing. I‚Äôll send a message, and instead of delivering, it just disappears. Sometimes, I don‚Äôt even receive messages until about 30 minutes later. At first, I thought it was my network acting up, but I noticed this only happens on WhatsApp Business, not the regular WhatsApp. I really hope this can be fixed quickly

Subject: Feedback on Recent Update The recent update is not very effective. Previously, whenever we searched for something in a group or chat, the searched word was highlighted in yellow, which made identification much easier. Now, the highlight feature is no longer available, and it has become inconvenient to locate the searched text.

I HAVE BEEN FACING AN ISSUE REPEATEDLY! sometimes I sent 'view once' message to some people. normally when I check message information it says they delivered time and opened time once. from yesterday when I check details about this kind of messages, it shows two times like delivered time & opened time. the only issue is it shows the same thing twice! is it something changed from your side without any updates or it's a bug at my end or is there any security concerns with my WhatsApp?

For the past month, I‚Äôve been facing an issue with WhatsApp Business. Whenever I search for a chat, the app crashes and all messages revert to the previous backup date. If I restore, chats go back to old messages; if not, everything disappears. I‚Äôve reported this issue many times, reinstalled the app, and deleted local data, but nothing helps. Please fix this Whatsapp

I‚Äôve noticed that WhatsApp Business has replaced the ‚ÄúNext Line‚Äù (Enter) button with a ‚ÄúSend‚Äù button. This change is not user-friendly, especially for students and professionals who need to write long or formatted messages. It makes writing assignments, notes, and clear communication more difficult. Please consider bringing back the Next Line option or allowing users to choose between Send and Enter. Thank you!

I've tried all the troubleshooting steps but their AI chat boot just kept on sending the same trouble shooting steps. Total pathetic experience.

They have nothing better to do there?

One will come online and will have to wait for almost 30 minutes before typing a message even when the app finishes updating its messages

you receive more than 200 photos and you have to manually save them one by one for them to appear in the galleryüôåüèøüôåüèøüôåüèø worst decision ever. Apps is great as always, but sometimes you tamper with good features then make it worse... Example the "label" feature, before lable could indicate the recent engageed contact in order, making it easy to track last engagement on lables, but with the new "list" feature you replace with, it's down the drain, no recent engageed with the list.... When I upload a status, it takes a very long time to upload completely. Also, only the people I‚Äôm currently chatting with can see my status at the top of their list. I started experiencing it recently and a few people I know are experiencing it too. There is no new update, meaning my app is up to date. I‚Äôm very disappointed with WhatsApp Business. My number suddenly showed ‚Äútemporarily unavailable,‚Äù and I lost important client messages. it works better but I have a suggestion why not can't you get it updated and introduce new features of last seen and when online for only selected contact's and hide some of our contacts our status cz some times now if you turn off the read receipt you don't check who viewed your status but it would be better if it is as I explained at first time. thanks and also keep going

title: Kinnu: Superpower learning
description:
We built Kinnu to give everyone the power to learn anything they want to, whatever their goals.

With Kinnu you can:
üåüFollow your curiosity
üôã‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èBecome the most interesting person in the room
üß†Never forget what you‚Äôve learned with our Memory Shield technology 
ü§¶Find a cure to doomscrolling on social media

Our microlearning app harnesses cognitive science to help you build lasting knowledge across many domains. It‚Äôs the product of several years of research from experts in the science of learning.

Popular courses:
üß† Psychology: Mental Health, Positive Psychology, Superpower Learning, Cognitive Biases
üèÜ Lifeskills: Personal Finance, Persuasion, Communications

What our users say about us:

summary: A fun way to learn a broad array of fascinating topics at just the right depth.

scraped_reviews.content: Best learning app ever! Exactly what I was looking for. Everything is entirely free, and you have just about everything to learn from. From math, science, technology, history, or just certain methodologies, Kinnu has it all. In addition, it's interactive and makes you want to pay more attention to what you're reading instead of skimming and getting nothing. I hope to use this app for life and someday make it through most if not all of the sections!

The customized notifications option doesn't work at all. And when I do open the app, only then does the notification appear, which renders the concept pointless. I enjoy taking the courses and getting tested for the knowledge acquired, although I think these prices for the certifications are a bit steep, considering that I'd have to buy the certificate for each completed subject. Besides those two issues, this is a great app for anyone who want to sharpen their knowledge of a chosen field.

This app is so good, I tried to find the catch. Ok it's probably really expensive. Maybe you can only do a couple pathways at once? Riddled with ads? None of that! It's incredible, it's like the goal of the app/developers is actually to help you. There are a plethora of interesting pathways to take, from science fiction to the art of cooking. I'm just not sure how it's not a perfect 5/5 already! Thanks to the developers for being amazing people!

amazing app, with factual information! I was initially skeptical about the credibility of this app so I picked the computer knowledge course since That's an area I excel in and it does a great breakdown of the simplest aspects of what a computer is and the history behind it. I would like to suggest a course on the different trades (electrical, plumbing, carpentry, etc.) as of this comment I have 30 minutes of learning on this app and it has been very enjoyable. Thank you for creating this!

scraped_reviews.userName: non de ur bus kizz off
scraped_reviews.content: absolutely fabulous! This software App is the best App I think I have ever had for learning techniques of every type of learning. They have something for everyone. They do much to help you remember the material and make it stick. I joined Security Training in the world of computers and networking. A field I have been interested in for so long. I felt doomed because on my own I couldn't get enough information in me fast enough and I had nobody to go to for support. I have been wrestling since ye

This app is great. The topics are diverse. It has features that help you retain information. It is free as of now. The lessons are great and are actual academic subjects. It doesn't focus on self-help stuff. I hope it eventually adds more topics and goes in depth on more topics. I would like an International Realations theory course, more in-depth courses on possible solutions to the fermi paradox, and more East Asian literature. Thanks for the great app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you Kevin for your kind review! If you have any more new content ideas, please share them in our Discord: https://discord.gg/QehDfYRszt.

scraped_reviews.content: I thoroughly enjoy it. I'm always in pursuit of further knowledge and trying to optimize how I spend my time. For those moments when I don't have time to become absorbed in a task or topic, I can open Kinnu and spend a few minutes learning new things in tiny chunks at a time. It makes learning not "feel" like learning, in the sense of I don't feel like I need to activate my brain and I can just stay relaxed. It also asks follow-up questions so you are actually learning and not just reading.

Love this app, all the article are interesting, and nothing wrong with learning a little something every day, I like how you get a couple of questions on what you just read, first off, we are never to old to learn, and secondly, you always have something new to share, reading also helps your brain's light bulb, so on that note, I highly recommend the app!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Nini! We are so glad you are enjoying the app! We also find that things you learn on Kinnu come up surprisingly often in conversations. If you'd like to talk to others who use the app, and us - the developers - join our Discord server: https://discord.gg/SUxwJRdJM2.

scraped_reviews.content: Great idea, but really poor organization and riddled with errors. AI doesn't seem to do well identifying good sources and instead just picks randomly. Concepts are much more important than random vocabulary and names, but the algorithm ignores that. It's ok for something you may not know a lot about (e.g. Norse mythology), but only in the most brief of overviews. Might be better in the future, after several updates to the algorithm, but it probably won't be free then.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Chris, curious which pathways you looked at. At this point all of our most popular pathways are Editor's choice and have been heavily rewritten by experts + writers. You can reach us at support@kinnu.xyz. Thank you for your review!

scraped_reviews.content: I think it would be really cool if an account could create their very own course. Personally, I'd really like to create a Minecraft Redstone course. But as is with people, they won't always create anything good with this. So maybe the devs could pick out the high quality courses to put in their official map. Like a Redstone course ;) Response edit: I don't think I'm allowed to do either of those things. Also, Tickbeat*
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Tichbeat, perfect, we'd love for you to create a learning pathway. Can you email us at social@kinnu.xyz or join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/SUxwJRdJM2.

scraped_reviews.content: Let's face it. There are plenty of apps out there that claim they will help you learn, whether quotes or daily reminders, etc. As someone who is addicted to learning new things, this app is genuinely the best I've come across. Different fields of study are split into logic trees basically, starting from the basics and steadily growing into the more in-depth. This model also utilizes both gamification to make it fun and well-researched tactics for optimal memory retention, such as reviews

So far this app is amazing, fun and I really enjoy it and have nothing negative to say about it, there are no ads that I've seen and no subscription that costs money, it's just really cool and there are so many different sections to chose what you feel like learning about at that time. You can change what topic you want to learn about anytime you wish and it's just all around fun and quick little bits of great knowledge, so far so good!!! I'm happy with this app!! I recommend it to everyone!

This isn't a game per se, but the "gameplay" loop for learning here is great. It's perfect for making brief down time more productive. The only feature I'd like to see is customization for the type of comprehension questions you receive (e.g. multiple choice, fill in the blank, etc.). Please check this out if you are busy and want to add a little bit of learning to your life!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you so much for your review! We are thinking a lot recently about questions design so stay tuned. In the meanwhile, if you have any comments about how we can make the app even better for you please join our Discord: https://discord.gg/fberZ5Wz.

scraped_reviews.content: It's not as visual as I'd like but the ones that are, are expensive and this one is 100% free knowledge, I like the bite size chunks and the daily refreshers so you don't forget right away, I also love how many categories there is, if you loose interest you can just move to something else. I genuinely feel like I've retained more knowledge from this app then I ever did in school.

I love this app so much. It is so easy to use and has a great set up. I love the variety of courses or units there are, only, I wish they had a robotics engineering unit. I encourage my friends and family to get the app because it is so great. Some of the things I have learned and was secsesful in remembering I was able to use in small talk with my friends and family. Some of the things I used to help me in class. Thank you Kinnu, you are one of the best apps one can get!

Fantastic app to say the least. Very easy to use. Beautiful user interface and extremely knowledgeable database. Has audio narrations. Doesn't require app purchases nor does it have ads. You can't go wrong with this app. However, I have just one minuscule complaint. In regards to the audio narrations... I would prefer it if they had the option to choose between female and male audio. My attention is drawn more to a female speaking then a male. Still, the app is highly recommended.

No ads and doesn't pester for any sort of subscription! The layout is innovative yet simplistic, and the topics are vast and interesting. They have fun ways to ensure things are put to memory as well. I highly recommend this app! I haven't figured out how to go back and read the lessons I've already taken without restarting the path, but I'm sure there's a way. If not, I can say that is really the only downfall. Great job, Kinnu!

The developers of this application are correct in their statement on how the brain responds to multiple pathway teaching. It's incredible how much information you can pack into the human brain. I made sure to pick at least one category which I was unfamiliar with, but learning it was simple, with the techniques used in this app. I rarely give 5 star ratings, but I'll throw in a thumbs up for this one. Bravo to all the staff of Kinnu. I personally thank you immensely. Sincerely, JC.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi John, Thank you so much for your thoughtful note. It means a lot to all of us. We do our best to guide our design by the latest findings in cognitive psychology - if you have any ideas how to make the app or its content better, join our Discord channel: https://discord.gg/SUxwJRdJM2.

scraped_reviews.content: This is the best "bite-sized" learning app that I've used. There are so many different pathways over various topics and... they're actually interesting to learn about! There is no pay wall, invasive ads, or anything to distract your focus from learning, which is super great. I've started using Kinnu when I get the urge doom-scroll and it's been great for replacing that habit with a much healthier one.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Chayenne, thank you so much for your wonderful review. We are happy to be helping you with doom-scrolling - we spend so much time with phone in our hands might as well spend it learning. Here is our Discord community, which we would love for you to join: https://discord.gg/SUxwJRdJM2.

scraped_reviews.content: It's a really fun take on learning for pleasure, with a wide array of subjects. It's also extremely accessible; all lessons have an audio description option, no penalties for incorrect answers, and gentle reinforcement of information. If you're the type to browse Wikipedia for fun, read through STEM magazines, or just have a broad range of interests, this is the app for you.

It's pretty good. Very unique, however the audio reader seems to skip stuff sometimes. For example in "introduction to ai" 3rd page, it skips "Students can take a picture of a textbook page they don‚Äôt understand, and have it explained to them simply" also, I wish you could use the audio reader again when reading a second time. Lastly, if you do go subscription only based, it'd be cool if we could just watch 200 ads and get a week free or something, if not it's fine.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jojo, thank you so much for your review. We actually do not have a subscription plan, or ads, so no worries. Help us solve your audio issue by emailing it to support@kinnu.xyz.

scraped_reviews.content: This is a great app! It covers a huge array of topics. It breaks them down into manageable lessons. They are small enough to do a lesson within 5 - 10 mins. yet still contain enough information to learn new things. Each lesson is followed by a quick review of all of the topics you have covered so it keeps what you have learned fresh in your mind. The repetition helps when it comes to remembering and recalling what you learned. I recommend this app for any one at any age. GREAT JOB Kinnu!!!

This app is outstanding! I am learning so many things in a short amount of time. This is a great idea. I wish you folks had more apps like this. A person could learn Math in a more efficient manner. No pressure and no stress. I hope you folks come up with more apps like this. The best thing is the app is totally free and no annoying ads. You are doing a great service in helping others learn more effectively. If I could give 6 stars or more I would!!! :)

This is the perfect app if you love learning without the pressure of being graded on like your life depends on it or paying up to your eyeballs just to have an education. There's quizzes but they're very brief, not overly complicated, and they let you start over without making a big stink about it-like a game! I just want MORE lessons to learn! üòÑ

The Best! Organized into small bits, makes it easy to want to learn more. It's like getting a free sample @ See's candy when you buy 1 piece of candy, except you don't have to buy anything @ Kinnu. Makes learning easy & fun! Update: Still the best! Hardest thing is getting daily done on time. IDK how to use " freeze" yet on game streaks.

Kinnu is an excellent platform for learning in a highly efficient and organized manner; its lessons are broken down into bite-sized chunks that are easy to learn and apply. On top of this, the tests are exceptional, training you to remember information gained long-term. I only wish they asked more questions. Overall, an excellent app that I am proud to continue using.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Keith, thank you for your review! We are looking into giving users an option to add their own questions. If you have any other ideas about how the app can help you learn even more effectively, tell us on Discord: https://discord.gg/QehDfYRszt.

scraped_reviews.content: I've only just started using it so take this with a grain of salt, but this is exactly the kind of learning app I needed. The layout, the options, the progress, the occasional question during sections to see if you remember certain bits and pieces, its just all very suitable to my learning needs, especially as an autistic person who struggles with verbal teachings and do much better on my own reading and being tested

I can't express enough just how amazing this app is. Every small detail is perfect. From voting on how to make the app better, to small quizzes to make sure you retain information, the developers listening and updating constantly, and just the amount of things you can learn is all great! As a college student this is great as I explore what I might want to learn more about before picking classes. Also no ads! Highly recommend!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you! We are so glad we are helping you explore the beautiful world of knowledge without committing. If there are any topics you would like us to add, to help you with your courses for example, or help explore new interests, tell us on Discord: https://discord.gg/QehDfYRszt - we actually talk to our community there, not just listen.

scraped_reviews.content: Good app. I do feel though that the text feels like being pulled straight from Wikipedia and the random stock photos are somewhat useless. I find the UX somewhat confusing and always end up searching for things. Biggest issue I have is that I can't mark interesting tidbits. Not even an entire page. There doesn't seem to be any note taking option. I like how Google Primer did it: Simple, bite-sized and easy to look up marked quotes.

Ah-ma-zing! This is by far my favorite app! I've tried a lot of learning type apps over the years and none as comprehensive or exciting as this one. It genuinely makes you excited to learn, and I've actually been disappointed that I couldn't learn more than one thing at a time. I have and will continue to share this app with anyone that loves to learn! ! Edit: To clarify, you can totally learn from several pathways simultaneously, I meant that I can't decide which to do first!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Whittney, you should be able to learn as many pathways as you'd like - it's amazing to mix and match. If you have any ideas about how to make the app and its content even better, let us know on Discord: https://discord.gg/QehDfYRszt.

scraped_reviews.content: Super neat app. It literally gamifies learning, making it fun and interesting to learn subjects that I wouldn't otherwise give any attention. You pick the content (hundreds of topics), read a 1-2 page excerpt, then answer trivia-style questions and it keeps score for you. Very fun way to learn. All free and free of ads!

Amazing app honestly. It's free, and there are no ads at all! It's a really well made app, with appropriately sized bits of information, you can do short sessions, or more if you want. I also like that if you get something wrong, it doesn't punish you. And there are some questions where it reveals the answer, and you can tap if you remembered or not. For ones that I knew slightly, I tap not remember so they come up again, and it has helped me to learn them better. I seriously love this app!!

One of the best apps for learning, the topics are interesting, and the lessons will remind the things you might've forgotten. Yes it might be limited in some aspects (you can actually just finish all of the content and you might not have more topics to learn), but overall I love that it doesn't pressure you into learning and makes the experience pleasant.

Literally my favorite learning app! I love the way the pathways are laid out into clear sections, how short yet informative and engaging the lessons are, and how the ai voice reads to me! I like the review questions to keep me in line and I like how rewarding my progress feels! Makes my adhd brain happy It's my favorite part of my nightly routine. Literally the best learning app I've ever used! You folks did a great job!

It is both entertaining and educational. They let you vote on changes and improvements. You can do short bouts of learning or binge it. It makes sure you remember what you learned through short tests. You can take up less space by only downloading the knowledge packets you want. Also, it has very diverse learning from first aid and data analysis to music and fantasy. TLDR it is a very functional app that helps my hyperactive mind learn in a fun and engaging way.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Courtney, thank you so much for your amazing review! Join our Discord community if you want to share more detailed ideas about how we might make the app even better: https://discord.gg/SUxwJRdJM2.

scraped_reviews.content: It has been a personal joy to be a life-long "learner". I'm old-school, I learned everything out of books at the library that I found by utilizing the card catalog... Today, however, all that is unnecessary. Learning new things and furthering your education is much more hassle free. This app for example. Wow! You decide what interests you and with alacrity the information is delivered and presented in an understandable way.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Michael,
Thank you so much for your comment! We are very glad you are enjoying the app.
If you have any comments about how we can make the app even better for you please join our Discord: https://discord.gg/fberZ5Wz.

scraped_reviews.content: I've tried a lot of learning apps, and this is probably my favorite so far. It definitely has room for improvement but it really seems like they are genuinely moving constantly in a positive direction. I love that they have a whole discord community, and the app really is more fun than scrolling reddit to just pick a bunch of learning pathways and then do a "smart session" that randomly picks a few to learn and practice for a short session.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Maegan and thank you for your wonderful review. You found our Discord already - amazing! If you're not yet part of the incubator crew it might be something you enjoy - you get early access to all of our "in the works" pathways. Never hesitate to let us know what we can do better - we listen!

scraped_reviews.content: It's really great to have something so nice for free! I have been using it for a week and learned a lot that interested me! One bummer though: because I was busy, I didn't use the app for like a week, and now I wanted to check out the next chapters, but it won't let me. I have to repeat aaaaall chapters I had done some time ago until I get eeeeeverything right, only then it seems am I allowed to open anything new in the topic :( Maybe add a "not now" option?

I freakin love this app. If you wanna learn more about various subjects in an effective manner, this is the app. There is a broad and expanding selection of subjects, or 'pathways'; the development team is excellent and the users are heavily involved in the development of the app; and, as far as my experience goes, the knowledge it has to share so far has remained unbiased and factual. It's a great app for those looking to just learn a little about sundry things, but don't know where to start!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. We are excited to continue building out our pathway library and connect the dots between different topics. Join us on Discord if you haven't already: https://discord.gg/SUxwJRdJM2.

scraped_reviews.content: Truly awesome. It is so nice to have a little learning session on interesting or practical topics, and combine pathways. Adding nutrition, habit-making, and exercise pathways makes a nice intro to healthy living. Much better than browsing social media or playing a game. The little quiz questions help learning and make it more interactive. I love this app so far.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you so much for your wonderful review! If you have any ideas about how we might make the app or its content even better, do not hesitate to let us know on Discord: https://discord.gg/QehDfYRszt.

scraped_reviews.content: I can't sing the praises of this app enough. I had a stroke a year ago and this app has helped so much with brain exercises and helping my memory. On top of just loving to learn new thing. I recommend it to anyone and everyone that has any kind of interest in just about anything. The only thing I'd want to be added is maybe more puzzles to help with learning and remembering

Kinnu is awesome, I'm a father of 6 kiddos. Ranging from 10 to 25 and I've gotten everyone in my family and one gentleman that expressed, he felt like a "mental burnout", to install this app. All have given me positive feedback as well. Keep up the good work team. Developers seem eager for feedback so don't be afraid to communicate with them.

Kinnu is a great way for people, who enjoy expanding their basic knowledge and learning new things, to do exactly that. The bits and bites of information, combined with the simple quizzes offered by this app is a nice way to learn for all ages. If one can comprehend what they've read at an average high school level, they can certainly learn with Kinnu. An additional plus is that there are not any commercials muddy-ing things up. :-)

Idk how I came across this app, but I'm glad I did. The dev is super user friendly & holds votes re what we'd like to learn next. I'm not sure how to explain the app, but it's paths of knowledge about random subjects. The subjects offered are quite interesting & more are constantly being added. Will you become a master in the subject? No lol. You can decide to delve more into it on your own. It's a bit more than basic info, but it's very well done. If you love learning new things, download it!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello and thank you for your review! So glad to hear you're enjoying it. We are continuing to expand our content library and adding different ways to learn in addition to short questions, so I hope that one day you might even become a master in the topic. Join us on Discord if you'll ever like to bounce ideas: https://discord.gg/NKHvVjyA.

scraped_reviews.content: This app is quite literally one of the most fascinating (and so far completely free with no ads) things I've ever come across. Not even kidding. (I probably would go for Premium if/when that comes about.) I truly enjoy the 8 to 10 minutes per day I spend in this thing. It does work my brain--about nearly every subject under the sun!--using tiny tidbits of information with little quiz questions sprinkled throughout. It's quite fun AND educational. Big, big "tHaNk yOu", 'intelligent octopi'!!

a fun, better use of time. I'm thoroughly enjoying every day of my current streak. At the moment, contemporary art and ikigai are my favorite subjects. I do hope there are more subjects added, but I have a feeling there will be. I have made a decision to stop doom scrolling and stop participating in mind numbing rage-inducing social media, so this app and duolingo have been my go-to apps when I'm bored and need to stare at my phone for comfort.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much! Your review means a lot to us. Join us on Discord if you have ideas about new topics or extra product features: https://discord.gg/QehDfYRszt.

scraped_reviews.content: The ui and reading material are high quality. I like the concept of revisiting the information to remember it, but answering the same exact few quiz questions repeatedly is more like training to memorize specific trivia factoids than remember and understand concepts. Decided after a couple weeks that it's not for me.

I love everything about this app! It's very easy to use, the interface is creative and unique, the topics are interesting, and most importantly, it encourages mental permanence by constantly quizzing on previous information from your current subject! I can't, for the life of me, figure out how to share progress in order to get friends to join, but I've been sharing directly from the playstore. This app is, quite literally, GENIUS!

There are so many interesting subjects to learn by interleaving, daily online competition, and certification as proof of knowledge, all based on the Science of Learning and expanding retrieval. And it keeps track of everything! I absolutely love it. My only suggestion would be to add Canadian, and Asian Social Sciences/Politics, as well as the US Politics.

The redesigned version looks awesome! I wish more content was added though. I also wish the review questions would vary and be more open, or at least there was a choice between open and choice questions. I don't think only Shakespeare and Romeo and Juliet deserve their own section in literature. Music can go beyond theory, how about going through greatest songs of all time? Photography is another nice topic to explore. Keep on giving!

title: SoundCloud: The Music You Love
description:
Your taste, your scene, your people, your soundtrack ‚Äîit‚Äôs all on SoundCloud.

 Music discovery is where great taste creates greater moments of connection, online and IRL. That feeling of crate digging with your crush at your local record store? Sourcing rare releases in Japan? That energy lives on SoundCloud‚ÄîTap in.

Browse Suggested Follows, send DMs, and share your favorite tracks with Messaging Bubbles (for iOS).


Share your playlists and create IRL moments with Cast to Devices.


Send Quick Reactions and drop Comments to share the love with your favorite artists.


Get recognized for your great taste and earn a spot on your favorite artist‚Äôs First & Top Fans list.


Explore the Discover Feed and uncover what‚Äôs trending with Hot For You and trending track lists.

See what your friends are loving with Liked By indicators and playlists. 

On SoundCloud, you‚Äôre not just streaming‚Äîyou‚Äôre part of a scene. Where will your taste take you?
descriptionHTML:
Your taste, your scene, your people, your soundtrack ‚Äîit‚Äôs all on SoundCloud.

Music discovery is where great taste creates greater moments of connection, online and IRL. That feeling of crate digging with your crush at your local record store? Sourcing rare releases in Japan? That energy lives on SoundCloud‚ÄîTap in.

Browse Suggested Follows, send DMs, and share your favorite tracks with Messaging Bubbles (for iOS).


Share your playlists and create IRL moments with Cast to Devices.


Send Quick Reactions and drop Comments to share the love with your favorite artists.


Get recognized for your great taste and earn a spot on your favorite artist‚Äôs First & Top Fans list.


Explore the Discover Feed and uncover what‚Äôs trending with Hot For You and trending track lists.

See what your friends are loving with Liked By indicators and playlists.

On SoundCloud, you‚Äôre not just streaming‚Äîyou‚Äôre part of a scene. Where will your taste take you?
summary: Where mixtapes meet DJ sets & fresh sounds. Discover songs & tracks you love!

scraped_reviews.content: I love how there are sped up/ slowed down versions of songs. I've used SoundCloud for only a year now, but I much recommend this over Spotify. It sucks how it's not on Xbox, though! Its also a bit annoying when you have to pay for the premium subscription for certain songs. But otherwise, it's a perfect music streaming app! 110% recommend edit: having lyrics would be super cool! the one thing Spotify has that this doesn't üòì otherwise still doing me well!

Unable to cancel subscription. SoundCloud says go to the app store and I find no subscription there. Seems like they're trying robbing people of their money, or make it very difficult to cancel. Once again, I can't find the subscription and it feels like it's intentional. Would not recommend getting a subscription, unless you want to get a new card to stop paying thieves, which I have to do now. Decent app, YT is better. Big L from soundcloud.

I really like this app, even with the ads, as i find them quite reasonable. However. The app's been lagging my phone more recently, songs have been randomly failing to load, and worst of all, it will randomly start to spam-skip Every Song in my list at some unpredictable point while i play it. I genuinely don't understand how this happens? I'd appreciate if it was fixed soon. This has been happening for several months.

it's still a great app with content. my biggest problem is the downloads. I couldn't figure out why in a train tunnel it would buffer my downloaded music. It's cause it prioritizes the internet connection when it's on. which means I must manually take off my data for it to work as intended. that's extremely tedious. My biggest gripe. other then that, great music app.

It's not Spotify and that's all I needed. And I can see why it took ice ads on Spotify to get me to switch. It's really not good at deciding which next random thing to play. in fact, continue playing from any playlist is basically a recipe for disaster as the new music I'm presented with is never anything I actually like. But hey you're not running ice ads. so there is that ü§∑üèΩ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

Soundcloud is a pretty invasive app. it also completely drains battery. Unless you subscribe with the monthly "plus" benefits, youre unable to listen to music while lockscreen is active. Also, music will not play if you aren't in the app itself. The ability to override these settings are apps permissions within the phone settings. However, upon further digging, its apparent Soundcloud's accessing background information and logging user activity regardless if they are listening to music

This app is unfortunately completely unusable for me now. After a forced logout I tried to log back in and it won't let me login, only create a new account, then it tells me "email already in use" but won't let me log in with said email?? Uninstalled months ago, installed again today with hopes of getting back in and no luck, exact same issue I've seen MULTIPLE people complain about, and SoundCloud does nothing. A real bummer to lose the tracks you can only find there.

Great app, I love it a lot! it's full of nishe genres and communities, but, a few flaws on the apps side, the song bar disappears from time to time, the adds sometimes don't load and pause the entire listening experience for a straight minute of nothing, where you have to manually reactive it. lastly, usually the second, or third song in the related to this track section is another ad, just for a musician that doesn't have anything to do with what you're listening to, hard rock to classical.

The go subscription is good, you won't get absolutely every song but a decent amount, the app is less buggy than a year or two ago. However, the go subscription price just increased and is now 30% more than what it used to be which is hard to justify. It was totally worth it without question over other apps but now you can pay barely anything more (20%) on other apps and get a bigger library.

something is wrong with the app over the last 3 months where it drains your phone battery to nothing in a matter of hours by running background processes. This makes your app almost completely unusable without a charger nearby. Please fix this. My phone went from 100% to 22% in 4 hours today and I only spent 45 minutes listening to SoundCloud and the phone was not in use after that.

this is a very good music service pretty cheap and after purchasing it the most important thing -- never an ad. I found 99% of everything I've looked for and I listen to a lot of different types of rock metal country. I also listen to full albums rather than just ingest what's automatically served so I could see a problem for a user who doesn't know what they want to listen to because occasionally when I do let it choose it chooses music terribly. it's easy to use too. .

Better than most streaming music options I've used. Great sound quality and connectivity. It actually shows new and varied music based on your likes and previously listened, how other apps used to work. Found a lot of great artists via this app. A bit too many ads on the free version, feel like there were less ads last year. I guess they need the ad revenue.

like it but has dumbest subscription ever. you pay for GO and still can't access a bunch of songs without paying for GO+. GO is supposed to let you listen to stuff offline too but the app will still lag/not load at times w/o internet :P it basically wants you to pay twice as much just to access a few more songs. the update also messed up the order of my song likes.

it's a good app for music, but oh LORD the issues, they really need to fix the thing where if you change from WiFi to Data, the app just breaks and claims there's no connection, making you have to restart your phone to get it working again, it's irritating. Soundcloud go isn't worth it to listen to more music, songs shouldn't be locked behind a subscription service, they're available on YouTube with ads, why aren't they available on soundcloud?

There's a battery problem on how Soundcould "streams" songs. The settings/systems states how Soundcloud uses a ton of wifi to stream music. Soundcloud uses this opportunity to absolutely abuse how much wifi is allowed to stream songs. For example, the less battery used for songs means it takes more time for songs to load. The more battery, the more songs loaded. In other words, Soundcloud uses an unnecessary amount of battery to load songs 3-4 before it's even played and keeps it streaming.

. Although I found out that the amount of detail in the screen save on paused artist tracks determines how much noise leak, sub-audio, goes down. I couldn't care. I don't have 2000 dollars to waste on everysong I like and will ever like, I like all of them. ü§üü´†ü§ü ;Re I've been finding odd tones clipped to my Playlists allot and it doesn't seem right. i dont know what it is but I dont like to hear them.

I updated it and now it only shows small portions of my liked songs. Also way too much censorship all of a sudden.?? It keeps crashing and everytime I reopen it to change songs or anything it gives me an ad. Ad times also increased. I'd be fine with 2 ads instead of a full 60-61 second one. Also extremely unresponsive all of a sudden?? plays what it wants when it wants üíî

I've been using SoundCloud for 5 years and I had a student account previously, now I'm on ad free (and I love that country is free), but lately I've been having this problem where the streaming slows down and the music slows. I thought it was my WiFi and then my speakers and then my phone but it ONLY happens with this app. I play music on other apps just fine. Editing to say that after 3 months of waiting, the problem still hasn't been fixed so I cancelled my subscription.

SoundCloud is fine, great selection, I've been a member since 2012 or 2013. Can't get into my account though. Any modern issue you have with SoundCloud will end poorly. There is no support system. You get a dumb, friendly, unhelpful ai chat bot! He's there for you, not to help you, but to type random things to you. So as long as you actually never need support for any reason, you're good! SoundCloud is great...

Really buggy, some songs just won't play - others skip parts. Otherwise a good song app. Temporarily uninstalling. edit: same issue from 2017 all these years later. I use this app to listen to my favorite story teller, and to have more control of my music without paying for Pandora premium, it used to work anywhere, but months ago - almost a year ago - it stopped buffering properly and started blocking songs in the USA, and others became premium songs.

I've been using this app since 2021, and it was great before. It was free with infinite skips. and most stuff was open to the free, but now this app has so much ADS. i get as an app grows further, and further, they might need to do this, but there are so many ads I have actually been considering just switching over to a Spotify subscription. still a GREAT app if you like listening to music, and I still use it, but if you hate ads, this app would be a nightmare.

The app used to be really quite good. But as of late it has gotten way to many ads, I mean so many that it really ruins the listening experience which sucks. The ads are far more frequent and they are getting longer. Honestly if you want an imersive or even just more uninterrupted experience then I would say to go else where.

I originally got soundcloud because Spotify gave too many ads, but now it's soundcloud giving to many ads. when I first joined, there were little to no ads, but now I can't go 2 songs without hearing an ad. At least on Spotify, there are workarounds for ads. On Soundcloud, you just have to sit and watch it. Another thing, you can't even exit the app whenever an ad plays. It just paused the ad until you got back on it. You can't even browse other music while an ad plays. Fix your ads, Soundcloud.

Spotify but worse Ive been using this app for around a year now and nothing has changed. Soundcloud has no difference between Spotify, and infact, its worse. It gives way to many ads and there are so many low quality songs on the app. Less apps also support Soundcloud, comparing to Spotify which basically every app supports. On top of that, if i download spotify right now i get a 3-month free trail. I know Soundcloud offers free trials too but its not as impressive. Good luck Soundcloud!

One ad for every song. That's what you will expect if they don't get you to extort money out of your account monthly. buyer beware buyer beware buyer beware All of these applications that allow you to listen to music have way too many commercials. I'm good with a good antenna and my local radio that is non-profit. Thank you! I'd rather put my money elsewhere or I'm going to see something back in return.

This is the best streaming service I have used. You can play music in the background, choose songs rather than albums, loop, and way more. I haven't gotten any ads which is a plus side. The only thing I don't really like is importing playlists from other streaming services - it chooses songs with similar names but sometimes doesn't actually choose the song that's in the playlist. Otherwise, 100% recommend.

I'd love if there as a scroll bar so I could easily and quickly go up and down my playlists. And maybe A-Z to make it easier to find playlist by the first letter. >>>> It'd be nice to be able to choose which artist's profile to look at, if there's more than one artist. >>>> If I save my sort by preference I want it to stay that way, not changing back when I go to add a song to a playlist, it reverts to recently added when I prefer sorting by title.

it's gotten a lot worse, I used to like it because you can turn your phone off without paying for a subscription to keep the music playing. but they keep updating it and now it's even more bugged then before and on top of that, there's twice as many ads and now you can't skip any of them. it's not worth it anymore. Also, when you're playing from a playlist or your liked tracks and you click on a song, it'll play the wrong song because the next up doesn't refresh.

I have been using this app for a while for free at first, but then I decided to upgrade. Everything was fine at first, but now it restarts songs for no reason, the app shuts down for no reason, and the biggest issue of all is the long pauses or buffering during play. I'm paying yall $14.03 a month, and to constantly have to deal with these issues is diabolical frfr. Until you fix it, I will no longer pay for your services, and if it doesn't get fixed, then I will find another app

I love this app I really do it's the one I use to be able to listen to music on my phone since Spotify is a bit iffy if you don't have premium. Recently I got a new pair of headphones and they work perfectly with all of my devices, including my phone, but then when I start using SoundCloud the sound glitches. Another issue I have is that some songs that I was able to listen to before just don't play anymore when I try to play them.

The app overall is great, it says it requires the mobile app, but it doesn't. SoundCloud made this app perfect but SoundCloud itself is bad. You need a subscription (I think it's called Go+) to listen to music you can listen to for free elsewhere (Spotify or YouTube Music). I don't care about the price of SoundCloud, as I'm not paying no matter what, but it seems like such a great app that's stifled by SoundCloud's Go+ subscription. Overall, Perfect app, bad service. If you pay for or use SoundCloud, i highly recommend but if you were wondering if it's better than Spotify, keep with Spotify. If you truly read this full rant, thank you. üòÅ

This is the best music streaming app I've used so far, in my opinion. Even if there's not much mainstream music without money involved, the "underground" bands and music (for lack of better words) that I find on soundcloud through their algorithm has been very pleasing, and just for that, I'll give 5 stars. (Edit: 3 stars because it keeps overcharging my account to pay for Go+) also I would subscribe to Go+ but you need a ******* PC to cancel it!! Not for the monetarily unfortunate. Greedy app.

SoundCloud is a very good app for playing tons of different genres of music and many other tracks, and I'd recommend it above Spotify. The primary reason as to why I rated SoundCloud 4 stars is due to the fact how there's this phenomenon where when you go to your "Liked tracks" in the Library menu on the bottom of your screen, sometimes when I tap a specific song I want to play, it'll put on the song above or below it instead, and when I correct it by tapping my song, it'll play an ad. Annoying.

I've used SoundCloud for years, its easily my favorite music streaming platform to use for free. You can pick whatever song in whatever order, you're not forced to play in shuffle or preview songs. There's a lot more freedom in how you listen, the only thing being some pop songs being exclusive to SoundCloud GO, which i personally don't mind too much.

this app sucks. I was trying to find a way to change my password, but no way to even see any account information at all including a sign out option to request a password reset on the app or web. When I go to the help on the web and hit the link to go to account setting I get this error message "Our systems have detected unusual traffic from your computer network. Please try your request again later. Why did this happen?". No idea why that's happening. I'll just uninstall it, delete profile

I really enjoy this app, like, a lot. You got playlists, likes, reposts. & it's one of those apps where I don't even mind the ads, though without them, it'd be a smoother listening experience. So, it's definitely worth the subscription. Though, I will add one thing I don't like. As a brand new artist, I really do not like the automated copyright detection system. I'm currently undergoing a copyright claims review for a song that had nothing to do with my sounds. Overall, strong 4 stars.

It's nice, and has been my main source of music since 2015. Plenty of independent artists to discover (Shout-out to submarine boy) and you can tell they enjoy what they do. That being said, SC WON'T stop changing the UI for no reason. The app keeps breaking too, closing and not letting me order my queue. We ought to have some customization since they wanna make changes. While you're at it since this is a unique platform, some basic themes would be cool. Artists may need more $ from here tho.

I've been using this app since 2020 and it hasn't been until recently I've had enough. Ads have gotten worse. One bug that I've been putting up with is the 2/2 ad that won't play. I'll play a song with the phone off and after the song is done an ad will not play no matter how much you wait. You HAVE to reenter the app, close it, open it again, then play the ad. My favorite 'bug' is sometimes when you tap a song you always seem to tap the one above it. It is not your fault. This is intentional!

Ok, I had my account for 3 months, and then they decided to remove everything for no reason with no warning. It was an amazingly disappointing experience, especially as a beginner music maker. I've found out the hard way that they're just incompetent. They're phone number and help center are useless. I did it, so you don't have to. Stay away from SoundCloud! It's a waste of time! It's like they try to make it hard on us. Switching to Distrokid soon.

-- I don't like signing up to too many services, but I'm training myself in the audio production process. plus regular life matters I find myself coming across different platforms. which I then need to get accustomed to as well. plus the profile management issues, which is why I don't want to sign up to too many platforms n e way, but it came with the territory.

Love this app, but like all others you have to pay for actual tracks but very glad for its variations and other suggestions. Sometimes, you have to be very specific tho. Also kinda like the fact that when you're done listening to a track it doesn't stop and gives you a related track. The only issue I really have is that ads 15-30 seconds aren't skip-able. Also for some reason, lately it's been turning off by itself when you open another app. then it jumps to a different song

I'm writing this on my Google tablet, and the app sucks, because the UI is worse for no apparent reason, comments are inaccessible, it makes no sense. just use the same UI as the mobile app, but bigger, and the app would be literally 5x better, there's no reason to change it. App is fine on mobile though, and it still functions the same on my tablet, as far as music and searching and Playlist and stuff go

I have been using SoundCloud since 2020 and I'll confidently say this app is better than regular Spotify. The biggest downside to this app is songs being behind a paywall, but a easy fix is searching the slow/reverb of the song. I've seen a lot of reviews on the ads and all I have to say is that the ads aren't really that bad in my opinion. A ad plays after you listen to two songs in a row. The ad would usually be 30 seconds long or less and there's a chance of another ad.

Truly disappointing audio collection. Jumping from tidal, I was willing to sacrifice on sound quality just to experience some variety and oh boy was I wrong. Music recommendation keeps playing mostly the same songs. So after few days I feel like I found nothing new. Not worth the price asked. Unsubbcribed. Back to tidal.

Just installed. The first 2 groups I searched for were "not found". And one of them was Supertramp. Not a good start. Stand-by, I'm sure I'll be back before the end of the day to delete the app. Didn't take all day. About 15 minutes. Everything it suggests are covers by unknown artists. Yeah, this apps not for me.

great and all! But no matter how many times I delete and re-download the app or free up unused data every 10-20 minutes the songs will *lag uncontrollably*. I did have the problem where if you play a song it wouldn't play but this stopped after deleting and re-downloaded the app, these things didn't start happening until after the update, Please fix your app this is very disappointing bc 100 of other apps are able to play music flawlessly.

Unlike other music apps with this one it still has a subscription, but much cheaper with a lot better features, and even if you don't want to use a subscription it gives you all of the features that you would normally need a subscription for in other apps for completely free, the only thing is I do need a subscription to listen to some of my favorite songs, üòî I like this music app and use it almost every day. üôÇ

So many small frustrations with this app: Offline is sketchy. My liked and allegedly "downloaded" songs take forever to load (if at all) and sometimes don't play when my connection is spotty. Is the data on my device or not? Constant updates moving UI around, pushing content I don't care for. No way to clear my queue on mobile?? Every update‚Äîwhich is all too often‚Äîseems worse. What are you guys doing?

This is honestly better than Spotify, and it only has ads every so often and you can skip however many you want. Plus, you have a repeat button too. I use it every night, as it has the best music quality ever. To add to that it even lets you choose your songs from the playlist, though unlike other apps that make you have premium. This music app is truly amazing, as I have expanded my music taste a lot. Love it.

my biggest issue with this app is that basically every song I play sounds like it's being played on a scratched CD really ruining the experience. I have plenty of scratched CDs I can pull out and start listening to again if I wanted that quality of sound. just disappointed especially since I choose to pay for soundcloud, and keep it updated, yet every song skips and studders through it some far worse than others.

title: Homescapes
description:
Welcome to Homescapes, a warm and cozy game from the famous Playrix Scapes‚Ñ¢ series! Make match-3 combinations and turn every corner of your home into an inviting place to relax and have fun.

Solve puzzles, restore the interior room by room, and meet new friends in every chapter of the exciting storyline. Austin the butler is ready to welcome you to a world of incredible adventures!

Game features:
‚óè Original gameplay: make match-3 combinations and decorate your house while enjoying an exciting story!
‚óè Thousands of captivating levels with explosive power-ups, useful boosters, and cool elements.
‚óè Exciting events: embark on fascinating expeditions, compete against other players in different challenges, and win awesome prizes!
‚óè Unique rooms with original designs: from Austin's bedroom to a greenhouse.
‚óè Loads of fun characters: meet Austin's friends and your neighbors!
‚óè Adorable pets that will become your faithful companions!

Play with your Facebook friends, or make new friends in the game community!

Homescapes is free to play, but some in-game items can be purchased for real money.

A Wi-Fi or internet connection is not required to play.
 *An internet connection is required to access competitions and additional features.

Do you like Homescapes? Follow us on social media!
https://www.facebook.com/homescapes
https://www.instagram.com/homescapes_mobile/

Need to report an issue or ask a question? Contact Player Support through the game by going to Settings > Help and Support. If you can't access the game, use the web chat by clicking the chat icon in the lower right corner of our website: https://playrix.helpshift.com/hc/en/14-homescapes/

Privacy Policy: https://playrix.com/privacy/index.html
Terms of Use: https://playrix.com/terms/index.html
