summary: Help Austin renovate his home and solve exciting match-3 puzzles along the way!

scraped_reviews.content: I just updated the game and it wont start anymore. It just hangs on the title screen. Also, I feel like the developers have made the game with a lot more hard and super hard levels. I have played the game for awhile now. I get that some levels are really hard. I dont mind waiting and playing a level multiple times to pass it or spend a little money every so often. But I would have to spend money daily if I wanted to progress. They also took away the 3 star levels.

*Update to initial review* This game has become pretty greedy after the last two updates. I am still playing the game, but I've noticed that your powerups are not as many and the power-ups are not working like they used to. the power-ups seem to always leave the very last piece when there's no way it should have. it's disappointing. Honestly I love this game. However, I think for harder levels you should get more stars.

took a break from it, and came back to beginner levels that almost require you to use power-ups or coins to be able to pull through. As soon as level 7 or so hit, suddenly I couldnt complete a level without using upgrades or buying more moves, and even then it wasnt guaranteed and I end up wasting time and money. the level scaling seems to have simply broke

it's ok. it's not a game I would play on its own. I got this game to earn gems for my Disney Kingdoms game. But reviewing the game by itself, decorating is pretty fun. I like that aspect. But the characters are kinda boring to me? so having quests like "greet this character, make this phone call, etc" isn't too fun, especially when it costs stars that you have to earn from beating levels.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. Thanks for the honest review! Glad you‚Äôre enjoying the decorating part. Totally get that some quests might feel repetitive. We‚Äôll share your thoughts with the team to help make things more fun!

scraped_reviews.content: Horrible, greedy, no fun, pay to play game. This game is ridiculous. You can't win the super hard levels, which are about every third game, unless you buy coins or collect them to buy more moves. If you like playing a level 50 plus times without winning then this is the game for you. Being forced to buy coins and boosters every 3 games pretty much guarantees I won't so they are actually shooting themselves in the foot.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're really sorry to hear you're not enjoying the game! We understand your frustration with the difficulty and the feeling of needing to purchase items. We're always working to balance the challenge and fun. Thanks for your honest feedback!

scraped_reviews.content: The ads for this game are, of course, 100% misrepresentation. You don't get to pick each puzzle level or choose items to help a mother, child & baby rebuild their life, etc. It's a basic matching puzzle game, with a predetermined backstory about a butler and his family & friends rehab various abandoned buildings & yards. Very occasionally, you get to choose one of three chairs, rugs, wallpaper, or whatever. If you're OK with that, go ahead and install it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thank you for sharing your feedback! Ads are designed to give a general overview of the game and its characters, while more detailed information is available in your device's app store. We've shared your message with the development team, and they'll look into it. Wishing you a wonderful day! üòä

scraped_reviews.content: I dig the game, been playing for years. Sure, there's some levels designed to make you either use power ups or spend money (or both) to beat, but once a week you earn unlimited lives and power ups for a period of time, and I've found you can usually beat those levels at these times. The only thing I find uncreative is the cat's gift. Seriously-that's the best name the developers came up with. üòÇ

Fun game and very entertaining. I am not a big fan, however, of the game's algorithm. Tailoring how pieces fall out on certain levels that puts players in a box to lose lives and/or use power ups is annoying. After losing a level multiple times, especially when on a free infinite lives gift, spending some power ups magically works in the players favor to finish the level. I understand that making everyone a winner isn't a game, but frustrations like I'm experiencing make me not want to play.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback! We‚Äôre glad you enjoy the game but understand your frustration. Balancing challenge and fun is tough, and we‚Äôre always working to improve. We appreciate your input and hope you‚Äôll keep enjoying the game.üíö

scraped_reviews.content: While I enjoy a challenging game, this one has become ridiculous. Levels have become too difficult to pass, taking too many boasters and free time. Would not recommend this game as none of the issues have been resolved despite many stating the same issues. The frustration level is to the point of wanting to give a negative rating if it was possible.

Would give it 5 stars if I hadn't lost ALL progress when I got a new phone! There should be a sync option! Instead, now I have to start over, or keep playing on my old device with the shattered screen. I even confirmed my progress was saved before transferring data from old phone to new. But nothing has worked! Very frustrating! Potentially just won't play it now. Also, lately keep not receiving energy earned, oddly when I've specifically earned 6 energy. I seem to receive other numbers okay.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thanks for your review. If you have issues with the game, please contact our support team through the in-game settings üôÇ We'll help you restore the progress. Have a nice day!

scraped_reviews.content: Had this game for years on two different accounts. Was pretty good at first as a standard play and decorate game. Everytime I open this app now, I'm bombarded with like 10 different events and a new same storyline that goes nowhere that I don't care for. Other than that the levels itself are fine. Some are pretty hard and occasionally require power ups but they aren't that hard to get. Overall, pretty solid but could go without the expeditions I doubt anyone cares for.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thanks for sticking with the game for so long and sharing your thoughtsüòä We‚Äôre glad you enjoy the core gameplay and decorating aspect. We appreciate your feedback. We‚Äôll pass it along to the team! Hope you continue having fun with the levels-happy gaming!

scraped_reviews.content: I enjoy playing the game, but for some reason, in this game and Family Island, the top .5 inch of the screen doesn't work. I don't have this issue in any other games or on my phone in general. But it makes some of the puzzles unplayable. Flipping my phone over to the other side also doesn't fix it. It's really frustrating, so I'm just going to uninstall.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thanks a lot for your review. If the problem persists, please reach out to our support team for further help with this issue. You can contact us directly from the settings of the game. Have a lovely day üôÇ

scraped_reviews.content: Lowered rating to a 1. I've noticed over time I got less of a reward when I won. Let that go. Then it started taking longer to win games. Not as much fun, but I kept going. Now I'm done. Every game I just played felt dishonest. I would have 1, maybe 2 items left to finish the game. I mixed boosters to make many copies and would still have pieces remaining when all the boosters exploded. Last game with 2 pieces left it happened again. If they do this to make money, they're not worth playing!

still fun, but they've definitely started making it so you have to use power ups or money. Less energy on the extras and less coins for victories. Also I've experienced numerous levels where the power up combos go somewhere random instead of the spot to win the level, this I've had to use coins or lose a life. Trying to make it where you have to buy coins and/or power ups. Its getting really frustrating

This game has been getting too many updates that require too much space. The power-ups don't clear nearly as much as they used to. The hard and very hard rounds seem to have gotten almost impossible to beat without using coins or spending money. The 900 coins to get more moves or lives is also way too high compared to other games. I just really don't enjoy it like I used to. The remodeling looks so cluttered when you complete a space, too.

This game used to be 5 stars, but I have noticed some of the challenge games are difficult to finish because the algorithm is set to not give you Hard or Super Hard games to complete when you need them (I've kept track). And super hard doesn't count as hard? In games with the white bars that block moves, the planes will not go to those spaces to clear them, even if that is all that remains. They will do something absolutely useless. Sucks all the fun out of the game. Will spend no more money.

The secondary game takes beating way too many levels to get enough energy to clear the path. Beating one level earns just 5 energy points, while a pile of several obstacles on the path will take 15, 17, even 25 points each item to clear a pile of 6 or 7 obstacles. So it's easily 75 energy points or more to clear a pile, and that means beating 15 levels to get enough energy. You can use coins to buy energy, and the game is always pushing you to spend money. Years playing, but bye!

Not terrible. Homescapes is an OK game to pass the time. The 'challenge' tends to get predictable--there are levels that are very difficult to beat. but the absolute worst part is the game maker has added...Cards. Nothing says 'fake reward' like a digital trading card. I play Homescapes less often now because of that. Instead of rewards that benefit the player (which is how it used to be) they've added digital pictures of no worth. Not even worth the time.

This game used to be fun. That was before I started spending money on lives, and extra powers. Now instead of powers, you get totally useless items like cards, and more life. The greed that they have for more and more money is sad. I will be close to completing a level with about 3 lives left with 1 obstacles to clear. This game will go out of its way to not clear the board with the hopes that I spend more money. I stopped playing one game of yours when I started noticing this.

The amount of stars needed to complete tasks is ridiculous sometimes. But the quests are unbelievable. Used to be for the Crystal hunt you would get a decent amount of energy but now isn't 50 or 60. And needing energy for the items you need to build things should be a big no. You require more energy to complete events but give less free with the Crystal Hunt. Just trying to get us to spend more money. Still like the game, but this is just gready

This game is a scam. it won't let you pass certian levels until you pay money to get 900 coins and then they give you 35 moves they send updates only to make it even harder to pass. this needs investigated. once I started paying they have only made it almost impossible to pass. I have another account and I don't pay and they haven't made the levels on the unpaid account as hard so that shows right there it's a scam.

Too hard to be fun and the decorating is now cluttered and full of things we would never see in a home. Also, the button to choose to spend coins to continue needs to be moved because it's in the same exact spot as the Retry button, and is way too easy to accidentally choose. At least give us a verification such as "Are you sure you want to spend coins to continue?" before using our coins. The only thing I play for now are the adventures. The rest is too hard to be fun.

LOVE this game. It's very entertaining. I'm very picky about most games and I usually end up uninstalling within a couple of weeks. I've had this one for months. Unfortunately, that means I've reached a higher level. Even with all of the extras they give you, some levels are impossible to pass if you don't have the perfect combination of moves. You lose the extra stuff which means you are stuck at the same level unless you spend coins to get more moves. Not fun anymore.

9/23/25 the game is having trouble loading as usual. Uninstalling then reinstalling same issues. whatever what a waste of time. As of last year, they updated the game to where you can't leave the level without losing a life. If I didn't start the game by moving any of the pieces, the game/level have not started. In turn, all of the special bombs etc., start over again.

I was prompted to update the game today (9/22/2025) when I opened it. Now I can't play it. When I open the app, it recognizes my account and does the loading screen. When it's done loading, the "Play" button would normally appear. After this update, the Play button doesn't appear, and the game is stuck on the title screen. 5 stars downgraded to 1 star since it is now unplayable.

I used to love this game...until lately. Same as other comments. Gameplay since the latest update is not what it used to be. Graphics took a step or ten back. More tasks per level with no increase in starting moves. Powerup effect decreased. Less coins won by winning levels. Now the game won't even open! I'm done spending money just to feel swindled.

I've been playing this for years now and really enjoy it, even when the levels get really challenging. I've never paid anything in the app. I will warn that most of the mini game puzzles they advertise are short term events and some I've never actually seen in the game. 99% of game play is the bejeweled type game but decorating your house is a fun addition. In the later levels, I do miss a lot of the fun challenges and side games we got at the start, they were really a highlight.

This game is horrible! Do NOT spend money on it! If you are not playing on mobile, you can NOT update the game and therefore you can NOT play after so many levels. If you reach out to support (which I have several times) they do NOT get back to you at all! I found out this is a known issue and they refuse to acknowledge or fix it. Do NOT support or waste your hard earned money on this!

Have consistent issues with the game with graphics getting frozen in place on the screen like a burned image. No matter where you move it stays where its been pinned on your screen. Restarting helps it. I have cleared my cache and restarted the game, my phone, and updated the game and still cannot play the card collecting portion. The button doesnt even show as an option for me.

So I've decided not to purchase in-game items. Basically, real money for fake money. I've done it in the past while still being successful in the game. Recently, they've changed the game to the point of minimal advancements without in-game purchases. I can't believe I've been stonewalled, so bad that I feel betrayed. I didn't have a problem purchase here and there, but the developers have gone insane for thete masters lust and greed of money. You can play a MMORPG for far less money and have fun

So your guys with the new update have apparently made it so you can't play the game! Just has the screen with the sleeping cat and no "play" button nor any other buttons for that matter. This is for Android so I'm unsure how many others are effected.... When I played it, it was probably worth a 5 star but don't get the opportunity opportunity to play much and this time I don't get to either I guess...

I really love this game and it's very addicting, however it gets considerably more difficult after level 2000 or so, and by level 2400, I'm finding myself spending way too much money on this game because they give you hard levels with only like 11-14 moves. I almost always end up paying for more moves to get past hard and very hard levels, and it's more hard and very hard than normal levels. I added up all the micro transactions over the last month and I've spent over $50 I can't keep doing that

UPDATE - UNINSTALLING My original review was about not Ioading after the update. I was going to give more stars when it finally did but almost every level since has been the kind that requires boosters and extra moves, which of course the developers want you to pay for. so, after years of playing, I quit. I've been playing for a very long time and used to love it. I regularly buy the home pass and spend other money occasionally but now the game is just the big money grab others are calling it.

UPDATE 9/23/25: NO LONGER WORKS, WILL NOT LOG IN ANYMORE Constantly makes moves I didn't do. Have to press the 'x' button 12 times for it to actually work. Repeatedly gives the same notification as if a 3 year old is playing. Always asks about facebook. Forces you to see the storyline. Doesn't allow you to use your unlimited life at a later time. Extremely annoying to have suggested moves constantly flashing. And when you want to exit the game it takes an entire 30 seconds to clear your screen.

I have been playing this game for a while. I have never completed an expedition since starting. I was told I can win these games without spending money You can't. I spend days playing at some level before I can win the level. There are times when I have to wait until I make 900 coins to add extra moves to win. You only remove 3-4 objects then you run out of energy in the expedition.

Update 9-24-25: I just did the update, and now I cannot open the game! Pretty good game, but I keep getting stuck on the super hard levels and have to make too many attempts to complete them! I cannot afford to pay to play! We should earn coins for each attempt at a level! At least that way we could eventually earn enough to buy the extra moves needed to finish those levels!

Uninstalling, sorry, I enjoyed it while it lasted. I got to a screen that was obviously designed to be impossible to win without spending money. The expanding bubbles stress me out! I usually liked the matching part better than the butler at home part. I do like the expeditions but they are tedious if you only have the 100 maximum.

The only game that has kept me playing well over a year. ..and still going over a year later. This game has my only down time. It's a bit of my happy place. Because of that though, I cant stay awake more than a few rounds now. Life just wont slow down anymore, but at least there's a glimmer of the melancholy while I play. Thanks :) Years later, they've now made it just a cash grab and it's full of deception. Regular levels are actually hidden hard levels. One star used to equal one percentage.

Great üéÆ Although it good, I'd like to make a few suggestions known to you - playrix team.1. Making coins are a bit rare. Add some opportunities.2. The cards research, can be a little tough. One has to stick to playing so as to gain that enticing reward - 10,000 coins. I'd like to suggest that we can pay money to buy cards, especially when we're near to winning it's rewards. I can't possibly talk about all, cuz I'll be out of texts. Lest I forget, Let friends be able to chat together. Kudos üëç

Ugh, so I installed this cuz I saw an ad saying this game was different & had all the cool scenario puzzles that interesting. You know, the ads where u do some kinda action puzzle to help the character feed their kid, or save them from drowning! Well, this AIN'T it! This is yet another match 3 game with a few random pin pull "puzzles" to make coins fall in a bucket. Along with the same background scenario of multiple choice items to fix up a home/ restaurant/ hotel. This game is BORING!

I've been playing this game for over a year now, and I'm begging y'all PLEASE GO BACK TO THE OLD ANIMATIONS!!! I hate these new animations, they don't match the game, are too cartoonish for the rest of the games style, and when using the bomb powerup the area they blow up looks like it should be bigger, but it's not because the animation makes it look inaccurate!! Overall the game itself is so fun, but the new animation makes my head spin!!

The developers engineer a lot of the levels to take your money. An example is the airplane AI targets a grid square instead of the puzzle piece in the square, which means if the puzzle piece you were hoping it would hit moves, sorry about your luck. It's all about human greed and making you spend your hard-earned money to progress. Don't bother with this one, it's pay-to-win.

I love this game, it has everything I wanted, no ads, restoring a home, a storyline, interesting characters, and pretty much unlimited play time. The only reason it is a 3 is because you need to keep from losing in order to keep the cat rewards. Levels are too hard without it (hard levels). Spent $200, just to get through the car episode. Can't afford to play so having to uninstall. Not fun repeating levels endlessly with 5 lives only.

Constantly kicks me out. The paperplanes hit random targets and sometimes it forces you to use the powerups, even though you don't want to immediately do so. Also, bring back mini games, and give us more options for the decor because it seems like we have less choicea each time. There are various things I'd personally want to change. Please don't let this game go down the drain like others. I've had it for years and I love it, but it does need some improvement in certain areas.

I've played this game for a long time. Now, I have reached the point where I'm being forced to either spend real money or waste countless lives to try to pass a level. I just spent 2 weeks trying to pass a "super hard" level, then played one level, and it's immediately another "super hard" level. It's unfortunate that the game makers are trying to bully players into spending real money on a "free" game.

ugh... I am beyond frustrated with the game right now. am on level 8877, but lately almost every time I spend money to get extra moves the game will just go away. when I go back it completely reloads instead of going back to the level I was playing. so I spend money for nothing. this just happen once but many many times. I feel like I should get an explanation as to why this keeps happening. not only do I waste money buying extra moves but then I still have to start the level over and it's BS

Every change is a bad one... I used to really love this game, but your changes have all been horrible ones. I hate all the expedition mini games. They're back to back and so boring and impossible to complete. Now, we don't even earn stars for them, so I don't bother with them anymore. It costs so much to get extra moves. Completing a level used to earn you more coins. Now you get like 10, which is a drop in the bucket when it costs 900 for 5 more moves. You took away the yard change decorations.

The latest update to the game makes every level almost impossible. Now your having to worry about clearing 3 to 4 items instead of the usual 2. There is never enough moves to clear everything. Its more of a money grab than before!! When you cant beat a normal level with the rainbow ball and power ups you know they have mafe it harder. I have been stuck on a normal level all day now and that never happens. If the update doesnt get reversed, ill delete the game!!

Disappointed with all the updates. Using power-ups is practically useless because they rarely hit where needed but rather one next to it or an empty space. The side quest has become boring because it's just the same one in a different location over and over again. And no, I don't want to constantly do all the different races. Now today I see the look has changed as well to resemble some cheesy 80s cartoon. Uninstalling after 5 years of playing.

I've been playing this game for about 6 years now. And it used to be fun with its mini and matching games. But now every time they update it, they take away your mini games replace it with a clear the fields to find the missing person. Same thing, different update. With the last update they made it more like a child's game making it all bubbly. Also I believe that you should be able to have the option trade stars and for coins as I have 6000+ stars and only a house to fix with them.ü§¶‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

title: HBO Max: Stream TV & Movies
description:
The most talked about shows and movies featuring the worlds of HBO, the DC Universe, Adult Swim, A24, and beyond.

With HBO Max you'll get:
‚Ä¢ Access to thousands of TV shows and movies.
‚Ä¢ Exclusive, award-winning series that everyone's talking about ‚Äî like the HBO Originals The Last of Us, Succession, The White Lotus, and House of the Dragon.
‚Ä¢ The latest hits from HBO, Harry Potter, DC, Warner Bros., ID, Adult Swim, A24, and more.
‚Ä¢ Stream select live sports from your favorite leagues and teams. Availability varies by plan and by subscription provider.
‚Ä¢ Iconic favorite TV shows like Friends, Rick and Morty, Gossip Girl, 90 Day Fianc√©, Looney Tunes, and more.
‚Ä¢ Family-friendly entertainment for the whole household.
‚Ä¢ Fascinating documentaries and true crime series.

Features:
‚Ä¢ Enjoy your favorite shows and movies at home or on the go. HBO Max is available on select TV, web browser, mobile, tablet, and gaming console devices.  
‚Ä¢ Catch even more sports action with the live Multiview experience ‚Äî stream up to 3 games at once during select events.
‚Ä¢ Browse or search with ease across HBO, movies, series, genres, and brands.
‚Ä¢ Download shows and movies you love to watch on the go with select plans. (Download limits vary by plan.)
‚Ä¢ Personalized profiles for the entire household with customizable ratings, profile PIN protection, and kid-proof exit.
‚Ä¢ Pick up episodes and movies where you left off across your favorite devices.
‚Ä¢ Keep up with everything you love, all in one place with My Stuff.
‚Ä¢ Watch on multiple devices at the same time. (Limits vary by plan.)
‚Ä¢ Stream with high-quality video and surround sound on select plans.

Content and feature availability on HBO Max may vary by region. Some titles and features shown above may not be available in your country. Language availability varies by country.

Your subscription will automatically renew at the then-current price of your plan, unless you cancel before the renewal. You can manage or cancel your subscription at any time by accessing your account. HBO Max is only available in certain territories.

Terms of Use: https://hbomax.com/terms-of-use

summary: Watch hit original series, films, reality, and more on HBO Max.

scraped_reviews.content: I remember when HBO would list several great shows/movies and brand new ones as well. Now when I log in, I can barely find anything worth watching. And when I do, the ads, manüòí. Sitting there like, "huh, it just came back onnn!" & realized there are ad blocks ever 5mins! They're commercials at that. 3 ads each with the majority of them being a minute long. I absolutely despise this app. At this point, I only have it because it's a $10 bundle with Netflix. Glad I've multiple streaming platforms

One complaint: although you can download content, this app will not start without Internet access. I downloaded a bunch of stuff for a flight, but I wasn't able to watch it. That makes the feature much less useful. I know the app wants to check for a valid subscription on startup. It could cache an authentication result for a little while - long enough to get through a flight. I was using the app minutes before boarding the plane. It doesn't have to stop working the instant a subscription ends.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We want to make sure downloads/using Max offline work great for you. See these tips: help.max.com/downloads (See Troubleshooting: Can't play a download). An advocate would also be happy to reach out to you directly to help. If interested, fill out this form: help.max.com/AppReview and include - Jesse Hallett - where it asks for your Username.

scraped_reviews.content: Having the same problem as in other reviews, where the app keeps crashing, the screen goes black, the audio goes in and out, and it buffers constantly. Maybe consider fixing the app when enough people are having the same issues instead of leaving "troubleshooting tips" under each review and just blaming it on the consumer? The app has always had some kind of problem as long as I've used it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Elyse, thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We want to make sure that using Max is a great experience for you and an advocate would be happy to reach out to you directly to help. If interested, fill out this form: help.max.com/AppReview and include your username - Elyse - where it asks for your Web Handle. - Max Support

scraped_reviews.content: I'm not sure why it always takes forever for this to load, I don't think it's an internet issue because this doesn't happen with any other streaming service, but it's quite frustrating. It takes about 10 minutes to start watching something on Max, and that's IF it loads at all. Not even the home screen loads correctly. Pretty disappointing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Ashley, let's make sure you can stream smoothly. To start, please give these steps a try: help.max.com/troubleshoot. An advocate would also be happy to reach out to you directly to help. If interested, fill out this form: help.max.com/AppReview and include your username - Ashley LaRue - where it asks for your Web Handle. Thanks. -Max Support

scraped_reviews.content: Absolute Rubbish. Every time I click to watch anything, I get a black screen with a white circle and audio, not even a moving one that means it's loading. It completely freezes my phone. I can't exit out, I can't use the power button to turn off the screen or turn off the phone, nothing. It messes up my phone so badly that it activates the safety protocols and the phone shuts itself down. UPDATE 2 years later, still the same problem.

Continues to "stream" after I have told my chromecast to stop. I have watched 1 episode of the Wire, but stupid Max thinks I'm on S2 E5! And I cannot "reset" it back to the first episode so that the "continue watching" feature is accurate. This has happened with other series and it's incredibly frustrating. Combined with the poor mobile interface where I can't hit buttons on the last episode of a series because the chromecast status bar blocks it, I hate the HBO Max Mobile app.

This app hasn't worked for me for nearly all of 2025. I can log in and view titles, but when I try to click play on literally anything, an error is displayed. I've uninstalled the app, reinstalled, cleared cache, all of the things. When I called tech support they said it was a known issue and it was being worked on. That was months ago. Absolutely ridiculous that they have not fixed it after all this time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi, Mandee. We'll be happy to help you. Please fill out the following form:
help.hbomax.com/AppReview, include your user name Mandee F and an agent will assist you. Thank you!, HBO Max Customer Support

scraped_reviews.content: HBO Max has a wonderful assortment of shows and movies. I particularly like the content from Food Network and HGTV. But I am somewhat frustrated with the glitchiness of the app. Frequently when watching a show it will pause for a block of commercials. When the program resumes after the commercials it starts back up 10 to 20 minutes earlier in the program from where it had paused. The viewer has to carefully scroll forward to resume where they left off or they end up rewatching the same scenes.

Good programming. Don't like that there are commercials on every series and movie. I think some movies and series should be commercial free like back in the day. I don't mind a few commercials for other shows, commercials when watching a movie is a bummer. That's the biggest downside. 10 dollars extra for no commercials is greedy. With all the apps adding up, going back to cable may just be the better choice.

Commercials cause problems, was watching Weapons, during the 4th commercial break, the video resumed playing at the spot after the 3rd commercial break. It then took almost 8 minutes of fast forwarding, more commercials, rewinding a bit, more commercials... I mean come on, enough is enough. Don't force me to rewatch commercials because YOUR app is glitchy. Mark the break as completed and give me my viewing time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: ¬°Hi, Gixxer! We'll be happy to help you. Please fill out the following form: help.hbomax.com/AppReview. Include your user name and an agent will assist you. Thank you, HBO Max Customer Support.

scraped_reviews.content: I used to love this streaming service, but for the last TWO MONTHS, I haven't been able to watch anything. First, the video freezes, yet the audio continues playing. Then, if you try to rewind or restart, the video buffers and will not play no matter how many times you try. I have done all their stupid troubleshooting and spoken to customer service twice about this issue, and I keep getting the run around. I don't think they're listening. Maybe they won't till someone sues.

The phone app isn't so bad but the TV app is horrible. It can't rewind or fast forward appropriately. I end up having to rewatch all these commercials which is crazy considering I already have ads for a paid service. I'm not really sure how the main function of a streaming service doesn't work appropriately. Also, now it's randomly skipping backwards to another point in the episode even when I didn't rewind.

Wide black margins on phone screen, tiny video picture in app. Developer please allow zoom, or full screen versions. Its impossible to use this app now because the video of movies is too small. I reactivated to see Sinners and the movie screen is tiny, surrounded by huge blocks of empty space on all sides! what a joke! It was better when it was Max app, we could zoom in and fill the screen with the movie.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi. We'll be happy to help you. Please fill out the following form:
help.hbomax.com/AppReview, include your user name R M and an agent will assist you. Thank you!, HBO Max Customer Support

scraped_reviews.content: When one issue is fixed another appears. For a while I couldn't choose an episode past #10. Then the skip button would always be displayed. Now everytime I come back to watch a series it takes me to the same episode instead of keeping track where I'm at. There's been many others too. The only reason I have it is for Friends, and I'm so close to just popping in my DVDs and calling it a day with this app.

If you download content, you have a 50/50 chance of being able to actually watch it. You'll get an error and a link to support. You also get a super long code to share with support but you can't copy it. LOL nobody gonna type that out. Also the error message blames the user. "There is something wrong with your device." This statement is false as other downloads work. The error is with the product, not the user.

This is the worst app I have ever downloaded. Every time I come back on to watch it it takes me back to an old episode. It never saves the right position I'm in. Also, the little skip intro box pops up on the TV and it stays there during all the episodes. It doesn't go away. This app is worthless. It seems the people that made it can't even keep it updated. I will never pay for this garbage again.

The app does not even let me log in properly. I enter the email and the password then it takes me to where I need to connect my provider then it just takes me in circles. It acts like it connects to my provider but then tells me I need to connect it again. This has happened on 2 separate occasions. This bug needs to be fixed. My phone is the only device I cannot watch HBO Max. The TV, my desktop, even my laptop all work just fine!

Horrible. I was excited to get this service, but you can't watch anything. Between the black screens, glitching, buffering, ads, and restarting you at the beginning, it was absolutely infuriating to even try to be entertained. I tried turning the captions off, restarting my internet, restarting my TV, making sure everything was updated, just.... all my other channels work perfectly. This one was a waste of even $10, I wasn't able to watch a single thing from start to finish.

The content is great.. but it crashes EVERY TIME I watch anything. Seriously, I cannot watch an entire movie without it buffering and the white circle/black screen of death, or just crashing & exiting to the tv menu. It's the only app I have that does this, and it does it every time. Trying to watch a movie this am and it crashed 4x before the movie started. Zero stars. I will be dropping this app soon. I've had it for 2 months and I'm fed up. Going to watch what I can this month then I'm out.

Update: I honestly wish I could give this app zero stars. It really is mind boggling how terrible it is.
